Review: Truly the worst company I’ve ever dealt with. Lost my order and had the cheek to tell me I am responsible for letting them know, even though it hadn’t left their warehouse! Naturally the items are now sold out. The online staff are rude and claim not to have a formal complaints process.

My belt bag started ripping at the corner seam within 3 months of having it. After contacting customer service they said it was over a year old and they couldn’t do anything for me. I explained the bag was only 3 months old and attached photos as well as my receipt showing the date of purchase and they told me they could no longer assist me and the case was closed. Absolutely awful customer service. This company does not stand behind their product. Do not recommend at all.
Terrible quality for the price. Stitching unravels within months and they will refuse a quality control refund. $120 per pair should last longer than 6 months.

Their returns and damage policies have recently changed. Only 1 year. I had a terrible experience with their returns department. You pay a lot of money to a company that doesn't stand behind their product. Will not be purchasing from them again despite being a returning customer for years
Lululemon has an "F" rating on the Better Business Bureau website.  That should tell you how they handle disputes...they don't.
At these prices I would expect better delivery service. Incorrect notifications of timing and it took nearly 2 weeks to deliver to the Rep of Ireland. I won’t be ordering again.

At the store in Bend, OR, the sales assistant ordered a pair of pants in my size which were not available in the store.  This was on June 3.  On June 6, I received an email stating that the item had shipped. On June 7, my credit card was charged for the item.  On June 10, I tracked my shipment only to learn that the shipper was still awaiting the item.  I contacted Lululemon through the live chat which was completely useless.  I then called and, after waiting on hold for a long time, was immediately told that "the item was lost" and that I could get it shipped in another color or get a refund.  If the system immediately knew that the item was lost, why was it necessary for me to do all the work to track this down.  I should have been sent an email right away giving me the option to cancel the order.  As it stands, I now have to wait another 10 business days to get a refund.  I am unlikely to purchase from Lululemon in the future.

Be very aware of sizing with Lululemon. I bought a pair of running tights in the sale marked size 10, NZ 14. These are so small I can't wear them. I am normally a 12. Because they are on sale they won't replace even though I believe they are incorrectly sized. I used to love Lululemon. Now find the fabric is thin, colours uninspiring and very very expensive for what they are. Bye Lululemon.

Lululemon charges premium prices. $138 for a pair I'm me a pants. They seem to have backed down on their quality promise. The belt loop on one of my pants snapped and I went to the sq1 location to have it replaced. Was not a pleasing experience as I learned that their quality promise is now only valid for 1 year. My pants were labeled  01/2023 and one on the managers Insisted it was just over a year old and hence would not replace. Needless to say, at $138 I will never buy another item at Lululemon and urge all my friends to be aware of this And shop elsewhere.

This company is worth it at all. Spent almost fighting this people who serve you country and for dependents want document even if you show your ID. Just for discount. I have other websites that I gone through and never once ask documents. Just information on my DOD number. This website is just plain and the people to help are not nice to accommodate. They say the same to you overe and over. They are not acccomdating. They say cover the your essential documentation ask, but that to me identity theft. All I ask is accept what have and move on simple.
Horrible customer service. The representative was snotty and sarcastic over the phone. Taking my business to Nike from now on.

DON’T BUY ONLINEPurchased the Nulu Jacket online. It’s been 3 weeks and the order has still not arrived. Apparently it got lost in transit. All the hassle to have to call customer service and wait an hour to speak with an agent to finally be put on hold. Called and wait an hour again. Worst customer service, extremely disappointed. I would not recommend this company.

Had a few outfits from lululemon athletica, they were a gift along with other stuff. well, as i can tell, they might be a bit pricy, but sure, their clothes are made out of comfortable fabric and high-quality material. I like the name of the brand too, it's stylish.

Bought All the Right Places High-Rise Drawcord Waist Crop 23” tights and recieved them Jan 6, 2024, I work away for a month at a time so they effectively had 2 months of wear, maybe once per week.  Approximatley a total of 8 wears and the seem in the crotch ripped.  I used their customer service to submit an issue and was told that I had caused accidental damage.  Just wondering how one causes accidental damage to the crotch area? lol The seem definitely parted quickly upon receiving the goods and caused a two inch hold in the crotch.  Lulu customer care basically told me to go fly a kite and effectively does not stand behind their products.  This after a year before I ordered and received a pair just before Christmas and upon first wear the leg had a tear in it, I reached out to them at that time they basically said we're too busy with our Christmas sales rush to help you.  So basically they think they are too big to fail and don't actually stand behind the quality of their products any longer.  I had a pair of lulu's in the 2000's that lasted 7 years, now 8 wears for a 128$ pair or pants? No thank you, never again Lulu.

Terrible customer service.  Tracking indicates that my $300 order has been sitting in customs well past the expected delivery date.  Items were to be delivered on 5/9 and it is 5/16.  Chat live and telephone representative both confirmed they will do nothing but open and investigation and I can expect to wait an additional 6 business days.  I will not shop with them again in the future with this level of service.  Way too many other great brands out there for this sub par level of service.

A note of thanks to the staff in the stores of Richmond, Westfield White City and Online. Impeccable every time. They ought to teach many in the trade what customer service is. Polite, not pushy, extremely helpful and all of this is with a smile, whether you are buying, exchanging or simply didn't get lucky with what you needed on one occasion. Their products are great, too, whether the specialised wear for sports, or the sweatshirts or even their coats. Tried them, all, and happy.

2 stars only for the representatives that tried to help in the situation.I received a gift card for my birthday from a friend for $50. I went to use it in store, and was told by the cashier that the magnetic strip didn’t work, and I would have to call customer service to get help. I tried to upload the card on the app, but the pin was unreadable on the card. I left and called to figure out my options. I was told the card had a pre-authorization fee that had to be waived (which would take 2 weeks) and then the funds would be moved to a different e-gift card that I could use. I called back 3 times within the span of 3 weeks, and I kept being told the same thing, to wait until the fee was waived and then it would be transferred. Finally when I called, I was told the card had been compromised and been used, and there was nothing they could do about it. Which means my friend was scammed out of $50 by lululemon.This gift card was never used outside of the time I tried to use it in store and was told the magnetic strip doesn’t work. The only way it could have been compromised is before it was purchased, which means lululemon sold a compromised gift card, or the lululemon store at which is was used somehow took the information for it and compromised it. I asked to speak to the resolutions team on the phone, or some kind of manager or supervisor, and was told they don’t allow customers to speak on the phone with either party. The resolutions team then “resolved” the issue by sending me an email telling me to contact my local police. Very disappointed in lululemon resolution management.

Their customer service sucks! My order was supposed to be delivered last Wednesday, but it still hasn't arrived. They're using the absolutely worst courier service on earth called OnTrack. I've called customer service multiple times, but nobody is able to help; they just listen and hang up. I'm done with shopping online!

Popped into Canary Wharf to find a gym outfit for my birthday as a busy mum of two I was spending the day at a spa/gym and looking forward to my relaxing treat. The customer service I received from the assistants (especially Nadia) in store was superb. She found me an amazing outfit, Wundertrain leggings, Align top and bag. I loved wearing my outfit and felt great. I did a class and the fabric was so comfortable. I can't thank Nadia enough for making my birthday. I am a Lululemon convert and look forward to buying my next outfit!

Ordered wunder puff jacket Boxing Day online - smooth transaction on website. Jacket delivered by ups on 4th Jan. Jacket was well packaged in an environmentally friendly cardboard box, sealed with paper tape - easy to recycle.Jacket performs really well, warm but not overly heavy. Good sized pockets for gloves, phone and bits and bobs. Jacket performs really well in the rain. Inner lining to wrists and neck keeps out the elements and cold. Overall a well made Lululemon item.Only criticism are the zips are a bit fiddly - Lululemon could make the zip pullers bigger or stitch on a pull strap, hence 4 stars.

Would like to feedback on Lululemon Auz Live chat customer service rude behaviour. Beside the fact they are unable to resolve my issue, they are also lack of empathy. Instead of not giving decent suggestion, i was ended my chat rudely by the customer support: Erin. Please send her for some proper customer support training, her character is ultimately lack of empathy and customer experience with her is extremely negative. I wonder how Lululemon set their criteria during their hiring process. If there is no solution, i would at least hope to be given more directive or understanding reply.Feedbacking on the multiple time of price glitch and purchase issue, all they could do is unable to honour. Please work into your customer support training and system price glitch. I believe the price point set by Lululemon should justify the amount of after sales service i should be getting. The non cancellation of order after 1 hour is also ulti inflexible, please think through a better purchase experience to your customer! Thank you!
Terrible customer service with lost item. Will not be buying from them in the future

Always had a really good experience. I have ordered from lulu many times over the past few years. One thing I will say is their customer satisfaction is definitely important to them from what I’ve experienced. The bad experiences I have had with them have been promptly reconciled with a refund and so far I’ve never had a quality issue with any of my lululemon clothes. Their warranty is so long for a reason, they know how well built the clothing is.

Lululemon is quality in all of the senses. I always had great experiences with their products as the quality and durability are impressive, but now I also experienced the Customer Service and is like same as the products. Amazing!!!! Congrats for the way you handle and resolve issues. This make us more loyal than we already are! I've been in Dublin on holidays and I was able to change a product that was purchased online as there was no more availability online but they had one in the shop. The team in the shop and also inside Brown Thomas are fantastic!! Also de Customer Service online in incredibly clear and efficient. Congrats to the Recruiters!!!

I will no longer purchase from this company. The quality of their athletic clothes is truly not up to par and it’s really just the brand name that keeps them afloat. Their customer service is even worse than their overpriced athletic wear. I was returning a bottom with a weirdly turned seam and after it was said and done I kept receiving all these emails from the company regarding resolving the issue of the return. There was no issue and no matter how many times I responded with “it’s all done, my return is refunded,” the emails kept coming constantly!! Finally I wrote “STOP!!!” This got the attention of ONE of the customer service reps and she apologized for the massive numberof unnecessary emails, and then offered to send a $30 ecard for my trouble. I thought this very “Nordstrom-like” and thanked them. I never received the gift card. I wrote to them and they said they sent it. The ONE email from them that didn’t actually arrive in my e-box?? Sure. Interesting. I said please resend. Rather than resend I received numerous emails saying it had been sent. They never bothered to rectify the situation. Quite the company. Not people I’ll do business with….

To start off, their clothes are absolutely amazing. They have high quality clothing, although expensive, but very worth it because the clothes will last you years and years. They have the cutest colors and the clothes are truly so comfy!

Extreamly slow delivery. Items in same order sent separately, one arriving 2 weeks after promised delivery. Also their sale is absolute joke. None of the items/sizes are in stock. Service gone down the hill a lot lately.
I spend €118 on a pair of leggins and have to pay €1 for a bag?? What's that about??? Very frustrating, I went to brown Thomas and they don't charge for a bag.

I make all of my Lulu orders online, and I have had nothing but positive experiences each time. The quality of the items are excellent, and their staples are very cosy. The customer service is next to none, especially when something goes wrong with the order.

Ordered 4 pairs of leggings to replace old favorites (8+ years), same size / style / color. Received sheer, cheap leggings. Returned immediately. Have photo of return package, tags attached. Lulu refused to refund, said it was against policy for used clothing. Sent images of tags attached. Nearly a dozen emails later, they sent gift card. No refund. My cc refunded from a complaint I filed where I shared images of return. Left lulu a review, received notification review was posted, clicked through to see, 404 error. They removed post. Terrible quality. Not old Lulu. Horrible customer service. Felt very stiff and cheap compared to previous soft fabrics. Plenty of better companies around.

Absolutely Love lululemon’s clothes and many color options however the prices are not affordable, nor reasonable. They could also improve on the impact that just the production of their hotty hots  alone will leave on the environment. To add on, their majority share holding stockholder is their incredibly sexist founder and former CEO (no longer on the board). This being said, I still love the store  and own quite a few items which I am overall happy with and the workers in store are super helpful. For their expensive prices, at least they offer free hemming and shipping.
Super impressed by lululemon customer service. They respond quickly and I spoke to Faye who dealt with my issue quickly and professionally. I’ve also returned many items and never had an issue.

I am obsessed with working out, and these clothes are so worth the money.I tend to sweat a lot, and I realize that I could go through a handful of $20 T-shirts and tank tops in a matter of a month or two, but when I get something at Lulu, it just last forever.The sweat resistance makes them never smell, too.. depreciated by anywhere near me in workouts.I have nothing but positive things to say about this company, I love their clothes, they last forever, but you do have to treat your stuff with care.Always quality over quantity

Grate service but I heard Lululemon fabrics can cause cancer and heart attack and Lululemon ceo fat shame's ppl and don't want black ppl to buy there products and as being a black person who likes this line the CEO should be sewed for this act and not thinking about what he wants to say and if it is appropriate before he says it

Terrible customer service. My order is over 10 days late. I contacted customer service chat a few times to start an investigation. They finally started one and now they will not refund my order until they do their “due diligence”. Who knows how long that will take. But it looks like the order got stuck somewhere in the beginning of the shipping process. And so now I just have to wait for a refund for who knows how long. When I tried to discuss with their online chat they said they have nothing left to say and closed me out of the chat. Unbelievable. This is after a huge order - seems they don’t care about their customers at all - I will not shop here anymore!

I was bought a pair of trousers as a present.  Given the quality and quite frankly farcical price I'm amazed people buy these so I have returned. On the plus side this two star review for them improves on their average rating.  I can't believe the volume of folks who buy this marketed tripe.

I love active wear and after being given a gift card I purchased leggings and a top. They were both really nice and fit well however, for the price I just don’t feel it is worth it. The quality wasn’t any better than cheaper brands and I only managed one active wear outfit. I won’t be purchasing from them again.

Will never order again. They use carriers that don’t deliver to military posts and then it’s the longest process to get your money back. Will be filing a chargeback. Their customer service does nothing and just continually passes you off. Terrible. Also, took them 5 days to get the order out. Do better.
Impressed by the store on Kings road, London where they take your name going into the changing rooms so it’s really personal and you feel like a valued customer. Great customer service.

Been shopping here for a couple of years and can honestly say that the customer service has gone downhill massively. I've had numerous occasions where UPS dropped off my parcel somewhere rather than my home address and when I raised this with the team, their advice was to go collect it, or if I can't, the parcel will be returned and I will be refunded. Don't bother trying the online chat because it seems like all of the advisors are useless with actually resolving the problem.

I purchased 2 items from Lululemon and I loved the leggings they are so form fitting! I also received the wrong item and had to return it. Overall the clothes are nice and I would definitely be buying more from here. The quality does vary depending on the item you purchase.

I'm never buying anything from Lululemon again. In my last purchases, all the sweaters and T-shirts shrunk, a lot of things are pilling, the color faded after 2 washes, and they now look cheap, and as if I've been wearing them for decades. I don't understand how they're selling $100+ gear that's such low quality. Disappointing.

Lululemon offers first responders and military small discounts, which is extremely appreciative. However, this year they have taken away the ability to purchase things online with a gift card while using discount. Why?? I purchased something online, returned it in store for store credit, and when I went to purchase an item online and use my store credit, it would not let me do it. I contacted lululemon about it and they said you cannot use a discount and a gift card in the same transaction online. If I was to walk into a store I would be able to redeem my discount and my gift card! Not sure why Lululemon would take away the ability to use a gift card to their military and first responders with discounts. Not quite sure how this adds up.??? I would love an explanation!!

Went to the Lululemon located near 5th Ave and 48th St, it was clean the and the service was great. I was greeted at the entrance and they helped me find what I needed. However, I wish they were escalators, especially after walking in the city for hours.

Tried to return faulty leggings and it was the most frustrating convoluted process I’ve had online. The €98 leggings were a birthday present for my daughter. Piling appeared after 1 wear and the material was poor quality. I eventually received a return label after being asked 2 times for information they already had.For some unknown reason I had to wait another 3 days for it ( plus email them again).It felt like customer service was commenting on queries to look like they were responding when actually they were just asking for information they already had. Either nobody reads complaints or it’s being auto answered by a service ai bot. Either way it is painful to work through. I would not recommend buying anything from this company online.
Good experience every time. Only once did a sales lady forget to put part of my purchase into a bag, but rectified promptly upon my return to the store.

I spent time on the site choosing an appropriate mat and leggings to fit within a certain budget and also qualify for an AMEX promotion. The leggings came and I was less than impressed with the material. I waited for the mat which never came and instead I received an email telling me my order had been cancelled. I went back to the website and ordered a different one only to receive yet another email telling me my order was cancelled. I no longer wanted to deal with them and decided I would return the leggings. The leggings were on sale so sadly I was only able to receive a credit.  Double disappointment and a good lesson.
I had an item missing from my order. I spoke with Luis via email and he quickly resolved my issue and issued a full refund that I received within a day. Great communication and very professional.

Absolutely horrible customer service!  Their warranty is useless as their associates continuously set expectations that they don’t live up to.  For the prices they charge for their products you would expect their service to be impeccable.  The truth is their service is pathetic.

The reviews on here say it all. The quality of this brands products are seriously shocking. Although they are comflrtable and a good fit- the material is so so poor and lasts no longer than a few weeks. When contacted the response is “We pride ourselves on creating innovative gear to support you through your sweatiest endeavours, and we stand behind our gear's quality. That said, keep in mind that our quality promise covers manufacturing defects.” These leggings are €120….DO NOT BUY

This company are a nightmare with deliveries. The first time I ordered from them they missed off a line of my address which delayed things.I have just ordered another item which was dispatched on 30 November by Royal Mail tracked 48. The tracking showed it was delivered to the Bristol MC on 2 December. I then received an email to say that it had been re-routed. To where? Bristol MC. The package sat there for a week until it was delivered, eventually, on 9 December. Tracked 48? Joke.

I went to get a credit for a wrong size I had got from a sale rack. Having had bitter experiences in the past, my new membership gave me some confidence on the possibility for a credit. Though it was a busy day today, to my surprise, the customer service (Sarah, at Fairview Mall location) took the time and when she knew I loved the item, she checked online and found my size in another colour which I didn’t have in my collection and ordered it for me. The customer service was excellent and I hope all the customer service experiences will be the same every time.
I have purchased items twice now from Lululemon and on both occasions the service was probably the best I have received in a very long time
I purchased an item during the holiday season sale. My item came in original packaging within 6 days of placing the order. No complaints!
Great clothing, easy returns, fast shipping. Only problem is that their clothes sometimes change in size between colors and there are some frustrating inconsistencies.

I went into Lululemon because a jacket that I bought from them a few years ago got a tear in it, and I wanted to see if there was anything they could do about it. I was thinking that the best they could do was send it off for repairs, if that, but I was wrong. I was being taken care of by Kevin Bita at the Mapleview Mall Lululemon (Ontario) and I received much more than I could have ever hoped! He was kind, patient, and fair and he made sure that when I left the store they all my problems were solved! He took his time, didn’t rush me as he was giving me options, and made sure that I was happy with the outcome. I have never received costumer service like this before! Way to go Kevin!

Bought a $150 sweatshirt that never arrived.  It was marked as delivered, but there is no way they could have entered the building.  I was home the entire time and they left it on a sidewalk filled with homeless people.  Then when I disputed it (long form) the shipping company said it was delivered and I need to handle with the Lulu's.  so much easier to dispute with Amex, I will never order from these lululosers again.

Bought a jacket, very expensive ($400), but the quality is very bad. Got a defect, contacted them and they confirmed they will send a post label for a return / refund within next 2-3 business days. This was in November 2023... Despite many emails and confirmations that they would send the post label within few days, we are in March and still nothing.I think they charge hefty price for a bad quality and the after sale service is catastrophic, if not a fraud.Don't buy anything from this brand

I went to lululemon in Westfield , the girl who had blonde ( didn't catch her name ) was rude and kept rolling her eyes while talking . First of all who do you think you are ? Second of all if you can't be nice don't work in retail !

I have a bunch of their stuff. Whenever I have an issue with one of their items, they are super good about exchanging. You pay a premium price, but if the item doesn’t hold up, they’ll make it better.Most recently I sent a complaint about boxers that didn’t hold up and ripped. They sent me a gift card via email to make up for it.

Terrible customer service. UPS was supposed to deliver the parcel on the 3rd of May but they didn't even come by, they left it at a collection point 2.5km away! I contacted Lulu and they said that they are sorry but there is nothing they can do and it is UPS' fault so I can contact them if I want but there is nothing they can do. I called UPS who said they will try to redeliver in 2 days but they never did. Contacted Lulu again who again told me all they can do is pass on my complaint to UPS but I should not expect a response from UPS and there is nothing they can do about the parcel but it would be best if I just go and pick it up myself! We do know UPS is absolutely incompetent but I expected better customer service from Lulu.

I would avoid the store like the plague. They put in a childless policy, which means they won’t let you accompany your child to try on clothing. They want to do it for you, so they can feel your child up and do inappropriate things with children, which is what this company is all about. Definitely avoid, we have spent tens of thousand dollars, just this year with this company but will no longer do so. They make a crappy product, have horrible employees, and overall the companies poorly run now that they become famous. The worst part is they want to separate you from your child so that they can do inappropriate things with them in the dressing room.1

Horrible service. They use DPD as a delivery partner and they went around with my package for 4 days without delivering it. DPD support is useless and so is Lululemon support.Answering very late and asking a bunch of security questions (lol) instead of actually helping. Will never order from here again. Should have checked the reviews beforehand. Stay away!I am looking to get my money back for my order.

ordered product on their website on cyber monday, waited weeks for delivery/tracking no movement on order status, then they finally said due to a "system glitch" they couldn't deliver the product, offered a refund. And lost out on sale prices (they would not honor those and re-order the product at the same price). Lame customer service, do what's right for them not the customer

Completely let down by Lululemon delivery. What's the point of saying 3-5 working days (already quite long by today's standards) and then failing to keep to this timescale? Useless, and at Lululemon prices customers have a right to expect much better.

Same as all these other customers. Ordered on 28th Nov in Black Friday sale & order has been awaiting collection by ever since. Now out of stock with the suggestion from a “educator” (how patronising is that?) for me  to order something else (at vastly higher prices than my original order). Feels like a scam!
I see some terrible reviews, but my experience has been excellent. Very friendly and helpful staff in the stores, and the clothes fit great.

I have been wearing Luon leggings for 20 years.  Lululemon came into the market place when you could not get quality workout wear in all sizes and shapes.  I am disappointed with the Nulu product such a cheap disappointing fabric.  Pills, everything sticks to it, hair, dust, fluff.  Don't waste your money at Lululemon. You kind find better quality workout wear at target and Gap.
I love all there clothes and accessories, but too expensive. Their leggings are the most comfortable you’ll ever wear tho!

My package was marked undeliverable due to the carrier losing my package. I called lululemon, and was initially told I would get the option to replace the items with expedited shipping. Unfortunately, one of the items was out of stock so I needed to get another color, but these were going to be gifts, so I couldn’t decide right at that moment. The educator said they would put a note on my account so that I can be offered the same option when I called back. But when I called back, a different educator said they cannot offer this option. They would have to investigate, which would take 6 business days. That would be too long, since my family is leaving the country before that time period and gone for 3 months. I was planning to give these gifts to family out of the country. I asked for a full refund instead, which they said they cannot do until 6 days later. Extremely frustrated, as I’m now out of gifts. They also said if the original package is found, they’ll try to deliver as intended…but I’m out of the country for 3 months and well out of the 30 day return window…they’ll put a “note” on my account of the situation…as if notes do anything as was seen with my initial call about this matter. Will no longer support lululemon.

I have purchased several of their products over the course of the last 9 years or so and never had an issue. I bought the license to train linerless shorts in October of 2023 and the threads are already coming off. I reached out to their customer service over 2 weeks ago with no reply. I followed up 2 days ago and still no reply. It makes no sense how a company as popular as lululemon has that bad of a customer service team. I will not be purchasing another product from them unless they resolve this issue.

Customer service is a disappointment. My $300 parcels got stolen, I got it on cam. I wrote to GEC explained the situation and sent the vid. Then I got an auto reply saying they start investigation process, it will take 6 days and they will get it touch. They never did, so after 3 weeks with no respond I contacted them via chat on a website. Only after that I got an email saying they’re unable to help and they won’t refund me. Thanks for nothing!

Found a thumbtack/pin on the inside of  leggings ordered online. Lululemon customer service couldn’t tell me what it is and mentioned it doesn’t look like the pins used in their warehouse. I was told by an acquaintance that it looks like a type of accupuncture needle. Why would this be inside allegedly brand new leggings? This is so unsafe!

The parcel delivery to customers is very slow. I can't believe that Lululemon is now using Royal Mail Tracked 48 to deliver a product that costs nearly £400, instead of using UPS as they did before. My order has been waiting for a carrier of Royal Mail to pick it up from Lululemon since last week. I'm unsure when I will receive my order. It make me very disappointed.

They are falsely advertising prices on their website, upon adding the item I was looking at to the cart the price then increased. I contacted customer service about this and they refused to acknowledge the item was initially appearing for a cheaper price despite this happening on both my laptop and mobile, when I asked to complain they then just ended the chat session. The 10% off code for signing up for their emails also doesn't work. Overall very poor experience.

Order UK02253415. Ordered on 30th December 2023. Delivery said 3-5 working days. Checked today (15th January 2024) and was informed the courier never picked it up. It was lost. Online chat said they'd issue a refund then cut me off. No email to confirm the refund and the order status still shows as 'Shipped'. Appaling customer Service. I want my money back for an order that was never sent... Not difficult.

Avoid it as Gas Chamber!Product is shiny overpriced defective trash.If you will try return it, they will send you toilet coupons, instead of proper cashback return to your bank account.Hey Luluscamer,Send money back to my bank account ImmediatelyNo toilet coupons. neu0077123001 [Incident: 230324-000034]

They have changed the delivery service to Royal Mail and it’s a disgrace. If you make an order be expecting to wait a week for it . They send you a email saying you item has been shipped and it’s still sitting there 3 days later waiting to be picked up and the it’s Royal Mail cheapest delivery service. Completely unacceptable for a company that charges you premium prices for the clothes 👎🏻

I ordered the famous align pant, which costs $98.00 before tax. After 2 wears, one of the main seams started unraveling. I posted a 1 star review on their website stating the same facts stated above, and received an email saying that they would not be posting the review. This is completely unethical. I won't be shopping there ever again.
Really like the fabric, tho too stretchy at times. The color match bra and leggings are great for yoga and Pilates.

I ordered a Christmas gift from Lululemon on the 20 November and am still awaiting its delivery. UPS keep sending me an email everyday saying it will come tomorrow. I got in touch with Lululemon today and they can not guarantee the delivery before Christmas, which I find extraordinary! They said to get in touch again on the 12 December, which will probably be too late for Christmas.
My order was never delivered and they would not refund me because it was signed by someone. The signature was not mine.
I have been wearing LULU for several years, to PT and outdoor walking. Several leggings tore up after few washes.

Ordered leggings at £88 a considerable expense. Didn’t arrive after ten days of chasing they say they have been delivered to ups. They haven’t! Always giving themselves five days to respond. When asked for prof of delivery they can’t give you anything . Avoid because once they have your money they don’t have any kind of customer service. Also UPS are unreachable unless you have an account with them. Poor service

Wife purchased a gift card that was sent to an invalid email address. The website offered a selection to fix but it did not work. She tried to replace it and was charged twice but never sent one of the cards. So lulu has our money and cards. Lulu won't refund the card but wants to reissue it except their phone system hung up on her twice. Won't let her talk to a manager What an incompetent company

Lululemon only allows 4 and 5 stars reviews.  Doesn’t care about customer service and will do anything to prevent the TRUTH that exposes their lies about signing up with your email ! Any reviews less than 4 or 5 are MODERATED which means thrown out so their customers and online reviewers all appear positive. When you signup with your email Lululemon states in emails sent to you confirming free returns but is a LIE! Objective site like TrustPilot gives REAL REVIEWS not the moderated or CENSORED reviews Lululemon approves so falsely looking positive!

So i bought the 20L in CF markville, fell inlove with the simple design and got one for my sister online April of last year. However, the stitches came off on the straps so I returned it August 2023. The process was smooth and all but I was disappointed with the quality. And now, mine has shown the same defect but unfortunately lost my receipt as I purchased it 11months ago. I swear never to buy again, it’s obviously a quality issue considering the bag is not cheap $155. I should have bought more trusted brand had i known that the name can’t be trusted. I wish i can show pictures to warn others not to spend this much for something that will not last long

Don’t use this company unless you know exactly what you are buying. They have re-named customer service as a guest education centre - how patronising is that? Shoes I purchased were too small, despite using their guide and advice to measure my feet. It has taken 2 online chats and numerous emails for me to get a returns label (they don’t include it in the delivery) and the last email said I would receive another email in 3-5 days with my return information - nothing yet. I am beyond frustrated with my experience. Far and away the worst customer service I have ever experienced. Steer clear!!!

I purchased 2 pants at lululemon and I got an email asking for my reviews. I left 2 reviews (1 decent, 1 less good) and got 2 emails saying that the reviews were moderated and did not meet the requirements to be shown. No explanation was given! This company picks and chooses reviews!

I’m honestly so baffled that this company is this large considering how bad their quality and customer service is. I genuinely thought that the quality would be good due to the products high cost and the fact that it’s so popular, unfortunately my leggings broke and I had to send them back and repurchase. Same thing happened again after 6 months. Not only is the quality bad, but I also received the worst customer service. It’s taken me several weeks to receive a refund, but now finally after reaching out ten times - I finally got it. No more a customer of this brand, I’d rather buy leggings from Amazon for half the price considering the price definitely does not match the quality :) Spend your money elsewhere

I placed an order on the 22nd of Nov and never received the package.I contacted customer service on the 6th of Dec and they told me the package was back on your warehouse and that I will get a refund. I kept chasing this as I never received my money back. The last email was saying I would get it on the 9th of January - which didnt happened. Now I contacted again customer service and the incident was closed, a new is being opened and a new investigation needs to happen - this is not acceptable. It’s almost 2 months! Order number EU00989004Original incident number 231207-000286New incident number 240116-000709

I bought a down jacket for €174 on Black Friday. It has been 7 days since I placed my order and I have not received any updates on the package. An employee told me yesterday that my order was canceled. He tricked me into running out of stock. So I was forced to agree to a refund settlement. But in fact, at the same time yesterday, the official website showed that there were still stocks. So I think my consumer rights have been violated.
This company uses USPS which is an extremely unreliable delivery option. My package is lost, but they still want me to wait another 4 days to see if it shows up. Will they do something then?

I can confirm I would never be ordering from them again. I have been wearing Sweaty Betty for over 10 years and decided to give Lululemon a try. However when I contacted someone in the chat, they were so unhelpful I can't tell you! Delivery to the UK takes forever and it is just not a good brand at all!!!

Please pass this onto management. You have had no color selection for the cardio trainer head bands for months now other then white or black. You used to have a big color selection. You need to fix this as lots of people are just shopping elsewhere now because you are not dealing with complaints. You need to bring the other colors back. People need much more selection then just white or black

Set up delivery with courier who won’t deliver to my location. Refused to organise a redelivery refused to send me a transcript of the chat refused to assist me full stop, Melody was the name of the support staff who refused to helpMe at all, no point ordering from here as they use UPS

Truly terrible returns policy.I don't believe it meets Australian consumer rights. Bought leggings that are only available online, don't fit, tried returning same day as received, unworn, all tags still on...Lulu Lemon won't allow me to even do an exchange for the right size because it's from the "we made too much" section... which may I also add is not mentioned as "reduced to clear" or even labelled a "sale item" at point of purchase so there is no indicator it cannot be exchanged.  I paid $100.If there's so much of that item, allow customers to change a size.If an item cannot be returned, let alone exchanged, notify customers at the point of sales.Surprised and disappointed in these  cheat tactics from such a big company.

Just awful customer service. They use UPS  to deliver in the UK. I didn’t receive my package. They told me I needed to contact UPS as they were unable to due to date privacy. What nonsense ! They paid for the courier and the sender and yet leave customers to deal with the incompetent courier service they use. Now I have no package and UPS are just as useless as lululemon  so will have to dispute this via my credit card company.

Horrible customer service. Called 7 day ago about return. They confirmed that someone will pick it up. Never happened. Emails never in years answered. Dont buy lululemon,  alo yoga is much better as well as customer service.

Please firstly delete the 1 star1 month ago I ordered for delivery a back pack ( in stock ) for my daughters present .After 9:10 phone calls , emails still not here , their customer service is totally useless Absolutely never order from this company they are complete scammers , they are so fast at taking your hard earned money and not delivering.I’mNow making this a police matter , if you feel you e paid for goods your never likely to receive please do the same

You can no longer use a giftcard online to purchase items on sale … you’d have to go in the store to have someone order it for you . It’s so inconvenient. Im going to shop at  Athleta , Beach Riot , and  Amazon instead . When I asked these questions to customer service ,they did not understand what I was asking even though I clearly stated it multiple times.
The clothing is so so so stylish and cozy!!!!!! Omg I lit am obsessed with lululemon! The clothing is well made and lasts a super long time!💕⚡️

So disappointing and £85 out of pocket..I waited until Black Friday and ordered a running jacket as a Christmas gift for my husband, without any emails or contact at all the delivery failed and it has been sent to the Warehouse. They are refusing to resend it despite the fact i have been on hold and spoken to them so many times and emailed even more. They all keep suggesting i order a different one which is £184 instead of the £69 i ordered in Black Friday, they have sent me a £30 gift card leaving me still £85 down. I won't be re buying this gift now so will have to sort something else. :( Very sad. From the reviews it seems like similar things have happened to other people and they have cancelled orders bought in the sale to leave them to repurchase at a much higher price.

I bought a yoga mat online in the sale after spending the afternoon researching the qualities of different mats. I paid for it through Paypal and everything went through correctly. To my horror I got an email the next day to say that my order had been cancelled, because of a stock issue.  They merely apologised for any inconvenience. What awful customer service! They did the same thing to a friend of mine last year. I won't buy from them again.

Absolutely terrible service.  17 days after the order, the items are sent back to the sender.  I was following the UPS tracking and the parcel never made it anywhere near my address.  No contact attempted to me by Lululemon.  I telephoned them and they informed me that they cannot resend or reorder because their warehouse cannot process it.  So I have to wait 3 to 5 days for a refund, then if I wish. spend my time to process another order.  They are a high cost brand with a low cost customer offering.  The score on here says it all.  Awful company that need to audit their delivery service and sack everyone involved.

I wrote a review and they removed it. This is what I said: Bad qualityWhen you spend $100+ on leggings, you expect them to last. These ones… do not. I bought them about a year ago and they started to fall apart after a few washes. The pilling is so bad. I went to the store to try and get an exchange under their performance policy but they told me they couldn’t accept them because I didn’t have an account associated with the purchase. ridiculous. I’ve spend thousands of dollars on this brand so it’s disappointing and frustrating that they can’t be flexible.

This wwwlulumonsaleshop is a scam, they're impersonating Lululemon and if you don't pay attention you it will cost you. Ordered in mid April and got nothing, no surprise there. Lesson learned. I reported it to Lululemon but they don't seem to be able to take it down.

I never received my package. Horrible customer service. Waiting to see if they will even honor that. I’m a yoga teacher and there are so many other great options to buy yoga clothes. Don’t buy Lululemon. Plus they are pushing their political beliefs on you. That should not be a part of buying clothes.

I teach yoga since 2,5 years full-time, that would mean that I am eligible for the teacher discount. It is impossible to sign up. I send them the required papers a few times, each time after seconds I got an email that the papers are not valid. How can it be, that after seconds they reviewd all my papers. I went to a store in (Spitalfield) they were not helpful at all. However since there are a lot of other amazing brands who are happy to give me a teacher discount, I go with another brand from now on.

Absolutely shocking customer service. Passed from pillar to post on a refund from June. First call your bank, then call Apple Pay. Apple pay is just a wallet but ok then. Bank confirms no refund. Lululemon says oh well we can’t help further sorry.AVOID

I contacted customer service and petting them know that i received a incomplete items. They sent it in 4 different delivery and waited until it was complete to deliver the 4 shipping thinking might be the other items might be in different packages but unfortunately no. Now they are saying they cannot do anything about it even replacement or refund. Just recommending tofl file a police report as if police here will do something about this. They do know that there's nothing gonna happen and they just let you to do this.

First time military customer at Lululemon online. I had a tought time trying to get verified through their site for the Military discount. I went to SheerID and NOWHERE is Lululemon searchable or found in the discounts. So, I couldn't do the verification that way. I got online with a person to chat and they kept telling me the same thing, that I needed to get verified. I was looking for them to help me, but they acted like it wasn't their problem and that I needed to take it up with SheerID. I politely told them that they are not even listed on SheerID and I'd like to relay that to them. They replied one last time with a goodbye message and hung up on me. Terrible customer service.

I have contacted their customer relations ("Guest Education") eight times after they did not refund me when I returned defective pants. The leg seam was coming apart after just two delicate washes and looked terrible. They apparently credited someone else's gift card instead of mine, the one I used to pay for the pants. So I am out $156 and still no resolution after weeks. Lulu has really gone downhill and we will not buy from them again. They used to be a good company, 5 or 10 years ago. Now they sell inferior products at high prices and make you chase them after your refund vanishes. Still no resolution after 2 weeks, even after they said I would have a resolution within three days.

I recently had the misfortune of dealing with Lululemon's customer service, and it was a complete disappointment. For a brand that prides itself on quality and excellence, their customer service fell far short of expectations.I simply wanted to modify the size of an order I had placed a 1.20hr ago, but the representatives I spoke with seemed utterly incompetent. Despite explaining my situation clearly, they offered no viable solutions and seemed unaware of basic customer service protocols. As someone who works in customer care myself, I was shocked by their lack of knowledge and willingness to help.What's even more frustrating is that the issue was entirely their fault to begin with. Due to their system limitations, I was unable to make the modification directly, yet they refused to take responsibility for their own shortcomings.Overall, my experience with Lululemon's customer service was nothing short of a nightmare. It's truly disheartening to see such a renowned brand fail so miserably in an aspect that is crucial for customer satisfaction. I certainly won't be recommending Lululemon to anyone based on this dreadful encounter.

Purchased eGift Cards for Christmas. My recipients did not receive the email and their email is not in their spam folders. You cannot contact anyone about it at lululemon. Their Virtual Chat is useless. I sent an email to lululemon without any reply. They should send the gift card codes to the purchaser automatically. I wasted good money on gift cards for some very special people. Never again.

They got rid of the regular 28" Fast & Free legging which was by far their best legging, and the other Lululemon bits I'd purchase as add-ons were just extras. With strong competitors like Alo, Tala and more, and poor sustainability commitments from Lulu, I'm just not sure I see the point of shopping here anymore.

I had a coupon code and placed a large order. One of my items (a pair of leggings) was not included in the package. I reached out and asked to be sent the leggings. They offered me a refund and told me I could reorder. When I asked if they could just send me the pair that I had ordered, they informed me that there were not enough leggings in inventory to send me the ordered ones, but I could get a refund and reorder them. The coupon code is no longer valid, so I would have had to pay full price for them. It does not make sense that they don't have enough leggings to send me the ones I ordered, but they do have enough for me to reorder them at full price.Also, my order arrived in two packages and when the first package arrived that was supposed to contain the leggings, I reached out to inform them that the item was not there. I was told it was coming in the second package, even though everything on my account and the packing slip indicated that the leggings should have been in the first package. The leggings were not in either package.

I finally saved up enough money to buy a Lululemon define jacket for my birthday. When i paid the 108 euros they suddenly cancelled my order and I’ve lost my money! I can’t afford to just “lose” 108 euros for 30 days. I think it is ridiculous that i could go ahead and pay for my order but they couldn’t tell me that the product was sold out. Never ordering here ever again!

Terrible experienceFirst time buyer from Lululemon to buy my wife a present. Could not have gone worse. Payment failed for 3 different credit cards with no explanation and no meaningful error code with which to contact Lululemon.Live chat would not deliver my messages so I tried to call them but closed on Black Friday Weekend?!?!?I had to email them. They reply from the Guest Education Centre - which makes it sound like they don't need to offer support because it is not their problem but rather something that is fixed by re-educating the user.Then they wanted me to print, redact, and send them my credit card statements with address.  Never have I been asked for this level of intrusive detail.  More importantly, my primary card is Wise and they don't even have such a statement with this information.  Is Lululemon not aware it is 2024 and credit card fraud can be avoided by in-app approvals?So they ignored me. I sent a few chasers.  No replies in days.  Never again lululemon.

I purchased an item I store at Bicester, when I got home the security tag was still on. Contacted Livechat Lululemon. They advised that I could take it back to the store to get the tag removed. I advised that would be a 7 hour round trip. They arranged for me to drop the item off at a UPS pick up point, an hour round trip. They received my item back 3 weeks ago and they still can’t tell me when I will receive my item. Customer services are extremely unhelpful. I have requested an escalation, it took me half an hour for the CS person to agree. Still no further forward. Outrageous retail business.

Lululemon has made significant changes to their policies over the last year. During this transition the lululemon would allow a customer to use a gift card with a sweat collective discount. Whenever a sale item is returned its refunded to a gift card. These returns add up so my gift card size was around 300 USD. While checking out my discount and gift cards were accepted and I was shown the correct total. Reviewing my bank statement lululemon charged me a completely different amount and removed my gift cards from the order. A representative on chat admitted to their new policy change as well as the gift cards removal. I felt very uncomfortable with this type of corporate behavior. I’ve been a loyal customer for years. Since then I have stopped shopping at this greedy place all together. Their quality going down hill as prices are hiked up paired with these awful new policies has driven me far far away.

Poor customer service. Placed an order the other day, payment still says "pending" even though I need the order to arrive by the 13th. 5 day turnaround on email responses, and no one bothers answering their live chat.

I ordered items from online. They got the address wrong and 1 item went missing or was left in the wrong place. I contacted the customer service team and they promised a response. Its now almost 2 weeks and still no response. Terrible and unprofessional service!!. Its too late now for me to get a replacement as the item is unavailable!

I am very disappointed in Lululemon. I did an online chat to change my shipping address to an order I had placed 90 mins previously. I was informed that the request had been put in. They couldn’t confirm the change of address and my package was delivered to the original address that I had tried to change. Such poor service. I will not be ordering from here again

I purchased a crop singlet top for my wife online. My wife did not want a crop style and therefore we repackaged the item and returned it in accordance with lululemon instructions. The singlet had not even been tried on! Lululemon claimed that the item was dirty/marked and refused to refund for the return! The singlet was not dirty/marked when we packaged and returned it so if it was dirty this could have only occurred in transit or when opened by lululemon. Do not buy from this company!!

This is a listed company that had the worst mobile shopping experience, aren’t they embarrassed? They didn’t have an auto confirm field to check my address has the a correct postal code. Are you kidding me? Then I found online chat live person to say she can only cancel the order but can’t change my shipping postal code. I told her I’ll take my chance then because it doesn’t seem right they have a customer rep for these things she can only void the transaction so I can reorder after. She also said the transaction will likely be cancelled at some point …Being a Canadian buyer and watching them become a listed company and they can’t even get their own shipping right!! making too much money and can’t give a care about it.My package ended up to a random house that shared that postal code. There must be at least 50 houses with that same postal code, they randomly dropped off to one of them, not even the one that has the same building number as my address! That is totally out of whack that you hired such lame delivery operation in Canada!

T-shirt necklace shriveled after two washes. Asked for support/exchange/refund.Told that because it had been stored on a hanger, they wouldn’t help as it’s improper storage.Literally sold to me off a hanger in the store.

Terrible customer service experience. Purchased two pairs of ABC pants in store. One didn’t work out so I went to exchange and was told I had to email their store (Carlsbad, CA). Yes, email the store I was actually standing in. I played along and did just that. After two weeks, no reply. I emailed their corporate email and two weeks later, nothing. I guess if they just ignore customers everything will be just fine? I wish I could run my company like this and still have throngs buying product! Horrible!

They are hypocrites. I have a gift card and learned after shopping for a while and selecting a few things I really liked on their “Like New” website that they don’t accept gift cards for those clothes. So they don’t want their clothes to be sent to land fills, but they’ll limit how you can make the purchase. You already have the money and I could have taken some things out of the extra inventory!

Had leggings with a material issue. Took over 3 months for them to offer to replace but they couldn’t offer the same product! I would have been happy with a discount on my next purchase. They wanted me to send them back on my dime, run around printing stuff out and finding packaging just f&ck off. You sold me the defective product!!!

I went to place an order tonight despite reading the bad reviews I thought I would give the company a try. It went wrong when placing my order. I tried using the blue light discount code and it would not accept it. Why offer discount if you can’t fulfil it !!! I will not be ordering from you has it’s gone from the start

The worst Christmas I have ever had in 50 years. I got my daughter a gift card and I’m literally sitting here by my tree. Looking like what’s hell happen. No card. No apologies. No emails. Nothing. They don’t even answer or reply to there messages. The worst company to deal with is “LULULEMON” … one star is way too much

Similiar to others, I purchased an item online, email indicated that it will be delivered by UPS on Thursday, however, I was home all day and the items never arrived. I later checked with customer service, apparently the item was delivered to a UPS pick-up centre quite far from me. Customer service told me to check the tracking in the future, not sure how that is going to help if UPS never attempted to deliver to my place in the first place. So disappointing, I would avoid buying online from now on.
Well the quality is appalling I’ve had them for not so long my sweaty Betty leggings haven’t even got a single bobble on them guys don’t waste your money on bad quality

I returned an item from an order. I received a text at the ups store after using the label in the bagThe label given cannot be tracked and Lululemon are now saying they cannot do anything about this…. So I’m £66 down.I’m hoping PayPal can help me

Customer service is terrible, do not help and send the same replies over and over. They don’t even acknowledge the issue just try to fob you off when their products are faulty. I will never order from them again after the customer service I’ve had. Quality of the items is not worth the price either.

I bought an overpriced yoga top for my wife's birthday. 24 hour delivery. Day 3 a twee message saying "We're running a little late". 7 days later... zilch. Get the basics right and forget the other nonsense.

They couldn’t fulfill my online orders. They will have you waited 10 days for the waiting timeline to lapse but it will never get shipped! It says that “awaiting for carrier pick up” but it won’t move and just ended up nothing. When the 10 days comes, there’s no stock anymore! This happened to me 3 orders in a row!
Embarrassing quality for the price. Leggins show signs of wear after 1 wash, pilling, threads sticking out, and logo on the back coming off. AND SO EXPENSIVE!

I've always thought their leggings were overpriced and only moderate quality, but their yoga bras and yoga accessories are really good and actually worth the spend. But only if they arrive! For some reason this company delivers with UPS. UPS emailed me on a Thursday to say they'd be delivering Friday and a signature was required. Suddenly, mid day on Thursday, the order was marked as delivered, with no photo or signature. It tooks multiple days contacting Lululemon to actually speak to someone who could help. I provided screenshots, I asked multiple times if they would provide me evidence of delivery like the signature, and instead was just told I'd be refunded - but in future there can't be any refunds for order sent to my flat. UPS has obviously lost/stolen my package and this company has tried to blame me for it. Terrible customer service, whereas I've always had incredible service from their competitors like Sweaty Betty.

Racist and uncaring customer service reps, portal issues. Inability to cancel orders within the hour. Copy and paste customer service GEC is a joke. The products have defects and flaws like loose strings or all out quality issues such as seams that are not stitched straight, wasp attitudes for items when an issue is brought up, they nitpick returns which they resell to the outlet anyway. Items that are easily over 150 bucks to have that much drama and baggage when you deal with them is a hard pass and ridiculous. My last interaction at Robson in Vancouver which is their flagship founder store dealing with a racist store customer agent and her manager was the last straw I won’t be shopping at this retailer ever again. All they have is customer service they can’t really compete on anything else their products are not even the same quality they used to be mostly outsourced work and down the tubes. Their classes and memberships are a rip off clearly these folks grew too fast and are now the titanic just hours before hitting the ice berg. I would NOT recommend them to anyone that I know.

Bought many leggings and sports bras from lulu over the last few years. The last few ones were not great quality, but I really enjoyed some of the styles and how comfortable they were, so I tried to ignore it. Purchased my last pair of leggings a few months ago. There appeared to be a lot of pilling after the first wash (regardless of me following the washing instructions). I contacted customer support 3months ago, they advised me to fill in a form, which I did, received an email from the quality team highlighting that it will take them up to 2 weeks to investigate the quality issue. A month passed - nothing, so I contacted customer support again. They advised me that someone will be in touch within 5 working days, which of course - never happened. I contacted them at least 4 more times until I just had to file a complaint, which is clearly useless as well. Not only am I shocked that you get primark quality when you pay £110 for a pair of leggings, but also that the quality team does not exist, which should be their first priority given how many quality issues they have.Disgusted with experience and will never be purchasing anything from lulu’s again. Alo and a few other brands are my new go to’s

I ordered a water bottle from Lululemon and was charged £48. When the item arrived it had a price tag of &£38 on it. I attended the store and also saw the bottle price was £38. I contacted Lululemon and was advised via a chat service to send a photo of the price tag attached to the bottle so that I could be refunded the £10 additional I had been charged. When I emailed the bottle I was told that I would not be refunded the £10. They said because i had been given a welcome discount code for 10% off the bottle this meant I was not able to have the £10 refunded to me. I have been charged £10 extra for a water bottle whether the discount was applied or not. The welcome code would have been applied to the correct £38 price as well. They are overcharging customers and their customer service is appalling. Will never purchase from this company again :(

Lulu Lemon sold and charged a $200 gift card to my boyfriend. When I went to use the gift card they said it had a $0 balance, even though I have never used it before. I paid for the clothes with my own money and the sales person said she would refund me the money if I came back with proof of purchase of the gift card. I came back with proof of purchase, only for her to say that she couldn't refund me and put the balance on my gift card. I called customer service and they did not resolve the issue for me whatsoever! Very unhelpful especially because the person was charged the $200 and lulu did nothing about it. Just scamming people of their money

Very poor company. Ordered 13 October - 2-3 days delivery - wanted for my holiday. Took my money very quickly. But Didn’t arrive  on time. When it finally arrived message said it had to be ‘re-routed’.  Then although ordered from lululemon UK they sent a size US 6 trainer. So didn’t even bother opening. Couldn’t return anywhere nearby - had to travel 50 minutes in the car - then they didn’t take returns because they were an ‘outlet.’Nightmare trying to return and get in touch with customer service - links to returns didn’t work. Eventually got through to a chat and they emailed a label. Then the post office a several parcel stores did not take UPS. Had to travel from central City if liverpool to north - another twenty five minutes to get a shop that would take the parcel. Will never buy from them again! Fool if you do. I hope they are as quick to return my money as they were to take it!
Tried to order a evoucher but system kept refusing my card. Tried 3 separate cards and still hadn’t worked. Had to go through a third party so I had something to gift.Absolute nuisance

I placed a fairly large order with lululemon ($659.14)The order was split in two packages. I received one and not the second one. I reached out to Lululemon explaining my issue and they were kind enough to offer me a refund. This was on oct 27. WE ARE NOW 3 WEEKS LATER AND THEY STILL HAVEN'T GIVEN ME A REFUND FOR THE ITEMS IM MISSING.I HAVE AN EMAIL THREAD AS PROOF.

Ordered a hoodie for my daughter, it hasn’t shown up, and I now have to wait a further 10 days for delivery. I had 15% off when I first ordered the hoodie but when I went to reorder my discount is invalid for no reason… I’ve unsubscribed and went to Sweaty Betty, much better clothing and better delivery service

I have been trying for several months to get damaged item support. I went through your website and filled out the form to get a ticket number. I waited several months before I ever received a reply. When I did I was asked for a photo of the round dot with the product info. I sent that on May 18th. Today is June 20th and I still haven’t received a response. I think it’s disgusting that it has been 6 months trying to get a hold of someone to get my item replaced when the warranty for the product has not been met

This is not a review of their products, which I think are great, if a little pricey. But of their online ordering system. You would expect a high end retailer to invest in a good customer service system, but LuluLemon seems to think this is a waste of time and money. Orders taken but not acknowleged. Complete absence of records of my orders on my account in their website. Complete absence of any communication on the processing of orders. Requirement for a cancellation to be done in 60 minutes of the order, but the online cancellation function does not work, and the customer service numbers seem to operate fewer hours than RMT train drivers. Once orders are packaged, the tracking system on their website is permanently "temporarily unavailable". Online chat people only apologize, but won't do anything to sort any of the problems. Only that they "promise to pass back your feedback"
Someone stole my card details and made purchases on this site.  Despite contacting customer service to block the transaction, the money was withdrawn.

January bought a pair of lululemon leggings and a pair of high-rise legging shorts. Four months later they look very worn with little knubs all over them.  I took them back to the store and talked to the manager about how they have worn. Basically, she said that is not covered under our warranty.  My response was, I can go to Walmart and buy a pair of leggings that would last 10x longer than yours.  Why would I spend this outrageous amount of money for your brand. My experience was not good.  I will no longer shop there!!!

My experience differs from other reviewers as I had no problems with lululemon and everything went by smoothly, however I will be much more careful in the future after reading all of these negative reviews.
Yes wish there could be zero stars.  I am bombarded by emails, tried to unsubscribe, no obvious links and online chat pointless.  I really want out of this.  How do I unsubscribe???

My first order was marked as shipped and never left the warehouse. I had to fight for a refund. The next order was the wrong length. I went to a store and they said they were shipping me a replacement. The next day, the order was cancelled. As it was paid from an educator issued gift card I didn’t get a refund on my credit card, they just did nothing. In both cases, I had to fight for a refund.

“The online service is absolutely horrible. Horrible. Horrible. Horrible." - Lululemon Store Leader, Columbus Ohio…one of Lululemon’s own store leaders said it best!As a long-time admirer of lululemon, it pains me to say that my recent experiences have tarnished my perception of the brand. What was once perceived as a symbol of excellence in quality and customer service now appears to be a facade deteriorating due to disregard and disinterest.Quality issues have become alarmingly prevalent, with representatives admitting to a backlog in addressing customer concerns under their Quality Promise. Waiting up to 15 business days, or perhaps more, for a response hardly reflects a commitment to customer satisfaction. It's disheartening to learn that their quality queue is inundated with cases.Equally disappointing is the apparent reluctance of senior leaders to engage with customer feedback (i.e., respond via phone call, as requested). Despite attempts to communicate concerns, it seems that some voices are actively suppressed. Being apparently blocked via email by senior leaders like Sun Choe, Chief Product Officer, and Nikki Neuburger, Chief Brand Officer, speaks volumes about their receptiveness to constructive feedback and their dedication to customer service.Even attempting to escalate matters through traditional channels proves pointless, as contacting a supervisor or manager via customer service yields the dismissive response, "we don't do transfers." Such a stance only reinforces the impression that customer satisfaction is low on their list of priorities.In light of these revelations, I urge others to come forward and share their experiences and feedback, despite Lululemon's apparent attempts to shut out valuable voices.
Parcel was delivered to a random shop instead of my flat. Customer service said I need to create an account with UPS and it’s nothing to do with them.

They asked for a review for a product that has not even shipped. When I asked them where the product was a chatbot told me that it was being shipped. Fact is it has not left the warehouse despite being ordered almost a week ago. This is the 3rd time I have ordered product that was not delivered. Great product but very poor customer service.

I was an avid shopper of Lululemon.  An item I really liked was the STILL PANT.  I work in healthcare and they were of good quality.  This was 5 years ago or so.  Recently, I decided to replenish some items and went to the store to purchase.  Much to my dismay, I was appalled at the quality of the clothes.  I was told they have changed to a new material, Nuprene, I think it’s called.  Has this company grown so much that the quality and design has taken a downward spiral?  I did not buy anything and walked out.  I will not shop here again.  I’m sad that greed and production has taken over.  Now I search for another line that will provide quality over quantity.  It’s like companies like Adidas, Nike, etc.  once they’ve established a persona you now are paying for a logo, not actually quality merchandise.  Lululemon is now a dime a dozen garbage.  Thanks for reading.

I very rarely take time to write reviews, so this shows how dissapointing this service has been. My parcel never arrived and lululemon took weeks with the investigation and had very poor customer service in the process. Completely unacceptable for this price range
Customer service is lacking. Took me three chats to get a price adjustment via an egift card. Fairly long wait each time.

Worst company ever. TWICE I tried to place an order. The first time it got cancelled because the item was out of stock. The second time it said it shipped but just sat in the warehouse. So when I called to check on it, they said there was probably a system error and cancelled my order!!! This is the second time I lost my order because the item was out of stock again!! I will NEVER purchase from them again.
ordered 24Nov, shipped 1 dec, its now 11th dec and they DONT CARE. I can see the parcel was last in Manchester sorting depot - but they wont reship or do anything useful for me!  DONT BUY THIS BRAND

I reached out to their customer service since several packages in a row were delivered late, one being a birthday gift and one that was supposed to be delivered before I left town. Since it wasn't delivered before I left, I would've missed the return date if it didn’t fit. I was informed that although every online order I've made gives an "arrives by" date, that date is actually an estimated delivery date and not a guarantee. The response to my frustration was that shipping is 2-6 business days and they'd pass along my frustrations. Of course, since those emails several weeks ago, it still says "arrives by" when ordering. I think the website is incredibly misleading and the customer service was useless and bordering on rude. If the shipping is 2-6 business days, there should be a range of delivery dates with the "arrives by" date being the latest of the range. For such expensive clothing, I was expecting a higher class of customer service. They clearly just want to make money and don't actually value customer satisfaction. I definitely would not want to support such a company.

Horrible customer service (saf from instagram and eldwaldo via email) I ordered an item online as a gift for a relative. The relative decided they did not want it so I initiated a return online. The directions indicated to either 1. Print the label and drop off at a FedEx location or 2. Print the label and drop off in store. As my relative lives close to the store in Halifax NS (Halifax shopping centre location), she offered to drop it off. I do not live close to a store nor close to my relative. When she did go to the store, the lululemon store refused to put the money back on my credit card as she did not physically have the card. It was not indicated anywhere during the online return that she had to physically have my card in order to fully process the transaction.  Instead, they gave her a gift card for the value which I do not want. I want the refund back on my card but am now stuck with a gift card I will not use and cannot return. I contacted customer service via email and instagram who were both absolutely unhelpful and condescending  (saf on instagram and elwaldo via email). Lululemon, you have horrible customer service and as an aside, stop calling your employees educators. You sell overpriced poor quality clothes. You're not educating anyone.
Reviewed a yoga mat, overall positive (4/5) with two minor issues. Literate and polite and honest. The review was rejected from the Lululemon website.drjwr
Just wanted to say I hate yiu guys. I'm watching pay TV on yahoo and saw yiur ad. Now. I'd never buy anything from you ever.Sod off
the clothes are so comfartble and they last for year. I love shopping here.
Superb customer service advises you when you will receive item - excellent quality - pay for exactly this 5 star quality and service
product is not made well, with poor fabric and design.  I just don't like these leggings, saggy after few washes and the logo also white out.
Rubbish service and delivery. No reply on my order. I want a full refund as this item has not been delivered

Do not order online with lululemon. This is the second time I have ordere, and the delivery has taken a ridiculous length of time to arrive. I placed my order for a very expensive item of clothing on Friday the 13th of October - it is now the 23rd. 10 days later and no contact, and no order. I reached out on Thursday the 19th, and was told to get back in touch at the end of the day on Friday the 20th. When I did, their lines were closed. I have just been on a live chat with a girl who told me that my item was 'still within standard business day delivery' - then said later that she mistook the 8 for a 3 and that Royal Mail had an issue. I was never told about this, and when I expressed my concerns to the assistant, she told me that I was expected to get in touch with lululemon if my order doesn't arrive within 3-5 business days. I did this on Thursday the 19th - exactly within this time frame - and was told to come back another day when their lines were closed. When I told the assistant this she said that 'I ended the chat', seemingly implying that this was my fault... I am appalled at this poor customer service. The assistant did not help, just kept saying 'it is on it's way'. I should really hope so given that I've already waited 10 days and now have to wait another 2. Really frustrated with this and do not like their attitude and lack of help/contact.
Excellent, Thanks very much💚
