Another… “this used to be my favorite brand”! What happened to this company and to the product?? My all time favorite leggings were the Wunder Under Luon material… the cottony material was so comfortable, never rolled at the waist and was warm in the winter and cool in the summer. They applied just enough compression, but not so much that you felt like you couldn’t breathe. Best leggings ever. Me and my girls (a group of 15) have all boycotted Lululemon… however, we still stop in periodically to laugh at the prices, and to see and hope that one day we might just find the wunder under luon leggings.The slicker versions they now have all roll at the waist… the luon material stays put.I do enjoy the align leggings, soft and buttery, but good for nothing aside from lounging. They show EVERY FLAW… no compression whatsoever. I’ve also tried all of the “new” versions and none are comfortable. People who now buy this brand are just buying it cause they think the name matters. What a waste. If they want to see what the public wants, bring some real people on board to test and rate your products. I’ll do it for free!Just can’t figure out why so many companies have to go and change items that are so great. Why not keep staple items and materials available. I’d buy a 100 pairs of the old style if they were still available.
This is the worst company ever!!! They take your money, cancel your order and don’t care AT ALL about your experience. Never again will I order there

I bought a License to train tank. I paid £45.00 and wore it once to the gym. I came home and noticed pulls on the material. This is workout gear and it should stand up to more than one work out. Poor quality and would not buy again and would not recommend. Just fit for the garbage can. One very expensive workout!!

I am reviewing Lululemon as this is the SECOND incident with the same answers and exact same type of negative transaction. On both occasions, one being in Feb 2023 and one today Sept 26, 2023. I purchased an item and it has been "waiting carrier pickup" for six days now. I have now called customer service three times and have had such frustrating answers. You cannot speak to anybody in management for three days, They give you a gift card but then they tell you to cancel the item and re-order it and hopefully, you might get it as inventory is low. I cannot use the gift card as that could take another one to three days for processing. Sure, so I should lay out the full amount again and then be left with a card to use. Perhaps I do not want to buy from them again. When asked to have the agent call T force delivery and follow up on my package, the reply was we can't do that. I took my time to call to find out that Lululemon ships it via a third party to TForce. I was also told by Lululemon, that there could be an issue with inventory. Well, they took my money! I also ordered a jacket, they took that money as well and then canceled that order saying no stock. Well, the next day I go online, and magic, again that jacket appears. So, I order it again, and within one day I get a notice of carrier pickup and delivery date for this Friday. What is going on with Lululemon. Their customer service doesn't work with agents working from home and no outside access to get answers in a timely manner. Considering the prices, they need serious improvements in the service.

After recommended by a few friends, I shopped from Lululemon website a couple weeks ago, were amazed by their products. Even it's more pricey than other similar products on the market, I think it was worth it for the quality.Yesterday I passed their shop in London Canary Wharf and decided to have a quick browse, in the end also got a flare trousers (sale item) from the shop. I was rushing in and out for 5mins as needed to go back to the office with the impression to try them on at home. I wasn't informed the sales item cannot be refunded or exchanged during the purchase. Little did I know, the trousers were too long for me, so I went back during lunchtime today. One staff told me about the policy and she was going back and forth about the policy without hearing my explanation and showing even tiny bit of sympathy. She said there is literally nothing she can do to help me (which was wrong, apparently you could alter the length of the trousers). I escalated it to the manager who had even worse attitude. Anyway, again he said nothing I can help you with then walked off. I mentioned are you literally just gonna walk off in the middle of the conversation? Can I please escalate in any way or record your name so I can mention this when I speak to someone? He then called security to the shop. I explained everything to the security team and they fully understood my situation, the manager refused to come out from his office, another staff mentioned about altering idea which resolved the problem in the end. I was so shocked with the service I received. I didn't even want to step to the shop again, the lady who offered me altering the trousers said she will get them delivered so I don't need to go in anymore which was a relief.It shocks me that someone who has lack of interpersonal and basic communication skills can manage a store... What a horrible experience!
The worst company ever!! It takes them at least 5 days to reply and they just come with apologies not even an answer to the question... I wouldnt order if I were you.
good customer service everything went smoothly
The sport bras pill easily after a few wear. Not worth the hype and price.
Their online return system doesn’t work and doesn’t allow usps returns

DO NOT ORDER FROM LULULEMON!!I made an order on January 18th, apparently I had not put in my street number in the order (impossible but there was no way to go back and check as I checked out as a guest); couple of days later I check the tracking from UPS which said that my order was on its way. After a week passed I started to worry because I hadn’t received my order yet and decided to contact UPS to follow up on my order. This was on Friday January 27th- already 9 days since I have placed the order. UPS said that they were missing the number from my street and for this reason they have not made the delivery already. I was shocked because first of all no one from the Lululemon customer service team contacted to ask for my house number so the delivery could be made. Anyways after UPS took my house number they told me that they would be delivering on Monday. I call today and UPS told me that they are cancelling and returning my order and that I should get in touch with the lululemon customer service. What??? No one from their customer service team called me to fix this, I had to chase the order, the order had a fake message for a long time saying that it was on the way to my house and they make the change and say that they will deliver and 2 days later they said that they cancel the order and will be refunding me??? On top of everything I have to now wait to receive the refund and go through the hassle or re ordering again- which I I’ll not as it is clear that this company doesn’t have a customer service team!!! This entire experience has made me very angry and made me waste a lot of time.

I purchased a poor quality, inaccurate sizing, unattractive colour and badly fitting jacket, Unfortunately, Lululemon does not allow me to post a negative review under the excuse of “not following community/website guidelines”. My review was honest and respectful, despite being reworded three times, still rejected/moderated which unfortunately makes me think that the company does not allow negative reviews and products ratings are deliberately skewed upwards.

Package never delivered, customer service incredibly unhelpful, contacted them multiple times to assist as ups were not delivering the package , package was sent back to Lululemon by UPS without a delivery attempt, Lululemon still haven't provided a refund
Good activewear

I received a gift card for my birthday upon trying to use it to make a purchase it says oops something went wrong went to speak with a customer service representative and they were giving me the run around telling me that a special team will reach out to me and i know that it is a lie and telling me to reply to an email i never received and i know that they outsourced there customer service to third world countries like Jamaica and so on lululemon is a fraud and a thief.
I ordered a scuba half zip sweatshirt and never received it!!! NOT HAPPY…
Returned after 1 day of use, low quality pants.
Great quality clothing -
I am absolutely shocked by the customer service i have never since such an incompetent customer service
Brilliant in every way

Cancelling the order without any notice. Impolite and unprofessional customer service. Worst customer service and shopping experience ever.
Absolutely horrible customer service in every respect. It is really unbelievable.
Great experience and great customer service.
Firing employees for defending your store? 🤣🤡
IT IS SCAM.Don't waste your money.

Lululemon recently sold my daughter an e-gift card that doesn't work.  When they were told about the problem, they demanded my billing information, since I received the gift card.  They refuse to look into it unless I hand over my credit card info.  I have supported them for 30 years but they are now fraudulently selling e-gift cards and refusing to honor them.

Order never changed to shipped, though went to a shipping company.  After 8 days status never changed.  Finally got a hold of customer service and said the order is stuck in label. and your order is outside our shipping timeline. No explanation and didn't offer anything other than refund.  The order email said it was guaranteed and I asked and they said it would be refunded.  Just horrible response and not enough to make me buy there any more.  Telling my daughter buy at own risk.

Extremely awful customer service, shocking email response and rude staff. How they are still operating I don’t know. Shop with Sweaty Betty, much better experience and customer services. Even lululemon in store staff are rude, no idea where they hire these people from

If no stars were available it’d be more accurate. They STILL haven’t responded to my missing package complaint from a week ago after oromising in writing to get back to me within 4 days. The purchase was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. Way to break a little girl’s heart- no cool Lululemon, not cool….

Bad experience. Extremely pricy products but tolerant as a state official, if you are a few days over the change timeline. Any DIY store is more customer friendly. This has nothing to do with Yoga or Community. This is pure capitalism and a rip off in the Ende.

I don’t want to give Lululemon customer service one star as there is no service, but there is no lesser option. I placed my order on the 1st December, was told it was on its way and then received an email on 14th December saying wrong address. Impossible to get hold of anyone at Lululemon - tried web chat, email and phone. After waiting on the phone for 40 minutes on the third attempt, I finally got through having listened to their mood music and blurb about how we should all be nice to each other. The “educator” said my order had indeed been returned even though the address was correct,  that it could not now be sent out in time for Xmas and so she would issue a refund. When I started to complain about the poor service, the “educator” in question said that no one wanted to work in retail and put the phone down. I will NEVER buy from them again.

Absolutely terrible customer service infact it doesn't exist.   Ypu can't talk to a real person and ypu can only write an email with a response that could take 3 to 4 days.  The delivery ticket has said waiting to be picked up for a week now and their website promised xmas delivery...I will never buy from them again
Great quality and as described. Ive used them for years and the life span of the products makes the items well worth the cost.

If I could give less that 1 star I would. Will certainly never order from them again - numerous emails saying that my parcel is with UPS and that address is incorrect and needs changing with sender......have been trying to contact them for weeks, no one ever picks up. Truly dreadful customer service.

Horrible cs.. fix up!!!! I placed an order for pickup for a jacket that was only in stock in the size needed  30 mins away. Received a confirmation email that it would be ready in 24 hours. Called the next day for a status update, waited 25 mins to get through only to be told that it’s still in the processing phase and It would take 6-8 days to process, which I didn’t understand since it was a pickup.  So I hung up and contacted the store directly but couldn’t get through. The following day received an email that my order was cancelled with no explanation. So frustrated at this point, I called their cs # and yet again waiting over 40 mins before hanging up. I reached out via video chat and got through promptly. Agent I spoke to this time around was pleasant, but she couldn’t give reason why my order was cancelled given that that location the order dropped was still showing stock.  This jacket is a Christmas gift for my daughter, the only thing she really wants, so I will end up going in store to purchase it, but I will absolutely not be supporting this company again. Great clothing just terrible service, Not worth the hassle!!!!

Both online and in-store experience were absolutely awful. I've been a loyal customer to Lululemon for years. This year mark the end of it, I can't understand how to still have customer after how they treat them. I've been contacting GEC chat multiple times, seriously got the chat closed to my face AT LEAST 30 times. 1. Ive never been disrespectful and 2. I was not AFK. They politely tell you to f*** off and close the chat without providing any assistance if they don't have an right-away copy/paste sentence to answer your question. GEC resolution team is just as bad as chat service. In 7 emails I have not received any useful feedback or assistance; again they send copy/paste paragraph. In a year i've bought over 10 pairs of leggings, two outdoor jacket, 7 joggers and multiple bras. Not a single item is still in good condition. Jackets are pilling like crazy inside, all my joggers waistband are folded in half and don't hold anything, leggings are all pilling as well, sport bras straps are now loose and i'm 32A, not 36DD. To me this is a MAJOR QUALITY ISSUE. However don't think of reaching out asking for assistance with a quality issue, they will ignore you, don't assist if they do respond and you will waste your time. I also had an employee telling me on the chat (transcription saved for reference) to hire a lawyer to contact Lululemon. In-store experience was just as terrible, i've been told my the sale representative that Lululemon never sold any Align in 28" and to go shop somewhere else after I politely said I was looking for the lenght 28" and couldnt find it on their shelves. (I have 4 pairs in Align 28 at home...) I've been waiting for over 6 months for resolution, still none. I never receive the promised gift card Resolution team told me I would receive for all the trouble and bad experience. Last correspondence after months of not receiving a reply was "Oh we can't locate the mention of gift card." Do yourself a favor and go shop somewhere else. Lululemon is now just a name, there's absolutely no reason to pay a high-end price for this cheap quality and awful customer service.

Placed an order with them  a week ago to receive confirmation the product has been delivered. Received a delivery confirmation in Dutch but nothing delivered. Emailed and called yet no response. Do not order
Poor customer service and the quality of the product is sliding downhill. Do they even remember what is business integrity?

Contacted the Lululemon customer service re a product I recently purchased which was defective and was told they are too busy with Xmas sales, but I should check back in the new year, when they may have time to address the situation ...... is this what you pay top $ for? Lousy product quality and even worse customer service.

If i could give 0 stars I would have. Unbelievable how lululemon has one of the worst customer service online I have ever experienced. USPS obviously lost my package because I never received it and tracking from USPS stopped updating on 12/7. I placed my ordered on 11/21 and I have no refund or package. Their online chat is a joke. First, no one was available to chat waited for over an hour. Second time, Christian wanted me to wait and see if it would arrive and contact them on 12/13 if it hadn’t arrived. Lastly, contacted them again and they wanted to “trace” the package. I requested an immediate refund and was denied. NEVER will I order from lululemon online or in store. Poor customer service !!!

Lululemon sent me three ladies items including a bra when, in fact, I ordered to items for a man!  I tried to call, email and live chat - all with no success!  I returned items received 5/12 and still have had no communication re. my refund.    This must be the worst online shopping experience I have ever had.  I would never order or shop from Lululemon ever again!
Never hear back from customer service. Appalling customer care

My order experience has been horrible.  The first order I placed, I was sent the wrong item and after contacting customer service I was told the right item could was no longer in inventory.  I shipped the wrong item back and received a full refund.  I tried again placing a second order.  After not receiving any notification regarding shipment, I reached out to customer service for an update and never received a response.  Fifteen days after placing my order and still not receiving any communication other than an order confirmation email, I called to inquire about the status.  I sat on hold for 30-45 minutes waiting to speak with an agent.  The agent could not find any information in the system so a case was opened.  Later that day, I received an email update stating my order had been canceled due to inventory issues and apologized for the inconvenience.  The experience ordering has been horrible, the communication has been horrible and all the way around has left a bad taste in my mouth for product I was beginning to really love.  I'm so disappointed.  Just terrible.  Avoid

Exactly the same experience  as the previous reviewersNo customer service whatsoever,  ordered item 27/11/22 still not arrived. UPS site not updated . They also reported the wrong address had been put on label by the company although I supplied my correct home address. I have called 6 times emailed 7 times with absolutely no response whatsoever. It is shameful. Live chat never responds. UPS I have called 6 times .I suspect they have a crate full of lululemon misaddressed packages .I just want a refund but since I cannot contact them how is this ever to be achived ???They are a disgrace and I advise anyone NOT to order from them on line .
Customer service was patient and sat with me for over an hour as my internet was not working. Products have lasted and are set at reasonable prices.
Loved my new trackpants. They're stretchy but not too heavy so I can wear them in the summer no problem.

Terrible, terrible customer service. As a fellow Canadian and a lover of Lululemon, my opinion of the brand has forever changed after my horrible experience with customer service at Lululemon EU. No responses to chats, no responses to email, refund has not been issued, products on the website are cancelled. Overall, one of the worst online shopping experiences ever.

Awful experience, order never arrived, no refund, avoid. I spent an hour trying to speak to customer services without success. Sent two emails and no reply. Called UPS twice to update delivery address as they had incorrect details and still no delivery.

Do not shop with lululemon especially online. I was a long time loyal fan of the brand, my recent experience completely changed how I feel about them - to be fair I can’t say if this is the same in North America but in Asia, Hong Kong in particular, it is awful and does not live up to its brand value and integrity at all!I placed an order on Nov 26, received on Nov 29 - immediately I noticed that the item looked different than what I ordered (logo on waist instead of leg, and missing waist key string). I emailed them immediately on the issue, no response.Got in touch with them on Dec 2, GEC educator confirmed that the logo shouldn’t be there and assured me they will send a replacement. Few days later I still haven’t heard from them, I got in rock with them again and another GEC educator confirmed that they are working on it and a “replacement be be sent soon”. A week later I received an emailed that says that they won’t be sending it because what I received is indeed the item, despite that I had attached pictures of the discrepancy. I believe what happened was I received a random piece of legging with the tag of what I ordered, and their response is either 1) ignore 2) admit and assure to send a replacement 3) deny completely and back track whats been said.Just unbelievable and unacceptable for so call high end athleisure brand, from this onwards I will never purchase from this brand ever again. Much better experience and products at alo or sweaty Betty, most importantly this experience shows that lululemon is not a brand with integrity.

The order edit and return policies are terrible. I received someone else’s order which included their name, address, email, & phone on the order slip. It took me FOUR hours to finally get a person to talk to. I have to reorder the pants I didn’t receive and wait for a refund to be issued. I was instructed to call customer service again in a week to see if the remainder of my order has been processed so I can again ask for a refund of the item I never received. I have had several horrendous experiences with Lululemon. This will be my last.

Never received my order that was placed on the 25 of November. It got to UPS and UPS kept emailing me that it was due for delivery but everyday they would email me to postpone delivery to the next day until finally two days ago they sent me congratulations your parcel had been shipped but to where? It was sent back to lululemon as they only included my name in the package. :) Also i have been calling lululemon everyday no one had answered me yet, i called and waited for 2 hours today but with no luck i was on hold the whole time. Please do not shop online from lululemon it is a scam they are not proffessional and with 0 morals. i will be shopping at ALO Yoga instead.

After wearing my Lulus for 3 years (my husband calls them stretchy pants) I ran into a rose bush and they had a hole. Went to store in KC. Asked about repairs and they replaced. Seriously. Seriously!  Amazing. Spent my new stretchy pant budget on lulu panties. Another great purchase.

Terrible customer service. My order has never arrived and I've tried every method - call, live chat and email and not been able to get through to anyone. I'm writing this having now waited 20 minutes on the phone with no one picking up. This company is terrible and if I could give it zero stars I would.

I was a regular customer of Lululemon, but after my recent experience, I think I will shop with Sweaty Betty instead. My online order has gone through twice, for some unknown reason and I have been charged twice. I tried to cancel one of the orders right away but it didn't work. I contacted them via chat, telephone and email, and no one has responded. I am now being sent the same order twice - which I will automatically return. But what a waste of time, delivery, money etc, when if they'd ACTUALLY PROVIDE SOME CUSTOMER SERVICE, it could have been cancelled right away and resolved. For the amount of money you spend, you expect good customer service, but Lululemon don't seem to have ANY!
Atrocious customer service!Call center does not respond. Chat does not respond either.Cannot follow up. How are they in business?

2nd time ordering from Lululemon UK, the address you input in the order doesn’t pull through in full so UPS have only limited info and have had to email me to find out my full address. I noticed this straight away and contacted lululemon, slow to respond and no offer to try and fix, I have to call UPS myself. Definitely last time I order from here.

The most horrendous service that anyone could imagine. I received a product in damaged condition and they agreed that I can return it but they make it impossible for me to return it by not providing me with a return shipping label despite their promises and refusing to communicate with me.

Ordered a jacket costing over £350 two weeks ago never arrived - received email 2 days ago from lululemon to advise it was at their warehouse did I still want it (?)) replied & no answer - Live chat doesn’t get answered you can’t speak to anyone over the phone - when you read the reviews it’s the same poor customer service issues - really disappointed
Never got my item sent 3 emails one respoce saying will come back to me never did !!
good quality stuff  perfect for gym and yoga

Not once but TWICE have they not refunded me after I have made a return. They owe me 200usd. It's IMPOSSIBLE to get the hold of them. Doesn't matter if you have the receipts or not they just ignore you.The first time I returned a pair of leggings in store, and after a month of no money back I returned to ask them and they couldn't help me and told me to reach out to the online reps, and the online reps just told me to go to the store... The second time, I returned my online purchase with their USPS label and the package got to their warehouse but didn't scan. I have called in twice and are still waiting for them to process that return. I'm one hundred percent certain that I will never see that money again.

As mentioned below, the online shopping experience and the customer service or reaching out to the customer service is impossible and an absolute joke. Ordered a couple of items. While ordering, it was difficult to actually pay for the item ( half of the address was cut off from the confirmation preview). Anyway, managed at the end. Then I was notified by UPS that the first line of the address is missing they are trying to resolve the issue. Not one phone call/ voicemail/ email or anything came from UPS or Lululemon trying to figure out the rest of the address- which I manually amended after having trouble ordering through PayPal. Anyway, 2 days went passed, nothing happened, so I attempted to live chat lululemon, apparently no “Educator” was available to help so I called. Yet still, I was not able to speak to anyone, it appears they were closed on this day( a random Monday, not a bank holiday) . So tried to contact UPS and help them update the address. If you've ordered via a 3rd party, they say you need to contact the company. So the next day tried again. Exactly the same experience. And they are closed again. Reached out to the only email address I could find which was apparently for the   North American customers. They would not forward the email or help me in any way unless I asked them to direct me on how to contact the UK customer service. I’ve been given a link - which is the most laughable. Anyway, apparently this is not the customer service they provide to guests :) and they’re transferring my refund back which they release immediately but MY BANK takes approx 10 working days to send it back to me. All makes sense lululemon… I swear, all positive reviews must be fixed here. I can not believe anyone had a positive experience with these people. Not mentioning UPS, they are just as bad …

I have always been a huge fan of the products from Lululemon with half of my wardrobe stocked with things from them. However, unless you are shopping in store, in which case, the experience has always been pleasant, do not bother. Their online shopping experience has been the complete opposite of what you get in store, for a luxurious brand. As many people have mentioned, the customer service is atrocious - a waste of time and useless. All they do is respond with generic copied, pasted answers advising that orders are still within their delivery guidelines, and if it does not arrive by then, to get back in touch and you start the whole thing again. I had multiple emails sent to me mentioning a delivery was meant to happen between certain hours on the day, stayed in and nothing was delivered. The same thing happened the next day, and when I called UPS, they advised to get in touch with Lululemon but surprise - customer service was completely useless. Avoid any online orders if you can, unless you are not fussed about waiting for awhile, and getting spammed with emails on a delivery for that day, only to receive nothing.

Very easy to reach the customer service team when I had an issue with my order, they were really helpful and responsive and patient with all my silly questions. Also the items themselves are so COMFORTABLE, definitely worth it!!

They advertise 25% discount for personal trainers,coaches, instructors, but then will do anything in their power to prevent you from getting verified by a 3rd party called Sheer ID. Emails to Lulu were not returned.To get qualified,I needed to provide 3 documents to get verified for a discount: 1- state ID ; 2-certificate of training; 3- proof of insurance as a trainer in the state where I live. I showed them documentation from a gvt website proving that you do not need insurance my state to be a coach/trainer. They said that was unacceptable with Lulu lemon to get a 25% discount. I then went on to purchase the $20 insurance for trainers in the state, even though it is not required by law, and sent the proof of insurance to them. now they're saying that I "Have not proved that I am the owner of the business" although I have a 1099 and am registered with the state with the business name under my name as the sole owner. They are truly incompetent and I question the level of education of the individual "Danica L "working at sheer ID.Edit: my mother in law started a running club a few years ago and had no requirements for insurance and got the 25% discount (indefinitely) with Lululemon through sheer ID and doesn't even run anymore! So to hold me accountable to provide innumerable documents for my business and ask me to get non required insurance for a clothing discount is insane !!
No minus stars available but Lululemon deserves that. Useless website, useless customer service, just useless.

Poor quality product snagged immediately. Been trying to get a refund for a month now. Cannot get a reply, keep asking for the same information I’ve already given, then waiting a week to reply to a message telling them I’ve already given them the information with another message requesting something different or doesn't exist. This company is an absolute joke, will not buy their products again.

Did not deliver on the day that they stated at the time of the purchase, reached out to online chat, asking for a tracking number, and find out that the order wasn't even shipped after 4 days after placing it, I called to cancel since wasn't delivered on time for my friends birthday. The customer help refused to cancel. How about that? They did not ship for 4 days and when I called it was still not shipped but they can't cancel it? I know it's a successful business but I can only imagine how many more customers they would get if they operated correctly, cause I am NEVER coming back to shop there, and I am sure there a lot of people who are on the same page as me after such an experience

I get unsolicited junk emails from LLL and there's no unsubscribe button in the email?  I email customer service and they tell me it will take thirty days to review my request???????  What's wrong with these people?

Still waiting for an order.They use UPS as a courier and they don’t even attempt to deliver my parcel to my home address. Just to a pick up point which is quite a distance from my home. Even when I arranged a redelivery the item was left at the pick up point. I’ve been told another 3-5 days to change the address on the order to delivery to my home. Which was the original delivery address in the first place! Very painful experience having to chase the order. Terrible experience.

We order surge joggers online with an in-store promo while at the store because they didn't have the size in stock.  We noticed that they entered the size incorrect after it processed.  When we asked to correct it, they said they couldn't do anything about it.  We would have to wait for the product to arrive at our home and return it but they can't guarantee they would have it in stock.  I tried chatting with an online representitive and recieve no help because they can only cancel orders within 60 min but can't reorder using a store promo!  what!  isn't this the same company

Made an order and it was never picked up from the warehouse for delivery. I had to call them on two separate occasions to find out they have no idea what happens in the warehouse and was refunded and told that even if I reorder there's a good chance of the same thing happening again. They have probably the worst customer service of any company in the US that I've interacted with and no control over their own warehouses. I was dumb enough to make a second order only to be sent an email a few days later that one of my 2 items is out of stock and won't be arriving and that shipping was delayed up to 9 more days (that's assuming it ships this time). From the way the support lady spoke, they know perfectly well that they have huge problems but they just don't care

Ordered two pairs of leggings online for £176 and order never received. Lululemon use UPS as their shipper and they say the address was incorrect because there was no house number, but we have a house name not number. The full correct address was provided.Lululemon are now refusing to provide a refund.

Do  not purchase from this brand!  If you need a return, prepare to be on hold 30 minutes. Need a label, unlike other stores that do this instantly, or include labels with package, they have to forward it. One day later, you hv to call again!  And wait and waitThey hv anti-racist gimmick on phone; clothing is made in Cambodia!  Factories there fair labor?  The price of a fleece jacket - $118!  I  Ordered this because of gift Request. PS, you’ll hv to walk to post office.; or go to FedEx. Style and quality worth price - NO!  Go elsewhere, hopefully with brands hiring American workers.

I am an upset customer they do make it difficult to return online so much so I just gave up but thank God I can still leave a review I am in my early 60x and  wanted to try out their line first I am disappointed in their inclusion where are the silver haired anyway in re to the long sleeve with stitching on outside as soon as it rubs against anything it pills so knapsacks beware overall it is not for me
Expensive clothes but you pay for quality.  Would definitely continue to buy.
Terrible customer service, very slow, very unhelpful. Takes them weeks, literally, to respond. Other companies are somehow able to resolve issues quickly and efficiently, but not Lulu Lemon.

The worst possible customer support and terrible website & stock management. They will take your order and cancel it randomly without any explanation. Yet they show the same item in stock. I think they are making money with this ridiculous system or lack there of. Be very careful!
Their sweaters and pants are the best in fashion for the price-point. Their clothes are not just comfortable but can be worn with many different outfits and styles.

I bought a pair of WUNDER TRAIN HIGH-RISE TIGHT  on  August 10th. I put them on for the 1st time today. The middle seam is unravelling, makes you wonder about the quality control. Waited 15 minutes for a Lululemon customer service agent (Tina) who asked if I the tags were still on, (I am not in the habit of wearing tags on my clothes!!!). She advised I would need to fill in a form for a defective item and then the review team would “reach out” to me in approximately 14 days with their decision as to how to move forward.  This is totally unacceptable since they are the ones that lack quality control which is non existent.I will hesitate to purchase from them again and take my $600.00 that I normally spend with them yearly and purchase from a different retailer.

Night and day since I last made a purchase. I bought the Fast & Free leggings in the same size I always wear (6), and when I place them next to my same Lululemon leggings from 2+ years ago, they look like so small they could be sized for an 8 year old. Truly unbelievable. Not all good companies are destroyed by greed, but I am highly disappointed to see Lululemon joining that list. I’m not excited about any of their products anymore. I feel like I could be shopping on any discount rack anywhere and see the same items. Quality has completely disappeared, and the prices are as high as they ever have been.

They used to be good....A few years ago I bought their leggings, but this last pair I bought was garbage. They fell apart almost immediately and when I contacted customer service, they didn't seem to care at all.I think I'll have to switch brands.

Do not shop with Lululemon, especially from the UK. Incredibly poor customer service and shipping/refund practices. Could not trace an order delivered to the wrong address for 4 working days minimum when most companies can trace their shipping within minutes. When I asked about making a complaint I was told someone would contact me by email in 1-3 days. I was not offered a refund or replacement and will not be offered any resolution for 4 days. Slow and chaotic service. Not worth ordering from them if anything goes wrong.

Just made my first purchase on Lululemon, so not had to go through customer service for anything as of yet. But it came way quicker than I was expecting and was so perfect I immediately bought another skirt in a different colour! The skirt I bought is gorgeous and floaty and I don’t really plan to wear it for sports other than the occasional pole dance lesson, but it will serve me perfectly as an everyday, comfy stretchy skirt! It’s quite pricy but the material seems good, well made and flattering. The only thing I will say is I struggled to work out which size I should be getting. On their store they ask for your US size but the sizing assistant they have tells you your UK size and i got it from the UK store — I was a bit unsure what to go for as I’m usually a size 6 - 10, (though I’m currently more on the size 10 side of things with my weight fluctuation), which would be size 2 - 6 in US. I ended up going with a 6 as that was the middle ground, and it ended up fitting perfectly!

I purchased about 2 months ago a pair of their high rise shorts. Always bought Lulu because of the quality. I have a pair of the same shorts that lasted 5 years. That’s why I didn’t have a problem spending $70 for a new pair. Well the draw string in the front became undone and was impossible for me to fix as I would have. I notified the company getting different reps and it seems like they did not care about the defect. I usually do not write reviews but I am pissed about thisSeemed that their quality is no longer great😡

I have spent a lot of money over the years at Lululemon.  My teenage daughter recently received two eGift cards at two separate times.  When she went to spend them, both are showing a balance of 0. I called the "customer education service" number and was quickly and immediately told it must have been her email that was compromised, as Lululemon has a secure site and gift cards are essentially treated as cash.  The representative was able to tell me the date the gift cards were redeemed, and where the merchandise was sent.  One was a location in Guilford Towne Centre, Canada and the other New York, NY ( I am not geographically close to either of those places).  I have a hard time believing that my teenage daughter's two SEPARATE email accounts just happened to be compromised for a two $50 Egift cards, and no other gift cards from other retailers were?  Did the same hacker just magically access two separate email accounts in opposing months, targeting teens who had a Lululemon gift card on their otherwise unappealing accounts?  Since someone in Canada used one, is it possible you have an internal problem with theft?  At the very least, it does seem as though this is an internal issue with security on Lululemon's part, and they have failed to address it based on the multiple reports I have read that date back over two years now.  Even customers who deposit gift cards onto their personal app have been compromised, so it does not stop with digital gifting.  A company that sees profits such as Lululemon should have security as a top priority.  An easy solution, and one any IT department should be able to handle, is a one-email verification.  If you cannot sign in with the email the gift card was assigned to, that eliminates a huge deal of digital theft that is occurring.  I was given a very snarky, repetitive and canned response from the representative-it is evident they see this quite a bit and have rehearsed what to say.  "I'm sure you feel frustrated" doesn't provide a solution that your company has been aware of for years.  This lack of security and customer support, coupled with declining quality of merchandise is enough to lose my business to the other competitors who are doing it right.

Terrible customer service. I returned a package with 3 items, which was apparently received empty. Lululemon refused to refund or instruct an investigation through the shipping company (UPS). UPS told me that Lululemon are their customer, and Lululemon would have to instruct and cooperate with them during the investigation. I have CCTV evidence of the package being full when my partner dropped it at the desk of the UPS parcel shop, but Lululemon are acting like I have intentionally returned an empty package. A customer service agent hung up on me and told me not to contact them again the last time that I called for an update, and since then they have stopped responding to emails requesting external dispute resolution.  It is my understanding that they should have refunded and then sought compensation from UPS, if indeed the package was actually empty upon receipt, as they claim.

I'm happy shipping is free, but come on, 4 business days and my parcel hasn't moved! Seems like very slow shipping within Canada.... Adidas, Under Armour etc all delivered within days. That includes shipping from BC to Toronto.

Disgusting customer service! I have purchased some leggings that I’ve returned. It was not how it was described and I didn’t like it. I’ve requested a return label which they sent me and I sent it back all in order.. They’ve sent me a notification with tracking number and a message that the return has  been received and they will issue a refund. Ok that was a month ago. I’ve reached out and they said they have no record of my return. I’ve provided to them all the information they asked for including screenshots of all the proof of them sending me RTA numbers, they receiving my return, yet they keep coming back to me to asking the for the same info. Shame on them! Trying to steal $98 from a customer that had purchased probably tens of thousands of $ worth of goods through the years from them.They call their customer service Customer Educators, they need to be educated themselves of how to service customers. They should be a shamed of their self’s.

Great quality clothes that last forever. Their running range in particular is really well designed and I have leggings (fast and frees) which I’ve owned for years, worn so many times and they look just as good now as the day I bought them. Worth the money.

Horrible Horrible, order a purseNever received it, they keepTelling a Date than move it upA week, they don't want to giveYour money back. They don'tHave the merchandise. ThereBusines in Pasadena is doing poor. Don't order in this store,

Purchased yoga pants online which stretched within a few weeks. Made a claim and no decision from Lululemon after 3 months. The want to inspect the pants but it's a long drive away. Poor quality items. Don't recommend.

Purchased running shorts online which stretched within a few weeks. 3 months of "customer service" and no decision from Lululemon except to say I have to go in-store - nearest store is a 3 hour drive away. Worst customer service ever and poor quality items. Don't bother buying.

Awful customer service. I wrote a review on their website regarding their bra top and was told someone would get back to me on a refund. I received an initial email asking for my order details and I emailed them back twice with all the info and never heard back. I gave up, they obviously only care about how their response looks to other customers on their site, but afterwards they couldn’t care less. I will never purchase from this company again.

One of the worst after sale service I have ever experienced.Bought a bag which did cost almost 150€ ,after 2 months the bag zip started to get damaged and with time got much bigger and clearly was a manufacture defect.Went there after a year and few months to buy a short and asked the guy behind the counter about the bag and he asked me to bring it and that he’ll find a solution for me.Went there the next day with the bag ,at first the girl told that the bag has only two years of warranty ,I told her still a few months till it’s 2 years.Then she asked me to wait for her colleague and she told me that I had to come within 6 months of the purchase date ,I told her that I’ve just told that the warranty two years and then she said yeah but it’s too late now ,we don’t have the same product any more and she advices me to contact the company online and that they most probably they’ll send me to the shop again ,but I have to tell them that I’ve been  in the shop already so like she’s telling me don’t come back to us even if they send you to us again.At the end of the conversation ,and after 5 tries of sending me back home with the broken bag, I was told that the bag zip is not included anyway in the warranty by law.!!!!So annoying that ,when you want to buy the products you’ll be welcomed ,but when you come back for a reclamation they’ll try to find any reason to no reclaim you.I see no difference so far from the fast fashion companies regarding service.Never again…..!!!

Horrible customer service. My online purchase was cancelled after 5 days with no explanation.  Whats more crazy is the fact that I received an email from them announcing that my item was ready to be shipped out?! And to expect a confirmation email with a tracking code.  How was it ready to be shipped out even if it wasnt in stock? So i email them for clarifications? A week later I receive an email to say the item was not in stock.  No “we are sorry” no apology even, nothing, so rude and dissmisive.  A day later they send me an email asking for a copy of my card and a bank statement with the address showing for future purchases _I_  I do not recommend anyone to purchase their items online. Better go to a store. They have garbage reps behind computers who dont know the first thing about communicating with customers.
For an expensive retailer, they really need to invest in a better courier. Two orders have been lost by UPS without even attempting delivery.

If I could give a 0 I would. I placed an order online on 31/5 by 10th June I had still not received it . Tracking showed it had been returned to sender.Tried to contact them via their live chat button which doesn't work and no reply, so I called customer service . Spoke to Hayley who advised that for a refund it would be 3- 5 working days to be processed in their warehouse then a further 3-10 days  to obtain a refund. So essentially a MONTH since I purchased online to receive a refund. I tried to explain what a poor customer experience this was but there was absolutely no interest or apology from the robotic call handler who didn't even have the courtesy to say goodbye at the end of my call preferring to just hang up. Even to raise a complaint takes 2-3 days as their protocols - a word used consistently and frequently during the call are what they are regardless of the customer ease or experience. They train their shop staff really well but sadly not their call handlers and customer service staff.
I was wearing an older pair of Lululemon while rollerblading. I wiped out, got road rash on my leg pretty big too  and knee. But Lululemon survived! I was really impressed! Bouth  them 8+years ago

The store personnel are always helpful and friendly. The store is inviting and easy to find what you need. Downside is that stores have limited merch and I mostly have to buy online. The clothing lasts for years but they tend to repeat styles year to year. Another negative is that they seem to be gearing their clothes toward teens.

Placed an order online and received a notification that it would ship in separate packages. After a couple of weeks, I still hadn't received the full order. I tried to reach out to customer service but their online messaging and phone lines were "down for upgrades". By the time I could reach them, they said they couldn't help me because it had been over 30 days since the item had been received.1) the item was never received, so couldnt be over 30 days2) I tried several times to reach out earlier and could not get throughTheir products are already expensive, and apparently they may never arrive - order online at your own risk.Never got my money back, or the item I ordered and PAID FOR.

Always heard people talk about this brand so finally bought 2 things. One was over $100/ I hated the fit and it in general it was awful (returned)  Second thing was $80 shorts and they were aight just avenge. Expensive for not great quality and not great fit way over hyped
Horrible customer service terrible quality.
Horrible!! I ordered cloths from the lululemonturkey. They charged me money but I did not get neither money back nor cloths and they don’t respond to my emails!!!

I bought their Pace Breaker Lined Shorts for playing squash, but the inside liner was very tight and uncomfortable. I normally use large, or medium in some cases, and bought large to make sure. I tried exchanging them but as the tag had been removed they refused. Not impressed given the brand and cost.
Was at the Kingston store. 1st time going. I live 5 hours away from any lululemon. Was not informed of the military discount. Tried the chat, they don’t care. Won’t shop again

I have never had a bad experience in store shopping at Lululemon or even after ordering items online. The in store staff are always so helpful and friendly and same with the customer service reps/educators online and via telephone. I love this company and will continue to buy from them onwards.

Ordered leggings for my granddaughter. Arrival date came and went, no pants. Sent several emails asking status. Canned responses with no action. 2 weeks later they finally send a brief email that they made an error in shipping and are refunding my card.  Still no pants. Terrible customer service.
I buy all my yoga clothes here  - i love them for sweaty hot yoga - clothes is what this place has got down. Yoga gear like mats, props I go to yoga hustle.

Terrible customer experience. I have ordered one time from Lululemon and the package was not received by me. The tracking from the carrier shows as delivered, but it was never received by me. I did not sign the delivery slip nor provided an ID number for the delivery. I have tried to make them aware of the situation so that they can followup with the carrier and request an inquiry, but they just don't care and claim that I should just follow up with my bank. My bank has reached out to them, and they keep insisting that the package was delivered. So I am left without my purchase and without my money. The customer service is just oblivious to the situation, and they keep insisting that it is my problem. Excuse me?? You have FAILED to fulfil the terms of the agreement. YOU never delivered the package to me. I don't know who you gave the package to, but most definitely was not me. It is really aggravating and infuriating that I am just without any alternative to contest this situation. Please, do not purchase from this seller. I wish I would have visited this website prior to buying from this seller and spending my hard earned money. Do not make the same mistake i made.

To date, I have placed three orders. Every order has gone wrong. My first order came with security tags attached. It’s a very common problem for security tags to come attached to orders, apparently. I am a remote person without a car. I can’t just go into a store and I think it’s crazy that they expect people to do that. I received a $30 gift card for my trouble and decided to remove the tag from my $100 bra myself which now has a huge hole in the side. I chalked it up to bad luck and decided to try again.My second order I placed stayed “processing” for 10 days. I finally called and they said that it had never been touched. Yet again, another $30 gift card was given. THEY DO NOT STACK.Here’s the kicker…On clothing that is around $100 per piece, $30 really isn’t going to do much. This is 100% a sales tactic and means of accepting poor order fulfillment/service as part of their company culture, while still getting customers to spend with them. They’ll give you $30 all day long. But they don’t stack and you can’t actually buy anything with it, unless you pay them more.I waited for 10 days for the funds to return on my card, then I placed another order. Today, I found two holds — but I had only placed one new order. After an hour with customer service today, we finally found they had re-tried my card after the fact, and still never shipped my order. This added an additional 3-10 days on the funds holding clock. I have now waited 18 days and still have not been returned my money from the order I placed. They literally can’t give me my money back, either. I just have to wait. Because it’s a hold and not a charge.NEVER ordering from this company again.
nice products

I have clothes from 2014 from here that are still in good condition. However, every purchase I have had in the last 5 years has fallen apart after a single year, if they even last that long. The clothes are not worth the price anymore. They reduced quality and overcharge.

Positives: love the sports bras, great quality. In-store service is really good (Cambridge), selection of products is good. Negatives: ordering online is a mixed bag, they only use UPS (UK) who are the worst courier in my experience. Their customer service was responsive, but they weren't helpful. Still waiting for my item to arrive...
I've had nothing but GREAT experiences with them. Great customer service and great clothing. I will continue buying from them if this continues.

Beautiful premium products with awful customer service.  They lost a product of mine in the post, had my money but told me it would take 6 days to investigate!! then said they would not refund me or send out another item.  I could not believe their attitude. I asked to speak to someone, they said it would take 24-48 hours, you can guess that this never happened.  I contacted them on day 3 and 5 to find out what was going on.  I was told on day 5 that the product was lost and I would get a refund, there was no interest in my complaint, they did not offer a goodwill gesture, nothing.  I will NOT be buying from them again.  Lululemon you need to sort out your appalling service.

Ugh. Never buy from the "we made too much" section, because apparently it is not returnable and you will want to. Overrated. Sometimes they make a good thing, but I'd rather get anything I could get at Lululemon at Pink instead for half the price and same quality.

Great products. Awesome service. How can you deny their ability to “sell” in the retail stores. They do it the right way. And their products are fantastic. All the haters saying the clothes are too expensive. They can just keep shopping at wal mart.

worst customer service and delivery service! every single time i order online lululemon for some reason they pass on the wrong address even though they have the correct address on there system. i wait home for a package that never arrives! this is not a one off miss take and it’s extremely frustrating.   DO NOT ORDER ONLINE! but also don’t bother look for stock in store, that’s a mission in itself

I placed an order that said it was delivered through my shop app, lululemon and fedex. I spoke to multiple educators through phone calls and live chat, and no action was taken. I am giving them a 5 star review because, I just spoke to Nicky who fast tracked a trace on my order, although all other educators I had spoken to said they were starting a trace on my order, and there wasn't one to be found. Not only did Nicky fast track this, but he also gave me a $30 e-Gift Card. He was the most helpful and productive educator that I spoke to and the only reason I am leaving a 5 star review.

Best womens Activewear bar none!  I tend to come here to make sure unknown company's dont have bad reports. Decided to check on my favorite company and was shocked to read the rating.  So figured not enough come here to praise, just complain.  This company is fantastic. My kid is D1 power 5 athlete.  She works out 5days a week and loves these!  Bras, shorts. Leggings.  Hair ties.   All of it stays in place and no slipping on runs, agility work, floor work, batting......all of it.  AND if material wears, snags or slips... they replace absolutely free!!!  The money by far matches their quality.  Amazing!!!
Fit as expected
Really disappointed with the amount of plastic that my products came wrapped in - they do NOT need individual plastic bags - so much for having a sustainability strategy

The align and align with pockects are buttery soft. I’m not the type of person to leave negative feedback, but I experienced an extreme level of abuse and racism by the security member at the lululemon store on Grafton street on December 31st 2021.  I have never in my life experienced this type of behaviour.  I was in the Lululemon store on Grafton street on New Year’s Eve.  I  tried on a couple of items and decided on my purchases at the fitting rooms, I quickly pulled down my mask to sip out of my coffee before heading to the checkout.  Out of nowhere, the security guard approached me with a serious  attitude telling me to pull up my mask down and not to drink my coffee in the store.  I understand when there are store policies entirely and would respect them but the way he approached me so aggressively  was completely out of order.He was very full on and I was in shock by his tone of voice and manner for a simple mistake.  I couldn’t believe what had just happened . Initially I was shocked but then I came to my senses & I went over to him to let him know that that’s not an acceptable way to speak to your customers.  There is  a respectable way of asking someone not to drink coffee in-store and to pull up the mask.  He then proceeded to abuse me further at the lulu lemon store entrance, he said  that I was the issue and not him and that he worked most of his life and "people like me" don’t even know what work is (I have 2 jobs)  he proceeded to shout that I was the problem. I doubt I am the only customer he has had in store who put their mask down for a moment and i would hope that this isn't how he treats other customers on a daily basis.   Lulu lemon your security guard  then called me a "Fu…. Bit.." , do you think that this is acceptable ? I have shopped in lulu lemon for years and never experienced this type of disgusting behaviour in my life. I walked away from that man and i asked one of the staff members to speak to a manager about this behaviour.  The manager did apologise, I was very distraught at this stage by how I was just  treated so i left my shopping and decided to leave the store.As I walked out the door, this man' followed me onto Grafton street while  shouting at me. Lululemon, I’m very disappointed that you employ such racist bullys, and I will never set foot in your store again and I would like to have some feedback as to the action that will be taken for this incident.

I bought 4 lululemon no-sew/ no-show panties because I don’t want my pantie lines to show when I wear leggings. But it did exactly that. All panties have sewing lines and show more than my regular laces panties. Why did I pay 3x more expensive for panties that doesn’t do what it is intended to do. And since panties are final sale items, with good reasons, I cannot return them. Such a waste of money.
AMAZING SERVICE
Fantastic products, they look great out and I can workout in them. They seem optimal for basically any non-formal situation
Excellent clothing. Only suggestion is to go up one size, so the fabric is not so stretched.

Shopped at the CrossIron Mills PopUp location over the holidays. Had the pleasure of dealing with Maddie. She’s a great personality with an awesome sense of humour!  I’d adopt her if I could! LOL!  I’ll be a return shopper for sure.

Sounds like a common thread among other posts with customer service and this company that has done absolutely nothing to assist or resolve.  Purchased 3 men’s shirts at a store online only to be given a FedEx number that showed delivery BEFORE The purchase was made!   Was told it would be addressed and corrected only to find out my package was mis-delivered as address was never updated.  Reported a claim to be told it’ll take an additional 6 days to review.  Meanwhile an email said package will be shipped via usps with no eta, and it hasn’t even gotten to usps.  Several calls to the GEC only to be on hold or in a que of 500+. They apologize for inconvenience but no offer to escalate issue, offer a discount, etc., nothing. Tried to get assistance from store level but they claim out of their hands.  Glad store shows quota but after this mess I’m done with a true lemon.

I ordered a $118 top from lululemon as a Christmas gift.  I got notification that they received my order.  When I got a tracking number and tried to track my order, I saw that FedEx said the order had been delivered a month earlier to another state.  I called “customer service” and after 1 1/2 hours on hold, spoke to an “educator”.  He told me that FedEx reuses tracking numbers and would update.  It never did.  Now I have an update from USPS which wants me to pay to get my tracking information.  Another call to lululemon got no results or offers for help until 10 business days pass.  Ordering from this company that has no problem charging $118 for a workout top has been a nightmare and an exercise in futility.  I will never buy from them again-I’m sure they won’t miss my business.

Completely rubbish customer service. FedEx claims that they delivered my order to Newcastle, DE, whereas my address is Wilmington, DE. It has been a week that Lululemon.com did not reply the customer service e-mail. To reach the live chat or emergency phones is a pain by itself. And after reaching you can not contact a single living organism because of hours long waiting times.Biggest failure in online shopping till now. I am not sure how I will get my 68$. It is highly possible that it will be a paid lesson.

I have ordered online from Lululemon 2x in my life. Those 2 times, the shipping has been botched. I'm currently waiting for an item purchased for trip I'm taking in which I needed a good back pack. I ordered on black Friday. Got the shipping notification a few days later but the tracking number said it had been delivered in OCTOBER.... impossible. Waited on hold for about an hour to see what my actual tracking number was. They blamed FedEX for using a recylcled tracking number. What? Anyway, it is 12/9/21 and I have no idea where this package is and I nobody can track it because it was assigned a used tracking number. What a joke. Plus, the back pack is final sale and now I will have a bag that I don't need after this trip. I'm annoyed

Absolutely the Worst service!!!  On the phone for over an hour and a half.  Wrong order number,wrong name on order.   Had no idea how to help me.  Call back next week he said.     How do I get help!!   I want my order.

I gave Lululemon a terrible review last year for their disastrous shipping and customer service and they have done it again! I’ve just had an email telling me that the items I’d ordered for Christmas for my husband had arrived. They hadn’t  … contacted customer service who put a 6 day trace investigation on the order then they will refund. Just before Xmas … They suggested I ordered again - at my expense. Utterly useless.

My experience has been horrible.  I ordered several items in November but never received them. I called customer service and they told me to wait 6 days while they “investigated” and  call them back.  After attempting to call several times (waited on hold for 35, 39 and 42 min before I gave up) i tried to use chat and had a couple of hundred people in front of me so no luck there.  I will be disputing the charges I will probably never order anything from their online site again unless I can pick it up in the store.

If I could give 0 star I would, several weeks after my order and several calls emails and live chat,they take your money and 0 customer service follow up, The quality is good but seriously overpriced and so far what they used to be, I fell in love 12 years ago and now I tell you stay away, they act like a scam Vs decent company.

I recently ordered a pair of leggings as a gift and when it was delivered the bag inside looked like someone had previously return the item and the bag was ripped open...when I called customer service the person who helped me was pleasant and made sure new ones were sent out immediately. I am pleased with the service I received from this store.

Not sure why they have gone downhill so badly.  I used to love the "lock 'em down" underwear for men, they did away with them, I moved to the replacement (for get the name of that garment) and now the latest version is horrible.  They roll up on your leg when you put on any pants, shorts or whatever.  Here is the killer, I left a review on the Lululemon website, after they ask for the review and just like the last review I left, they took it down and said it "didn't address the product I bought" so they were not going to allow it.  Remarkable..... the site where they monitor the reviews all of them are 5 stars, well that is because if you don't write a good review, you can not post it. They always have some excuse.  I tried to work with them, I uploaded pictures of the product and it's problem, just like the website says and instead of making it right, they came back and ask for me to redo it.  I said I already did the pictures and upload and they wanted it again so here I am out $100 and stuck with 5 pairs of underwear that frankly are horrible.  For $100 I could have bought 2X the number of Fruit of the Loom and probably been happier. So...there's that.

Worth every penny.I've recently replaced most of my casual wardrobe with lulu's. Even got my hubby to start wearing it lol. It's definitely more pricey than the alternatives but you know what you're getting.

This is a cautionary tale ~do not order online from lululemon.  I ordered an item a month ago that was not delivered.  Lululemon canceled the order, however I still haven’t received a refund.  I ordered online for a store pick up and they had no record of my order/payment when I attended to retrieve it in store, despite having proof of payment and confirmation of the order. To provide payment and receive nothing in return is theft; it seems as though this is common practice based on the numerous reviews with similar issues. Shockingly, the customer service received from their “educators” is nonexistent and there has been no attempt to improve it.

Can’t get customer service on the phone, missing part of my order. Tried getting an “educator” on chat and had 322 people in front of me!!!  Im missing part of my order that I've been charged for!!!NEVER AGAIN

I tied to exchange 2 $68.00 pairs of men’s athletic shorts to the LuLulemon in Aspen Grove Co location because the zippers on both pairs detached from the material and to my dismay I found out these incredibly expensive shorts don’t have a life time warranty. They are too ok’d whatever that means. I buy their gear(paying 2 to 3 times retail of similar products)  because of the quality and warranty.  Been a loyal customer for years but no more. Penny wise pound foolish.

They say you don't write reviews unless you're angry. In this case, this is certainly true. I've been a lulu fan for 15+ years. I've run in dozens of their products and loved them. But recently, everything has gone downhill. This company has become a money-hungry nightmare that will sell you $100+ leggings and offer you bottom-of-the-barrel service. I recently ordered a gift for a friend and was sent the entirely wrong item. When I contacted them to send another, they were impossible to reach. Impossible. I spent two hours on hold and was hung up on twice. When I finally did get a hold of them, they told me I had to return the item (their mistake) and reorder the other item (before I got my refund). It's just not the company it was ten years ago. For the price range, try Tracksmith, Janji, or Oiselle.
Decent but pricey shirts. I would probably only buy during sales or if marked down. There are other brands with lower pricing but better quality and designs

Really bad. Sent item with a security tape attached. Told me to return it or go to store. No apology. I complained, they told me to cut out and they would send 25 voucher to apologise. Never received. Wrote back twice with case number and ignored (but get auto message asking me ‘how did we do’).Overpriced and useless customer service. Annoyingly bad.
Great selection and friendly staff

If there was a zero available that is what I would have picked for TERRIBLE customer service.  Ordered three tops.  Was charged for 3.  Opened package and there was only one shirt.  For 2 days have not been able to get any customer service to see what happened.  Hours long wait time on phone and live chat.  Email says do not email us again and we hopefully will get back to you  in 7 days.  DO NOT BUY ONLINE ANYMORE unless you want a totally aggravating opportunity to be robbed.

The customer service is so bad and it’s consistent either online or in the stores. My trainer bought me a gift certificate, and when I tried to use it online it wouldn’t work. I called customer service and it was a mess. No help. No valuing the customer. It is always call back. I tried taking it to a store, and they showed I had the money on it, but when we went to process my ticket, it said it had the wrong pin. I was spending another $250, I’m not sure why the manager couldn’t override the ticket. The gift card was $30….but this company doesn’t value your time or your patronage. Once I get it resolved, I will NEVER shop with this company again!

I buy lulu for Christmas presents for college age kids.  This year I spent over $1100.  I did not receive 1 item.  Wow.  I have spent 3 hours on hold.  Emails refused and on live chat for over 4 hours and dropped multiple times.  The wait time on chat is one hour and 47 minutes.  The price point of lulu merch demands an ounce of customer service.  After a two hour chat today…I was told a trace would be done and would take 4 days, and to call back in 4 days.  I told the person the time it took to get her…and frankly my time is too valuable.  I am returning every bit of that $1100 today.  I lost 8 hours on hold with this company only to be told to call back.  Lulu is not who they used to be.  Buyer beware in 2021.  I have screenshots of all of the chat today.

I placed an online order in Canada. At first the date was to arrive earlier and then it changed to a later date. As well, the product was going to Illinois and then back to Ontario?I emailed Lululemon and tried calling but you're on hold far too long for Customer service to talk to you.Not only disappointing and disconcerting, but ridiculous.

Horrible customer service!!!!!They advertised a discount for Front line workers, but the catch that you have to get hold of them to apply the discount. I tried to do that for a week, and when I finally was able to get hold for a customer service rep a lady named Hansa told me the offer was over. The lady admitted that due to change in their system no one could get hold of them, and refused to honour the discount. Shame on lululemon company for not honouring what they advertise!!!!

Lululemon used to have an outstanding return policy. Not only did they change that, the quality of their garments has decreased an unacceptable amount in the last few years. I purchased a pair of aligns after wearing a pair steady for 3 years. I purchased the same size. When took them home, I removed the tags thinking they'd fit the same as my last pair. After wearing them for a few hours I was dissapointed that I had to continue to pull them up. I asked my husband to return them, and the store refused because the tags were off. How is one supposed to determine if a garment holds up to their lifestyle without WEARING them? As a 'courtesy' they gave him a gift card with the value on it. I tried on several pairs in store, I was reccomended the Wunder train so I went with those. Guess what? Those fall too. I had someone in the store make suggestions on fit and style based on my frame and even then, they don't work for me. I now have a pair of $100 leggings that I can't wear, and do not have the time to repeatedly fight for exchanges on sub par products.I won't support this brand until they make their return policy flexible, and their pants the quality they used to be.

I just received my lululemon masks and 1 of the 3 is a different colour and is smaller than the other 2 The colour doesn’t bother me as much as the fit. It’s too small The masks are non refundable. I tried calling and was on hold for an entire hour with no answer. I tried the live chat and also nothing. This is by far the worst customer service ever

Great clothes, terrible customer service. The stores’ employees are generally friendly and helpful. The guest education center for the website, however, is repeatedly, reliably horrible. Very very long wait times for help (generally over 40 minutes), and then routinely unhelpful reps once you do connect with someone. Best to avoid online “guest education center” reps at all costs. They’ve earned their name for a reason- they educate customers to AVOID them.

Absolutely awful experience when trying to get top altered at Eaton Centre Lululemon - when I was frustrated at being told something different about alterations, I spoke to the Manager, Melissa - and she really made me blow my top - very condescending and patronizing! where do they train these Managers!! I rarely use 4 letter words but she really bought out the worst in me! sometimes you get very good sales person who are very nice, but lately I've noticed it hasn't been great - and this Manager really was the last unpleasant straw!!!! I ended going to another store and returned both items, even though I meant to keep one of them.  Picked up Zella stuff from Nordstrom instead - what a difference in service!

Absolutely horrible customer service! I placed a large order with them online, and the wrong address auto populated. I noticed immediately after the order was placed. Contacted them via email, chat, and tried to call multiple times. Immediately after the order was placed. I got zero response. Then, two days later, the order was shipped. They could have easily prevented this for my order that costed north of $300. And to top it off, I waited over an hour several times trying to call before amd after the packages were delivered. The regional me response I did get, was to take the issue up with fedex, however fedex replied that only the sender could stop the order from being delivered. I explained this in 3 emails BEFORE the order went out for delivery and got zero response. Now I am out $300 and could have bought way more at comparable companies such as TASC Performance which is big in my area. I’m extremely angry and frustrated. I will absolutely never give another dollar to a company that could not possibly care less about their customers. AWFUL

Lululemon sent me the wrong product FOUR times in a row - and I still haven't received the product I ordered. The process, which has been going on for 3 weeks, has left me hugely frustrated, having wasted hours on the phone, sending dozens of emails and dealing with a customer care team, who whilst pleasant, have not been able to help with the simplest of tasks - just sending me the product I ordered. Not the experience you'd expect from a 'premium' retailer.

This online chat system is a waste of time. The virtual agent cannot help you and then sends you off waiting for a live agent that will never contact you. There are better things to do… Too bad lululemon doesn’t really care about the customer.

Love their clothes and for me their shipping is very fast but their customer service is disgusting, I’ve tried for week to contact them through telephone through email and they don’t response and the only time they did response the person was on the phone and never spoke…
Simple and functional! Love how it fits and compliments the shape.
The only place with quality athletic wear that I actually like.. or LOVE rather.

Terrible clothes and terrible customer service, trying to get a refund where Royal Mail tracking says it’s delivered and they’re saying they didn’t receive it and it’s my problem. Zero interest in trying to resolve it and basically wash their hands of it. First and last time using this company. Do yourself a favour and don’t bother ordering anything with them. I wish I’d read the reviews before using them. I would have saved myself £100 and many wasted hours

Slow shipping. Non-existent customer service from “educators.” Giggles at questions. Inconsistent and unreliable information. Overpriced product to have to wait 6 days for shipping from a warehouse when both larger and smaller companies can fulfill order the same day. Ordered from Uniqlo same day and the order arrived the next day. Why wait for clothes that fall apart after a couple of washes?

Terrible customer service. After 1 hour of wait on the phone for an ‘Educator’, she stated what she had to state about shipping and told me to call back after 5-7 business days and showed no willingness to listen and just hung up. I think they can do better…

They shipped me someone else's order. On hold twice for more than 45 minutes and was cut off before anyone answered. Tried the artificial intelligence text services but that was a waste of time because they can not help with ordinary problems if it does not fit into pre-programmed categories. I went to the store to give them the shipment  that was meant for someone else and the manager said yes we made a mistake and it is not our problem, and we don't want want it.
