We would appreciate you sending it back to returns as this store can not handle  the problem. They told me  I need to take care of it. That means I have to wait on hold another 50 minutes to have someone tell me to print a label, create a shipping container and take it to Fed Ex so that Lulu Lemon can receive back the incorrect shipment they sent me. This is now my problem and they refuse to send me a label and bag to return it to them. So now I am out three hours of my life and have some ladies crop top sweatpants that she is waiting for. I have sent emails and called again and told them I am unhappy and they said someone would call me within two days.  Still waiting. LuluLemon really has to rethink their customer service. Saving money at the expense of helping a customer who is trying to do the correct honest thing is the wrong choice.

After reading so much about these “life changing “ leggings I finally ordered some and i am completely gutted. The sizes are WAY off.. the fabric is not butter soft … they look like normal leggings, not very cheap ones but they don’t feel or look premium. I could get the same quality for 1/3 price in tkmax/tjmax I don’t understand what all the hype is about 😐

Appalling service - DO NOT BUY ONLINE. Delivery late, takes hours to get through on ‘instant chat’ and was refused the details of how to make a complaint being told “I had no reason to complain” - shocking service

I bought a backpack and broke after 1 month, send the backpack back, I haven’t received any refund! The educators as they call the people on client service never gave me a solution, they keep saying to wait and waitI sent several emails with no responds
Expensive but comfortable thights. I love Align series
Crap delivery service

I have bought items for years. I paid for 2 items in kings rd Chelsea. It went through. Said accepted, text on my phone and it went through my bank. The assistant said it hadn’t gone through, I proved it had. They insisted I pay again. I said I have already paid, proved by showing on my bank statement. The American (short lady) refused to accept I had paid insisted I pay again I said no as if had gone through my bank. I gave a business card with all my contact details. She called, verbally abused me , called me a thief, did the same twice by email. Each time I sent a transaction proof that i had paid by sending bank screenshot. Went in on Monday to formally politely complain. The manager was soooo rude, no sympathy and I showed her the transaction that had gone through. BOTH THE AMERICAN SHORT LADY AND HER MANAGER A BLACK LADY MANAGER ST KINGS RD CHELSEA SHOULD BE IMMEDIATELY SACKED. ABUSIVE NASTY LADIES.

Avoid!  I have twice returned items to Lululemon and they have not refunded me. Despite sending them the UPS tracking number (from the label they provided) which shows that the parcel was received by them , they have stonewalled. The first time they refunded me in the end (after weeks of correspondence). The second time they haven't refunded me at all.
Hauston at the Lululemon store West Market Street Station in Ohio was extremely helpful! He even answered the phone! This is customer service!Maureen, CO

I purchased the everyday bag. It came frayed on the inside and does not zip or unzip without struggle. Lulu offered an e-gift card in lieu of a refund. After reading reviews, I see that 243 other people have had the same problem. They will not stand behind their products and refund for defective items.

I ordered 2 pairs of shorts a long time ago because the one i had really wanted got back in-stock and another pair was on sale. I ended up spending $102 and the package never arrived at my house. When I emailed customer service they offered little to no help telling me to check with my family to see if they picked it up. Then telling me that since FedEx signed for the delivery that there was nothing they could do and I should contact my bank. The thing is is that the only FedEx packages that we sign for are alcohol, and my family was home the entire day the package allegedly arrived but it was never delivered. I would just like my money back or at least the shorts I ordered but I don't see any of that happening.

First time Lulu buyer.  Absolutely love the Free to be Serene sport bra - bought in Sonic Pink (to die for!) and White.  Hands down the most comfortable sport bra I've purchased - and I've tried Nike, Adidas, Sweaty Betty, ...  36B/UK12 and the US10 is a comfortable fit.  Hopefully they will wash well.  Also - the Lulu Pace Rival skirt in Sonic Pink (did I mention - to die for!).  Careful here - two lengths.  i should probably have got the long.  I didn't.I'm UK 10 in skirts and bought the US6.  Firm "supportive" waistband a tiny bit on the small side.  I could possibly have sized up.Already ordered more products.

Awful quality, terrible returns, never shop here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Awful quality, terrible returns, never shop hereWhere do I start, the colors are not as represented, the sizes are off and the fabric and workmanship is terrible. Biggest complaint I wanted to return the items that I ordered because what I ordered was not what it looked like. The t-shirt was more of a crop top. They have a 30 day refund policy and I was late by 9 days and they absolutely sent an email to the company getting no response then I went on Facebook and I found their Contact info which is ⁹¹⁹⁻⁹³⁹TWO FIVE FOUR FOUR when I contacted the company finally I was able to get in touch with the company customer care help department and I received excellent service. He resolved my issues and was very pleasant throughout the entire process.!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!ill fitting, poor quality clothes.! Definitely not worth the price! Very thin, cheap clothing!

I love lulu! Amazing quality with perfect sizing. I always get my orders extremely quickly and have never had an order in over 5 years that was not perfect. Thank you Lululemon for keeping great standards! I will keep coming back!

Was I Right or Was I Right 🤷‍♀️ Should have tried to make lemonade when u had a chance 🤣Complained to Lulu Lemon 🍋 Customer service 800 number about the white privilege & got total disregard by the management & employees alike @ customer service by the so called ‘Educators ‘ Hmmm 🤔 Educating your employees to be Racist? 😡What goes around , comes around ⭕️ That is called Karma ❣️Namaste Westlake Crocker Park Lulu Lemon , Ohio 🍋🇺🇸🍋You have my number, Call me when you need a real Educator, not jus a wannabe educator with a high school drop out degree  📱 ☎️ 📞Too bad your times up 🤲🏼Should have listened to a real PHD on human relations / corporate etiquette ,  when I came knocking @ your door 😢Live & Learn Educators @ Lulu Lemon 🍋Alas❣️ "Oh, what a tangled web we weave, when first we practice to deceive!"

They have my balance for a return in the cash register. They blew me off at the store and told me to call the company. The company told me to call the store. Neither would honor the return credit even though I have the receipts and they told me even though the balance shows on my account they are keeping my money and will not let me use it in the store. This does not make sense and is not how they should treat customers. They are keeping my money, even though the balance is apparent with the cell number when input. Do not lose or misplace the gift card which is your refund or they will happily keep your money. They bury this policy deep, deep into the terms and conditions section on their webpage. They do not care about customers. Everybody wants that status logo. Lets face it. The quality does not justify the hype.

Recently purchased Lululemon socks. They look good and the material feels like it's of a decent quality. However, the construction is poor. They have a weird built-in heel thing that doesn't fit me at all. I can't image it would fit most people, so it would do what it does with me and stick out like a odd heel nose.  Inevitably the heel bunches up when you put shoes on, which leads to rubbing and blisters. The socks also shrink like crazy in the wash. I have pants from them that work like a charm, but they definitely cut corners when making these socks. If you get them, keep the labels/boxes until after the first wash.

Lululemon used to be reliable, consistent and easy to return or exchange. Product sizes are no longer consistent, returns are difficult in that you have to do a lot of leg work to get somewhere and sometimes, not; customer service levels have dropped considerably. Have to find a new place!
so bad.  waiting for an hour on the phone and chat.   with the prices they charge they should have good customer service.  Learn from zappos.

I was eager to try a new brand of running apparel... Lululemon isn’t best known for men’s running gear but I decided to take a plunge and give them go. My grey running shorts showed sweat marks after a short run, while I expect sweat the colour or material wasn’t compatible for this and I wondered how they came to produce these without noticing such a big design flaw. (The price is almost double that of my grey Nike running shorts and I have no problem with them.) I emailed customer services and was told I had to submit a returns request and someone would get back to me within 7 days. 16 days later after me messaging them numerously requesting an update I was told that they would not be accepting the return. This was contradictory to what it says on the returns note ‘if you are not happy with your product or your product doesn’t perform for you then you can return it’. After persisting and making a complaint they agreed to send me a discount off of my next purchase, and said I should receive an email within 48 hours. A few more emails were sent back and forth as I hadn’t received it and it finally arrived after a week!What a waste of time and a disappointing first experience, at the prices they are charging I would have expected better handling from their customer services. I would avoid them in the future and will not recommend them.

I recently ordered a yoga mat from Lululemon, then a few days later received an automated email from them saying my order had been cancelled. No accurate details were given to me regarding the cancelled order. No apology or personal explanation at all. Extremely poor customer service.

So I love Lulu lemon wear and I buy quite abit until recently..... for some reason I am unable to purchase anything! Everytime I submit it does nothing. I've been told may be due to stock levels but I have tried numerous items and I keep having same issue! I have spoke to customer service who are usually excellent but I still can't buy anything which is annoying.
Worst size chat ever!!!! Do not use the size chart they provided. I ordered over $300., of clothing. Nothing fit!!! So very disappointed
Quality has gone DOWNHILL - after spending thousands on these leggings- they just feel budget now. Not what they once were.

Worst customer service to date. Item lost - tracking shows it was delivered to an address in a different country. I had to initiate communication multiple times until I was finally offered for my order to be replaced, at that point my item was out of stock. I was then offered a refund which I now have to wait up to 10 days to receive. Ordered was placed April 17th for reference. #customerservicefail

I have been using my lululemon online account for years. My account was banned from paying by credit cards for online orders recently. I found that issue in April 2021 when I tried to place an order. I was able to pay with gift card and paypal but not any of my creditcards on file.  I contacted the customer service and got response. They say that I can only use one credit card in my account after sending them a statement showing my billing address for verification. They did verify my credit cards for me but still I am only to use ONE card on lululemon website. I have been asking the reason why they restricted my account many times, they NEVER answered my question directly!Another time I bought a pair of leggings from WMTM sale. I have the same leggings in the same fabric and same size. However, the waist of this pair of leggings are significantly smaller than the other one I own. I asked the GEC to return these leggings because of their sizing inconsistency. I person I chatted with online was very rude and refused to recreate a return. She even asked me why can't I resell these leggings?

Someone fraudulently ordered goods from Lululemon in the US using our Visa card from the UK. Even though we notified Lululemon immediately that we hadn’t ordered these goods and the order should be cancelled or put on hold whilst it was investigated they would not do this. Their ordering policy only allows to cancel an order within 60 minutes of the order being placed. Lululemon kept sending us emails giving us a progress report of the order which we responded to, but it wasn’t until the goods had been dispatched and we alerted them again that this was fraudulent that they recalled the goods and issued a refund. We’ve emailed the CEO to request they change their ordering policy but he hasn’t had the courtesy to reply.

Bought men's pants online. Didn't like them. Material and large stretchy fit wasn't for me. So I asked for a refund. They won't refund because they were on markdown, so only offered a gift card. I feel this is lame way to make a sale. First time trying their product and was incredibly disappointed. At least offer an option to pay for shipping to restock fee. Offering gift card, really? Gap/Old Navy doesn't even do that. Not what I would expect from this caliber line of clothes.

I'm a  avid shopper at Luluemon, I have spent so much money on this company.  Yes, their clothes are amazing especially if you are an athlete.  I walked in the store on Madison Ave between 84th & 85th street.  The associate was nice, that greeted me. I did notice a sales associate did walk away no greet from women as I walked into the store at 10:15am!   I got into the fitting room and notice the employer never moved from where I was trying on the clothes.  At the end after trying on different items.  I said I'll just return what I have and get a gift card.  I wanted to return an item and I could not at all?  With tags, two receipts stapled.  Every time I walk in this location they have the most racist employees. I go into other locations in the  NYC  customer service is amazing!   NO ONE SHOULD HAVE EXPERIENCED what I just did.  The employees at this location are so BAD, racist to people of color!  How could this happen NOW in what we are living everyday.

I've spent thousands at lulu over the years.  I thought I was buying quality of product and customer support behind it, I was wrong.  After spending $100 on a yoga mat that disintegrated into dust within a year, customer service called it normal wear and tear and refused any reconciliation of any form.  Last straw for me and this immoral company, not another dime.

Not a huge fan... extremely thin, constantly rolling down, feels like wearing some winter panty hose or something and collects every piece of dust in a mile's radius. Definitely not worth the money... unless you're just looking to have something "name brand" to feel better about

I received a pair of limited release pants as a gift and after wearing them twice there were two runs/holes in the back of the pants. It appeared as if it was a similar run you would get on a pair of pantyhose. The item was not worn when doing strenuous activity and they were washed properly so there was no reason that these runs would have appeared. When I reached out to customer service, I received responses like, "Wow that really sucks," and "Yeah, I totally get it," with no actual help or advice on what to do. When I was given information on how to file a damage report, they provided no space to actually explain what happened to the pants, just a multiple choice section to click on "damage" or "tear at seams" etc. After getting a quick response where the team shared that they are not responsible for natural wear and tear I again expressed that these are brand new pants. I was told that while they pride themselves on creating long-lasting gear, this is not a manufacturing issue and no return would be permitted. Apparently a hole can only appear in pants as a result of accidental damage and has nothing to do with how the item was made.Not sure if I can really agree with that, but one thing I do know is that with 100+ companies that make the same exact clothing, I can find the same if not better quality elsewhere.

I own many Lululemon products to give you an over view over 50 pairs of shorts, 30 pairs of pants, numerous amounts of  jackets,scuba zip ups and reflective pullovers and APLsneakers until they stopped selling them. This is where I am comfortable with truly being able to rate Lululemon products, quality fit etc, from past to present. I have seen since 2019 the quality of Lululemon and their customer service has gone completely down hill. Before 2019 Lululemon  took pride in Amazing quality and Amazing Customer service to include fixing their Lululemon brand clothing via their selected stores. Right before the pandemic I needed some stuff fixed that were pretty new. I had only worn them a few times and they were starting unravel at the seams so I brought them in to the Natick store where they have seamstress they asked me if I had a tag from the online. I told the girl I have never had to do that before as I’ve always brought my Lululemon clothing directly into the store to have the seam fixed if it’s coming on done as I own many pairs of Lululemon clothes and even to this day I have white and blue Mind over Miles tights still with tags on them. Anyways the girl ended up taking my scuba sweatshirt and fixing the seam line with the zipper. But you would’ve thought I was asking her to sow the whole entire jacket together front start to finish as they do in the factoryI  was very disappointed and that’s my personal journey as to how it continued to make me now want to buy and support Lululemon as their quality and service were not what it once was. I will never forget the time reflective jacket that cost $228 when I contacted Lululemon headquarters directly they were kind enough to help me.Now that is in the past no matter how new your Lululemon clothing is  you’ll get someone telling you at the Natick store that it looks like it’s been well loved r that they can’t fix it because of whatever excuse they happen to give you that day.  I know how many times I wear certain pants in particular one in particular our my black Sleet Sprinter Pants I would say yes they are well loved and to be honest I wish Lululemon would bring this particular winter gear back as it’s amazing quality it has lasted many years. Anyway, I recently I bought the Fast and Free tight online in the dark Red because I had been looking for that color for some time now. I could wait to get them and I was Completely Disappointed in the over all quality and make. The quality of Fast and Free, This time they were SUPER THIN, Kept on falling down, and the quality was not what it used to be.With gratitude yet at the same time, Unfortunately in and 2019 and 2020 I was given gift cards by family members for Christmas each with a good amount on them to purchase many more shirts, tights and I have not been able to used them as one the quality and fit has gotten awful and so has the Color pallet.I told my family after this Christmas in 2020 as I truly appreciate your generous gift I ask that you please not purchase me any more Lululemon gift cards as their quality is not what it once was nor is it’s customer service. It’s sad because I personally looked forward to the newest products, great quality with the best and brightest colors. Now all they have produced are lower quality material products that are full of gloomy and bland colors. Unfortunately once all my gifts cards are used up I will not be shopping at Lululemon.

Love lululemon leggings.  However, unable to purchase them as the delivery courier they use is UPS. UPS never deliver to me. Only courier service who never deliver. Please please change your courier service.

Lulu fast and free.  Have these leggings for 1.5 years. The stitching came out of the back of them. I tried to return them or get them repaired and the response from Lululemon was that it looks like these pants are well loved through the years.  These pants were expensive and the quality should be that they don’t come apart at the seams.

I bought a pair of All The Right Places leggings in my usual size . Although the fabric feels nice , they are completely useless as they are running down with WALKING and they pull my knickers down with them as well !! Terrible fit , very expensive mistake and based on the reviews I wont even bother to contact customer service but they won't see mine or any of my friends business ever again
I bought a new yoga mat. It seems sturdy and large but wow is it hard. Not much different than laying on the floor. I was looking for a lot more padding and comfort.

Bought my second pair of align leggings because I liked my first pair so much. The new pair started piling within a month and lululemon wouldn't do a thing about it. They told me since the fabric is delicate that it should be washed in cold water (which I do) and laid out to dry (which I also do). They offered no replacement or anything else. Unfortunately they have lost my business. Prior to this I have owned two pairs of their leggings which have held up really well where as this pair was not worth the 100 dollars especially when they look like they're 2 years old after a month of wear. Really disappointed in their customer service as well... Apparently everything is normal wear and tear. If your 100 dollar leggings can't hold up to a month of wear, they're not worth my money.

Very expensive for a mediocre product. Went to a store to exchange my leggings. They were only willing to repair them. It took 3 weeks for the repair. I wasn’t happy with the repair or the customer service by the store employees. Contacted their customer service department and was told I needed to go back to the store to complain about the repair. Do NOT waste your money on such a poorly made product and a company that has horrible customer service. Go to TJ MAXX and purchase the $16.99 leggings. They are much better quality.

I enjoy lululemon - their customer service is some of the best I’ve ever dealt with, I’ve never personally had an issue with returns. My only complaint is the clothing quality especially for women’s leggings has been on a sharp decline the last few years. Pants seams unravel faster and the fabric seems lower quality than it used to be.

I recently purchased a pair of Align leggings to replace a pair that had stitching unravelling.  The new pair started unravelling on the waistband the second time I wore them.  I attempted to return them and Lulu Lemon would not accept the return saying it was normal wear and tear!  Seriously, I own several pairs of Lulu's and only the most recently bought pairs are unravelling.  I then tried to repair them myself and discovered there is a flaw in the stitching and the top of the band is also unravelling, therefore, I will need to take them to a professional seamstress to try to repair. The quality of Lulu clothes has gone downhill and is unreliable and these are last pair of Lulu leggings I'll buy.

Terrible product quality and customer service.My legging arrived with the stitching unravelling, and it took them two months to process the return and send me a return label. Once they received the legging, the company refused to refund me onto my card but offered me a gift card - why would I want to spend my money with them again, when it's their fault I returned the legging in the first place?I tried to contact them, but their customer service is appalling - it's frightening and so sad. I'm so disappointed. I wouldn't recommend you buy any of their products. I have another one of their leggings, and the quality is not good at all.

I bought some really Expensive Leggins and was advised what size to buy by the company. They fall down when I run and are completely unfit for purpose. They couldn’t of been more unhelpful when I asked to change them for a smaller size. Do not use this  company if you want a good product and any sort of customer services. I’m so disappointed.

As a yogi/fitness lover, I used to be a big lululemon fan for over 10 years, but now I feel the need to find a different brand for athletic clothings. when my newest pair of pants got holes and became basically unwearable, their customer service replied it was an accidental damage, not a quality issue. I have other pants from them that are years old and dont have holes, but these ones do. What type of accident do they think I had with these pants? Nothing ever happened with my pants other than regular wear, wash and airdry. Also they said they would like 'a healthy relationship' with customers. To me, it sounded like I am taking advantage of them if they let me return these expensive pants that became unwearable way too soon. It just left such a bad taste in my mouth and I no longer feel confident in spending >$100 on yoga pants.

I bought a pair of align for my daughter for Christmas 2020 and now here we are March and they have a hole. Contacted the company snd apparently they don’t cover wear and tear , so a $100+ pair of leggings can’t hold up to household wear and tear for THREE MONTHS This amounts to almost $50 a month for wearing these one leggings. I also have three more pairs with holes and we are both fairly easy on our clothes. I will for sure be looking elsewhere for my leggings from now on.Shame on you lululemon for your terrible customer service!

I contacted customer service In regards to a purchase of a scuba hoodie. The seams are literally coming apart In both arms. I spend a lot of Money at this company and to have this issue I was shocked. Then they said that it appeared to be accidental damage and they would not be accepting this product back. They basically called me a liar. I have never had issues with their clothing before, ever. Honestly 1/2 of my wardrobe is Lulu. When I spend over $100 per article of clothing, I take care of it. So I went and posted a review of the quality of the last scuba hoodie I purchased along with the poor service I received, and they would Not approve the review... WOW. It is truly saddening to see them treat loyal customers like this. Years Lulu... And thousands of dollars with your store. Unfortunately no more. This is the email they wrote back to me saying they would not approve the review 🤣 Thanks for taking the time to post a review. Since the current review is not mainly about the fit or function of the garment, I won’t be approving it. If you’ve tried the  Scuba Hoodie *Light Cotton Fleece and would like to share what you loved and didn’t like about it, I encourage you to write a new review.I hear where you're coming from—quality is at the heart of everything we do, and I can understand how experiencing this with your gear would make you feel. Please know your thoughts are incredibly valuable to us, and I'll be sure to pass your feedback on this experience forward. It sounds like you've already been in conversation with our Returns team—they're experts in all things product, and know our gear inside and out. If you'd like to continue the conversation with them, I'd encourage you to respond to the last email they sent your way and they'll get back to you within 5-7 business days.If anything else comes up for you, you're more than welcome to respond here.Warmly,Javelle Sorry Lulu you have lost me for good now. Trying to control the narrative of your online/ review and reputation...

Absolutely appalling service at lululemon, paid £70 for leggings which are damaged, seem all burst away and pull if threads in the thigh, asked for an exchange and was told the damages were caused by me so refusing an exchange or refund. Advised me to take item in store - it is a lockdown and no stores are open! Will never buy from here again.

i shop quite often at lulu and in Kelowna downtown but today was different Courtney helped me along with Lesia today i was looking for pants and we chatted a bit and when it came time to check out i was ready to pay when they told me my pants were gifted to me today .. i was so surprised and also so very great-full. but all staff at this location deserve a pat on the back as everyone is always so happy and help-full

Lululemon Athletica is the worst for online Customer Service, their products are mis-represented for sizing and they are horrible to get a purchased product returned or exchanged. I will never again make a purchase from Lululemon Athletica! Absolutely the worst online Customer Service experience I’ve ever encountered. Please shop and make your purchases at a more reliable and trusted source.

Terrible store manager  very rude went in to Lululemon ponsonby store  to see if I could get my tights repaired as the stitching was  unraveling  what I got was a huge big rant and rave about  we no longer do repairs   We no longer offer any garment quality   Or replacement unless she says the tights are only a month old three months max because the latest ones we have issues  with  she then went on to say we don’t offer any  product     Support because I’ve been here three years as store manger and never seen those tights  literally  she was on her high horse  rant which made me very angry considering my very first question to her when she served me was in after the new blue top you have just released ! I was pissed and told her so  I asked for her name she said Sam the manager     She then  accused me of taking a photo of her! When I actually fact  I took a pick of the top I was after she demanded I leave so I said I’ll write a review  she goes great    Write as many as you want !   This store sales person  could have said to me sorry we no longer do repairs  however there’s a place we recommend   to get the stitching  repaired  it would have saved her a lot of breath and she would have made a sale  and I wouldn’t have been so pissed with the way she ranted at me !

Hello All,After weeks of writing for poor quality lulu yoga pants and told there is nothing the can do. I suggest you stay away from the brand.. poor fabric that is pilling and they ask for pictures after much back and fourth to only say after 3weeks of this none sense sorry the product doesn’t meet your standard but we can not issue a return. You are better off buying Walmart tights at 20$ and throw them in the garbage after 2-3 months then to buy lulu’s at 100$ and throw them after 2-3months. Quality is extremely “Lousy” and not worth the price. BTW bought a pair from gym shark so far into the 3rd month and still running with them, not see through nor pilling. Go gym shark !!!

the leggings felt cheap although they were quite expensive, also I'm having all sorts of trouble trying to send them back. Been waiting for a shipping label for over 10 days now (?), and it seems like I'll just have to pay for the return myself.EDIT: i finally got a label and was able to get my money back (very quickly too!) so 4 stars because i really didn't like the quality of the leggings :(

Terrible company!  I tried placing an order.  Their system couldn’t process my credit card and told me it would take 24-48 hours for someone to fix and get back to me.  Upon their suggestion I called my credit card company to make sure it wasn’t on my end. I knew it wasn’t!  My card is fine!!!   This is a terrible company!  I will not buy here!!!On a follow up call from Lululemon the wanted a copy of of my credit card statement to verify!  Verify what?   I have never heard of such a thing. The the associate said that would be the only card you can use for purchases but you can provide other debit /credit card statements then you would be able to use those too for payment.I forgot to mention the payment was a $160 gift card for lululemon was approved and the payment we are talking about that I need to send my billing statement to be “approved” was for $7.64.  And this was for my credit card or my debit card.

ordered an item but when it didn't arrive and I tracked the parcel I found they had labelled the package incorrectly leaving out the house number. When I contacted customer service they said it was too late for them to contact the courier and I would have to do it myself and it would take at least 4 days for them to send out again? I called UPS (which in my opinion I shouldn't have to, they should!) UPS said no problem, they changed the address and arranged delivery for next working day. Lululemon just didn't seem to care. I will not invest any more money with them. They're not cheap and I expect a better service. Ive worked for online sales and we would never have sent out a parcel with half an address!!
Love their leggings! Have always been my favorite!

Lululemon has the worst quality control over sale items, and they won't approve your review about negative experience.My experience is the final sale items highly likely to be defect, so don't buy.Lululemon just assuming all negative reviews are bad customer that want to return the used item. I would like to hear others experience before making a purchase of sale items. If I know sale=final sale= defect or used. I will think about it.The final sale items are likely having tag pinned on the cloth, which means you never qualify for a return if something wrong with the item because they need to confirm the tag is still on, which never on when it arrived. And they make you feel like you are a bad customer just want to get returns after using the items.My experience is I got a jacket with a hair sewed in the cuff by manufacturers that I can not take it out myself. Plus it's kinda disgusting to do so. Another it's a used jacket that smell like Tide. The second one I just put in washer. The first one it's in trash now...Don’t know how to attach their emails for not approving my reviews and assuming I want a return and tell me need tag on to qualify. And also want to attach the hair in cuff of the jacket.Tip for consumers:Lululemon doesn’t stand behind their quality, so final sale means used clothes or defect without return. Don’t trust their customer service about offering a return, they will never accept their fault and only issue a one time exception. Unless you feel comfortable about accepting their kind exception and admit they have not fault and you are just a bad customer wants a return.

It’s been more than a month for my return, after following more than ten times I still don’t have an answer on my refund. Really bad customer service and very disappointed with how lululemon operates, not sure if I will ever get my money back

the leggings were itchy!!! now, I am trying to send them back. Return policy awful.... customer service horror... finally  found a way to return them from CH to the Netherlands. lululemon sent me an incomprehensible instruction via email on how to return them with customs papers (no customs papers were enclosed in the email!) NIGHTMARE

THE PHOTOGRAPH ON THE SITE ARE BEAUTIFUL AND STYLE IS GREAT BUT THEY SENT YOU CHEAP AND THIN DRESS !!!!!!!!!!!! I was highly disappointed with their clothing !!!!! A dress that was advertised, when I received it, the item looked NOTHING like what they advertised. It looked as if they found the cheapest knockoff camo print available and passed it off The clothes are an entirely different material than marketed. Very thin and cheap. I ordered a jogger set and you can feel the sequins on the inside of the bottoms, horrible quality. They also sent a 2x bottom and Xl top. I cannot wear the 2x and I'm a size 16/18. Three outfits at 120.00 and I cannot wear them and the quality is horrible! I can only imagine how long this will take to sort out considering I just received this order over a month after ordering. I emailed them several times for a refund and still no luck!! I went online and I found their CUSTOMER TEAM HELP WHICH IS ₑᵢᘜₕₜ ᖴₒᵤᵣ ᖴᵢᵥₑ ƒᵢᵥₑ ₜաₒ ₒₙₑ ₛₑᵥₑₙ ₜwₒ fₒᵤᵣ fᵢᵥₑ I reach out to the company on March 15, because I have got the WRONG shipment their customer service was awesome in getting my return information and amount back from this company .but their clothing is HORRIBLE!!! I will never spend another brown penny with them EVER! DONT ORDER FROM THEM !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
poor customer service. I returned the unwanted items about two months ago and am still waiting to get my full refund. Poor refund process will damage your customer relationship.

I broke down and bought a final sale item.The Pack it Down Long Shine jacket fits great. Weight is just right as we move into Spring. Shipping was faster than expected.However (shouldn’t start a sentence with ‘but’) - the zipper is really really cheap! Lulu should do better (original price is $269). I’m just concerned it will break. Even my Uniqlo down items are better built!
I've been ordering from lululemon ever since lockdown started and I love everything that I've received so far. the only downside to lululemon is how expensive everything is

Shocking customer service - purchased online, waited 10 days and still no product. Attempted to live chat where I was told they needed to start a trace and this would take 4 days. I asked to cancel and receive a refund and was told there is nothing they could do? They took the funds on day one. I am now left with an outgoing on my bank account and no coat. This was my first time.... running back to Sweaty Betty as fast as I can!

Horrible quality leggings and customer service! Bought multiple pairs of $120 leggings and some are falling apart. They are thinning and threads are coming out even after taking excellent care of them! I sent all information including pictures to customer services and they say it's not under their "manufacturing defects" and therefor not eligible for returns. I will NEVER again buy from Lululemon and waste my money on poor quality clothing.
Purchased pants, very good quality. The only thing is that delivery took too long.

I love shopping at Lululemon, they ship fast with free shipping! It's the most comfortable sportswear ever! However one thing I am not happy is that once they are on sale, it's always out of sizes or colors for selection. So I have to choice a color that I am not really into. They just rarely go on sale. I love the define jacket!  Please put it on sale so I can buy more!

Absolutely horrible customer service. Worst of any place I’ve ever shopped. Order didn’t arrive even though their site says it has but also says there was a weather delay. Called 3 weeks after this date the package was apparently delayed. Told I had to wait the “lengthy” investigation process. Or to call FedEx myself. Asked for a Supervisor or Manager told “they didn’t have any on the floor”. Asked for an email address told they would take my feedback and that’s it. So I’ve been charged $200 with no product and no resolution.

I bought my first Align pants in 2016 in NY - based on recommendations from friends. I simply love them. I since then bought several others and highly enjoy them.I recently bought the On the Fly pants - and that’s it, I no longer need to buy any other pants! They just fit any occasion and are so confortable - the cut is perfect!!It is true that the price is rather on the expensive side - a slightly lower price would make it more affordable and would convince more people to buy them.
Missing order, takes 4 days to do a trace, poor customer service. Paid in full, did not receive anything. I hope the bank will follow through the chargeback.

EXCEPTIONALLY difficult to return an item, particularly if it is faulty. They make the process purposely very lengthy and there are no apologies from the "customer service" team. Not what you expect when paying nearly £90 for a pair of leggings. AVOID.
Three orders all separately cancelled - waste of time company, they don’t really offer any help

Ordered some leggings for a gift - they didn't put complete address on the shipping order so it was eventually returned to them. I had to do all the tracking and chasing up of the item & customer service is rubbish - they couldn't give a stuff. No apology, I had to reorder my original item - missed the gift occasion - still waiting for a refund on original order nearly 2 months later. Quality ok but can buy the same for a quarter of the price with much better customer service. Definitely won't be purchasing from them again & do not recommend! Save yourself the cost & hassle by shopping elsewhere!

I had a terrible experience with their online customer service team (via the chat). I contacted them as I was frustrated with inconsistent sizing for clothing, for example, the same top in different colours doesn't fit the same. This has caused me to have to return a lot of things, which during a pandemic is not ideal as many UPS drop off locations are closed, or not safe due to being located in small convenience stores with poor ventilation and little social distancing. When I explained this to the agent, their response was complete disinterest - and arrogantly stated "well I won't be offering any compensation". I hadn't even asked for any, and that was their attitude from the onset.Not a single apology, no recognition of the poor experience and certainly no acknowledgement of Lululemon' sizing issues, which clearly is widespread based on online reviews. Have now returned most of the items in question and will not be purchasing from them again. Do not recommend this company to anyone, it doesn't deserve your custom.
Nice product. I brought one 1 year ago and it still looks great. So I brought another one. The price is high but it's worth it. I still will recommend my yoga friends to try.

Bought online yoga top and bottom, they have send me only top without any notice, because bottom is out of stock. You don't need only top when you buy 2 pieces yoga suit. After 3 days I have checked the bottom I have ordered and they are in stock, but they are not in reality, so they don't refresh their website stock in even 3 days, ridiculous, never again.

Sent an item with a tag on, first they said I could 'wait until the shops open' which is 2 months away, then they  arranged a courier to take the tag off but forgot to tell me they couldn't actually do this so I was sitting waiting for a parcel that would never arrive. The customer service send automated email templates without even reading your email.
Respond in a reasonable time frame and offer helpful solutions!

I have been nothing but disappointing in this company. They are absolutely over priced. I have only owned products from lululemon for a little over a year. I got my first pair of leggings for Christmas of 2019. I had to return them after two weeks because there was a hole in the pocket and the seams were torn. I got another pair about a month later (because of procrastination) with no issues because of their “quality promise.”  However, a little less than a year into wearing the ones I exchanged, there is a needle size hole in the front of my left leg. I was told me they wouldn’t help nor exchange because it did not fit under their “quality promise.”  I absolutely refuse to waste another $100 plus on a pair of cheap leggings and bad customer service. I have a pair of sams club leggings that I’ve owned for over two years with no cosmetic issues that I paid under $20 for. Save your money for better quality. Lululemon

I had no issues what so ever with this company, I needed help with sizing so I chatted online with customer service and they where lovely, I received the clothes within 2 days and they fit like a glove I am so in love! I WILL BE ORDERING AGAIN!!!

Coming up 6 weeks since my item was returned to lululemon. A rep from the customer team told me ‘expect the refund in your account tomorrow’. When it didn’t appear I followed up and was told ‘we’ll process your refund in 3-5 business days, the refund will then show between 3-10 business days after... Honestly, it’s not worth it. My first purchase of lululemon and it will be my last. Find what you want somewhere else.

So I got given a GIFT VOUCHER because the gifter didn't want to offend me by getting the wrong size. I order a pair of leggings, they didn't look great so I asked the gifter to just ask for a refund for their voucher they purchased and I will return the leggings so we can find another brand to buy off which suited me better. LULU told me they do not issue refunds to the initial purchasers of the voucher. this is wrong as it should be treated as a normal sale. They were better off getting me the wrong item that way they were entitled to their money back.

Amazing service from their GEC team - on hand to support with anything from general enquiries, questions about clothing and sizing and problem solving returns / refunds. Will order over and over again

I’m a petit size mother of 2 beautiful girls. Myself and my 2 daughters are in love with every and anything Lululemon sells. Their leggings are not cheap but so worth every penny we spend on them. Love this brand.

I have been going back and forth with Lululemon about a refund for weeks now. I sent the item back, they received and told me they would refund me the money. Instead, they sent me a random gift card. I have gone back and forth them with no idea as to why I received a gift card. They keep responding with the same gibberish. Now I have to call my bank and beg them to give me the money back and send them all of the emails that Lulu representatives said about getting me a refund back to my Visa. I can't take this. One, don't ever buy if you even think you might return. Two, do not order over the phone or online. The reason I had to return is because the leggings looked absolutely nothing like how they did in the picture. Not even relatively close. I went online and read through the comments and they all said the same thing. Make sure you read reviews before you buy something. I won't be buying from Lulu for a long time after this. Also, only buy stuff on sale. Their $%*& is not worth it full price, not EVER.

Really bad experience with delivery.  Fed ex does not even call.  They make you run around to pick up.  You then get patronized by educators when you need info on how to get what you paid big money for.  They really don’t give a crap.  So so frustrated.  Birthday gift gone wrong.

Geez did anyone not read my review the other week?...be careful guys/gals...unless you have a nice UPS person phone you, your doomed, over half the orders have parts of your address missing. I know this as im the Ups person that tries to sort it out..not the worst shipper but just bear in mind, when you check out from paying on website, it deletes your house name/house number..We get approx 50 orders like this each day in our depot and this is even since Lululemon have had a UK warehouse (couple months).

Lululemon disregards the fact that UPS didn't attempt delivery at the recipient's home address but instead left it at an UPS access point which is not what i have requested for. Trying to get the customer service team ''educators'' or the resolution team to understand the miss here was the most painful process ever. I was constantly brushed off and was told that if i wasn't willing collect the parcel on my own it will be returned to their warehouse after 7 days and then another 5-7 days to process the refund upon receipt. they didn't want to help with rescheduling delivery, nor replacement delivery nor a refund. all i had was being thrown around between them and ups. will have to contact by bank if need be for the final refund. although i love lululemon's products and have been loyal for many years, i am very disappointed from this experience and will not buy again from them as it clearly shows me that they are irresponsible and do not care about their paying customers.
Rubbish service don’t bother spending your money with them.

Lulu lemon customer service is joke. They don’t stand behind their products and treat their customers like dirt. From their leggings pilling after one wash and saying that’s normal wear and tear to sending me dirty items in my order.For how much you spend on items you should be getting top notch service as well as items that don’t pill after after a wash. Amazon treats their customers better

Lululemon should be called the ‘lemon’ with their appalling service and unethical behaviour. I ordered an item which was apparently shipped on 16th of Jan and money taken out of my account on the same day. Three weeks on, I am still waiting. I made several calls and emails and was told investigation will take 3-5 working days - Then another email that investigation is complete and the order may be lost and had to be reprocessed which takes another 3-5 days and a further 2-4 for deliveries. Over a week later I received another email that the stock is no longer available but happy for me to choose a similar product or a credit note - The irony is that when I logged back into Lululemon, the product and the size was still available- I even tried to order 2 and order was okay to process. Now I can see why nearly 70% reviewers are given Lululemon 1star. Really terrible. Money should ideally only be taken out after delivery is made not when shipped as shipment does not guarantee delivery.  I initially gave Lululemon 1star and happy to confirm that the order arrived eventually and Lululemon has apologised and are processing a refund - 4 stars for responding and taking action

Leggings arrived with security tag attached. Emailed customer service - was told I could send them back to get tag removed but that it would take a while. Next day the story changed, and I would have to either take them to a shop ( currently closed) or return for a refund as the warehouse is “too busy”. Latest email from customer service states  they are not allowed to remove tags at the warehouse  because of Brexit. This is my third bad experience with lululemon customer service. I won’t be buying anything from them again. The clothes are good , but not good enough to make me want to put up with the customer service issues - especially considering the price of the products

I placed an online order and after a week or so of no indication the order was in process, I contacted customer service.  They told me to wait another week.  The order never arrived and the tracking info was nonexistent.  I contacted customer service.  They emailed me that the items were now out of stock and I would be refunded for the order.  OMG.  Also, the chat feature through the web site is not functional although it leads you to believe you are in a hold queue.  If not for their amazing leggings, I'd never buy from them again.

My order never arrived, it appears as returned to sender because damaged before it arrived at my address. I have been trying to connect with the customer service via phone (waited 50 minutes then call dropped, called again and still wait time is 50 minutes) or chat (waiting time 50 minutes). I am still waiting to communicate with someone.
Customer service wait time is50 minutes, and that's on a good day. Online chat is 35 minutes. Every time i call it's the same. For the prices they charge, they can hire more service reps!!!
I ordered in the Black Friday sale in November! Didn’t receive my order until a couple of days before Christmas. Returned items on 28th December and I’m still waiting for my refund!!
STAY AWAY!!!

Placed two orders with them for a running jacket. The first one had a security tag so I returned it. The second arrived. Absolutely fine. However it had the tag on with the price. The label price was £30 less than the price on the website. Why am I paying more than what the jacket actually is. I have complained to customer services. I’m hoping they resolve otherwise i will be reporting them.

I received my leggings after 10 business days of waiting which I feel is ridiculous however what was more disappointing was that the security tag was still attached. When I enquired about the options I was told;It will be 15-20 business days to process the leggings and remove the tag, 2-4 business days to re package and then 3-5 business days to return. Nearly two months to receive the leggings I ordered in December through no fault of my own. The customer representative 'yani' was really rude and condescending. I would think twice about using the brand. Great product but awful awful service.

Ordered Into the Drizzle Jacket, arrived a day later than specified (which was ok) but they forgot to take off the security tag.Without knowing this, I used the jacket immediately, and it triggered the security alarm at the store I went to. As you can imagine it was embarrassing & annoying!I’m still trying to contact Lululemon customer service-no success. Do they have such a thing?? It’s unacceptable to get this kind of service for a supposedly upmarket enterprise. Very disappointing.

They advertise that you can cancel your order within the hour it's made, yet they make it impossible to do so... I made a mistake with my order, which I immediately tried to fix. They direct you to text a number to chat to a representative in order to cancel your order. I did as directed, and was put on an hour long wait list until I was contacted. Since they got back to me over an hour after the order was placed (regardless of me starting the request within minutes of my order being placed), they told me they could no longer cancel/update my order because it was passed the hour cancellation mark...They do not provide you any other way to cancel your order other than contacting their team. The wait to talk to someone is long and surpasses their cancellation timeframe. Since this process is so obviously flawed, I asked if there was any other way to help change my order. There is not. They provided no extra help or direction. They don't allow you to speak to anyone else as apparently there is no management above them to direct you to. The best they can do is offer you to speak with another associate on the same level who will say the same things. On top of this, they are clearly asked to read a script. The response was very robotic and repetitive that they will "share my concern with the Orders Team". This phrase was repeated to the point it was condescending, inhuman, and rude. On top of this, the number they provide you to text appears to be a toll free number. As soon as you message this number it redirects you to a new number in order to continue the chat. The new number is not toll free. Since I am from Canada and was redirected to a Washington State number, my service provider charged me for my out of country conversation. For a company that tries to represent positive movement and feeling in life, it was made very clear that they don't actually care about their consumers.

I ordered a sports bra (brand new) that had a sticker sewn inside two layers while it was being manufactured. It shows through when worn. They refused to return the item , or give me any sort of credit. They do not care about the customer or their product. Refrain from ordering from Lululemon and save yourself the trouble.

I love Lulu.  It started with a trip to a store with my bff in Austin and they gave me, yes GAVE me, a pair of $80 leggings when they found out it was my first time inside. I run many many miles a week and held off on investing in proper running gear until I finally broke down and bought a bunch of expensive pairs of running pants from Lululemon.  What a difference it makes when you purchase something made specifically for running!  No more chafing, rashes, etc.  I have items I've had for years that have held up beautifully when properly washed and cared for.  I have had issues from time to time and the in-store or online help is great. I love their style and I love the quality.  It's fun to come in and shop for goodies during new seasons and get beautiful things to wear around the house now that I telework more often than not.
Terrible customer service, waiting for refund more than a month. Bad qualities!

Poor quality, awful customer service. Wore my align leggings less than ten times. A ladder appeared on the bum area with no explanation. Was told it was external force and although I paid £88 for a pair of leggings worn approx 8 times, that are designed for sports and endurance, they won't look into it further and will not send a replacement or refund. DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THEM!

Worst customer service ever , willNever buy again ! Been waiting the best part of a month for my money back and all I get is excuses and wait another 3-10 days . Absolutely shocking , avoid unless you like wasting money !

Worst customer service ever.I purchased the Mirror through them and have been unable to get any customer support for this product at all. For the past month, every time I have called their 'support' number I get a prerecorded message telling me they are too busy to take my call, and instead to email them and I would hear back in 3-5 business days. When they finally did respond to my first email (days after I sent the inquiry) they didn't answer my question and instead just offered me basic troubleshooting issues I already tried. No real follow up, no phone call, nothing. I doubt the responder even fully read my original message.This lack of support for such an expensive electronic product is unacceptable, and is the main reason I have chosen to return this product. It's such a shame the Mirror was acquired by this company, it could have been a wonderful addition to my home. Instead it's an overpriced mirror that will not turn on. Can't wait to return this product.

Had previously bought a part in the states a few years ago and loved them. decided to order some however they are horrible quality. Followed all instructions for washing and they were faulty after a couple of wears.... not so great when they were £120. Contacted company with pictures. This company took no blame and told me it was my own fault even though the product is defective and I clearly got a pair of dodgey leggings. Refused to replace them or give me a refund. AVOID THIS COMPANY

Fab products & no issues with online orders whatsoever. Ordered loads of stuff during sale period - all came, all fine. Returned some & refunds took 7 to 10 days to credit back to my account. I didn't have to contact their customer service to be honest just waited & it's all fine. When the shops are open I would just bring a return to them i.e. having a refund quicker. Having said that, not sure how Brexit will affect shopping online though... Their products are being shipped from Germany so I am a bit hesitant placing any orders now as I am afraid to be hit by extra import/customs clearance duties etc.

Two Things I ordered came to me, one jogger that was supposed to be black was spotted with multi colored balls, the sports bra was worn already and had sweat and deodorant all over it.. I’m still waiting for my return credit, don’t have it and the returned products got there 2 weeks ago!  This store is overpriced for crappy service and clothes!

Bought my items in the UK.I ordered a pack it down jacket Chianti Shine on 1st Dec. 2020. I washed it mid-Jan. according to the instructions at 30C. The result was shocking as the jacket became longer and the feather/down moved around, there is no down/feather in the lower back anymore and cannot be shaked back! It should have been labelled as dry-clean perhaps! In addition, one of the light support bras I bought around July/August are already broken near one of the stripes. I bought three pairs the same so each were worn not much. This is the 1st time my sport bras broke in my 14 years gym history. The Lidl brands feel much more stronger!
Great products. I always know the sizes are consistent and the quality is consistent.  Most of the staff know me by name. One of the best values is free alterations.
Worst customer service. Bought a yoga mat which after a couple uses has huge gashes all over it.  It’s like the material just balls up and dissolves. They will nor let me return it.

Worst experience of my life!  Ordered a pair of leggings which have never arrived and tried multiple times to get a hold of customer service.  Crazy long hold times only to be disconnected multiple times.  Live online chat no better with long wait times and kicked out of that as well.  Also kicked off the text chat. When I finally reach someone after 4 hours of holding/waiting they say they have to open an investigation that takes 4 days and they promise I'll have resolution after the 4 days.  It's been over 4 days and no contact from lululemon/customer service.  I'm typing this as I've been on hold again for another 35 minutes so far.  All I want is my money back since I never received the item.  What a joke this process has been.  They should refund my money and still send the leggings for all the hassle I've been caused.  They can take your money and order...it just may not arrive and you may have a hard time getting a refund/cancellation.  Beyond frustrating.

I have a closet full of Lululemon pants.   About twelve  pair. I am 78 years old.  I spend a lot of money on your clothing, both for myself and my grand daughter.  I do not sweat nor do I do yoga.  I walk four miles a day.  I wear your  pants  because they are so comfortable and make my back feel good.  Last week I bought Align 28 in an offwhite/light gray color at your Scottsdale,  AZ store in The Quadrant. .  This is the second wearing of these pants.   Yikes...They are ALL pilled and snagged at the top of the thigh.  I did nothing to these pants except walk in them.   Come on Lululemon!   I assume you  factory test the fabrics you use,  so you must know there are pilling problems with this batch/or color.  I was going to buy another pair today, but not now.  I look forward to your reply.

Item dispatch took way longer than the ‘1-3 day’ dispatch quoted on website. Half my address was missing on dispatch, my ups delivery been delayed AT LEAST 5 days (and what a nightmare getting hold of them!). The these guys finally reply days later stating they’ve instructed ups to change my address - no doubt now adding on more days to the delay in delivery.And yet somehow amazon manages to maintain one day delivery throughout covid/Xmas.This is my first purchase from lululemon and it will be my last.

I ordered some pants and shirt for my son who is going back to college after xmas break (so would like to have sooner than later). Ordered on 12/28/2020... haven't seen it arrive so I checked status and it implied that the items were delivered on 1/4/2021. So, I checked the website and got a Fedex tracking number.  There was NO info for the tracking number.  So, on 1/5/2021 ... went to website and got on chat bot waiting for over an hour and then had to take a call. Of course, someone answered the chat during my 10 min call.  Murphy's law.  Went on chat bot again today - over an hour wait.  And, Lulu says, yes, your order was lost in transit... we'll reprocess order in 3-5 days and I'd get another email when it finally processes. So, I said "really" and then another 10 days for it to arrive?  They said, we can just refund your money. And, I said that I'd like to have the product that I ordered, I just didn't think that it would take over 20+ days to receive it. And, that's NOT the level of service that I expect from the Lulu. So, just not a great experience overall.  BTW- I bought stock in Lulu back in 2007 when they went public.  Come on - don't devalue my stock w/ bad customer service practices.Update on Jan. 26... no email no order no contact from Lululemon.  Wow. Update - Spoke to CS (on hold for around 40 mins) on Jan 26. Order was never resent (BTW they have had my money for a month).  So, the 'educator' resent my order - 3rd time - and gave me a $30 gift card for my troubles (very nice).  I ordered a top for myself.  The top arrived w/in a few days... crickets still on my son's clothing.  It finally arrived on Feb 1.  BUT the pants were an XS... LOL - I would never have ordered an extra small for my 18 year old - OMG.  Filled out a return and asked for a credit at Lulu since I'm reordering the pants.  Well, no credit appeared within 24 hours so I'm paying another  $138 to have the pants shipped out today (4th time). I am on hold for an hour w/ CS again. I told my son... it's xmas in Feb! Thx Lulu, I can't even express my level of disbelief in this entire transaction.  I've been a pretty loyal customer but I'll rethink ordering online in the future.

I have to say this was my first time purchasing the hyped up “lululemon” leggings. I don’t buy into fads very quickly. So, I was reluctant to buy their overpriced “final sale” leggings at $79 + tax. I finally gave in and what a mistake. My honest review... They’re lousy! Ridiculously overpriced, extremely cheap material, and inaccurate sizing! If I went to Walmart I would have obtained  a better quality leggings for under $20. Take my advice don’t buy.....
Love, love, love this store. They really do make high quality leggings, though the price is a bit too high.

I have been a fan of men's surge line for some time.This holiday reason, had an opportunity to get some at a discount using their website. Easy experience and got to my door within 3 days after ordering. Can't wait to rock the new surge joggers!

I bought a 300 dollars purple puffer coat online and as soon as I started wearing it the purple layer started to come off with the minimal friction, and it left a black-gray material visible, like the purple was some sort of paint that would come off easily. I was devastated, I have never felt robed like this by a store, I complained about the quality, I sent pictures, I asked for my money back, but they only gave a me a “60 dollars giftcard”. Shame on you lululemon! I put the coat in the trash can after 1 month of purchasing it!

The company charges an exorbitant amount for really poor quality products. I tried to leave an honest review about some leggings that I bought — they were completely see through and therefore unwearable. I was respectful but honest in my review. They wouldn’t post it because it didn’t meet their guidelines, which makes me think they are hiding bad reviews so that people purchase their products. Unacceptable and unethical business practice as well as poorly made products makes for a bad company.

I'm not sure if this is company policy or just the Lexington Kentucky store but I purchased an item recently on sale. Not a clearance sale just a regular sale. And then needed to return it and was informed that I can either return it or exchange it. I find this unacceptable. It was not posted anywhere in the store and when I spoke with the clerk she said that the information was on my receipt. So I had to purchase an item to find out that I can't return it? If this isn't changed I will never step foot in a Lululemon store again.

I don't even want to give Lululemon one star. I placed an order on Christmas day for 2 items via Apple Pay and forgot to change my address (I've recently moved). I tried calling customer service to get the address updated but their customer service was closed and not opening back until December 26th at 8am EST. I did receive a message that nothing could be changed within 60 minutes of the order being placed but I tried not to think too much into that since there was no way for me to cancel the order or change the address and customer service was not available. I called back the morning of the 26th only to be told that there was nothing that they could do and that I'd need to call FedEx once the order had shipped. Half of my order shipped, so I called FedEx only to be told that it would be a $17 charge for the change of shipping address. I'm not about to pay $34 extra for a change of address that is less than an hour from my old home. I cannot go to the old home, as it has since been sold and I'm unaware of who lives there. So it looks like I'm out $70 because Lululemon wouldn't change my address or cancel my order when I called them as soon as they re-opened. How is this good customer service? The shipment hasn't even left their warehouse. They can absolutely make this change and make a customer happy, but they're too stuck up their own legging covered asses to make the change. I will NEVER buy from these guys again and will be sure that my friends and family know how absolutely terrible their customer service is.

I received a gift from my mom for Christmas which was a lululemon jacket which had bought on sale and was a bit too small for me. We’re in a lockdown in London so all stores are closed so I had to call in and see how I could exchange it to get the sale price still. A very rude young lady told me there’s nothing I can do except return it by Mail since I can’t get to a store. I said I’d like to speak to a supervisor as it seems like they should be a bit lenient considering the current situation. After putting me on hold for 5 minutes she came back on saying a supervisor is unavailable and when I asked when will they be available she said they won’t be contacting you about this. I said so you’d rather lose the sale than exchange it at the same price how does that make any business sense? She said that’s all I can do. So I said ok then you’ve lost my business and she laughed. So this is the worst customer service experience I’ve had in a very long time and I will never be shopping there again.

I have never actively sought out a space to write a review of dissatisfaction until now. I have never received such horrible customer service until today. As a long-standing customer who loves the products despite them being ridiculously over-priced, today was the last straw and I will sadly never shop with them again. They do not allow returns with tags on and receipt. Merchandise credit only. Also no returns on merchandise purchased with tags or receipt if they were marked down. Do NOT buy these products as gifts. Do not buy unless you have tried them on and ensure they fit and you 100% will keep them. Also-there are many other brands out there now with equal quality and half the price. Sorry LuLu. You’re done here.
Amazing products, helpful kind employees, worth every penny, clothing lasts decades. I am a yoga instructor and this is the brand I trust for quality.

As a longtime Lululemon devotee of nearly 15 years, it’s sad how much their customer service has declined this past year, even for a Sweat Collective member like myself. It started with my Sweat Collective account being removed from the Holiday mailing list with no explanation or attempts to contact me and even refusing to tell me why I was removed in the first place.Then I received a $200 gift certificate this Christmas that I am unable to use via their online portal, as there seems to be either a glitch with my account or the payment portal service they are using. I’ve spoken to 5 different Lululemon employees, using their online chat service, texting and Instagram, with no resolution, and even several outright refusals to cancel and refund the gift certificate to the purchaser, as I cannot use it. I’m currently in a location with no brick and mortar stores and the online portal option isn’t working, and Lululemon is refusing to issue a refund. Now we have to jump through more hoops and contact the issuing bank to get a refund, a chargeback for non-delivery of products/services not rendered.I guess it’s time to join Lolë’s community instead.

I absolutely love my lulu sweat pants.  I used to think lulu was just for women to do yoga in!  My roommate now works for them and I can't wait to get my hands on one of their hoodies.  I'd rather pay more for a quality product any day.
Ordered on the 14. They said expedited shipping. Now it says will arrive on the 29th. Spoke with an educator. Rude and of no help.
I baught gift cards. The recipient rejected the gift.Lululemon will refund merchandise but not a GIFT CARD .I am stuck with an dishonest merchant This is how they make money. money.

I purchased 4 items in November for my daughter to ensure I could get the sizes, styles, and colors she wanted in plenty of time for Christmas. One week later I received one of the four items and received an email that the last three items were being processed. After an additional week I received another email that the final items had been processed & shipped - I was issued a fedex tracking number. Seven days later I still had not receiving anything so I called fedex and the operator stated even though a tracking number had been issued they as the carrier had still not received a package. I called lululemon and spoke with an "educator" who informed me that they would put a trace on the package and provide me with status within 24hrs. 24hrs later I still had heard nothing. After being patient and waiting 48hrs I called lululemon again and spoke to another educator. They stated they were still tracing the package but not to worry and ensured me all orders before December 20th would arrive in time for Christmas. Today is December 17th and I have now spoke to my third educator who informed me today they can't locate the package and they no longer have the products in stock that I ordered back in November! Seriously! I had two options: they could refund my money or keep the existing order and the educator hoped to be able to fufill it by the end of January! I have never had such a bad online purchasing experience and dealt with such poor customer support! I canceled my order and they said it will take 2 to 4 weeks to refund my money - this ought to be an interesting experience! The educator said I hope you have a great Christmas and lululemon fulfilled all your needs?! Are u ‘F'ing kidding me?! The crazy thing is it's not like their stuff is cheap - those four items was over $500! You would expect spending that kind of money you would get superior customer support! I will never buy anything from lululemon again and I would not recommend anyone else buying their products. If you Google lululemon customer experience you will see numerous other people who have had similar experiences. Too many choices on the market lululemon - I hope your business $#*!s the bed!

Terrible customer service for online orders. I received someone else's order today. I tried livechat plus called customer services twice and it is still not resolved. They refuse to send me my order (having taken full payment) in time for Christmas (given these are Christmas presents). They are saying it would be a "free order" to send me my correct items before they process all the details of the incorrect order I received!! Inconveniencing me a lot by requiring me to waste time providing information about the incorrect order they sent because they didn't even include a packing slip or invoice in the parcel. When I asked to speak to a manager, I was told a manager will contact me in 24-48 hours. So I won't get my items in time for Christmas and they refuse to provide a refund as well. All they can do is have a manager call me when they can... what a pity they have such awful customer service when their products are good quality!
Love these leggings great for anyone with a long back as they have a lovely high waist. They also stay in place when running

I have many pairs of Lululemon leggings but lately they hAve not been lasting.  I have 3 pairs that I bought last 6 months.  2 have holes and 3rd one is pulling so badly that you see white under the blue color.  I contacted customer service and they would not do anything.  Very disappointed for $100 leggings. I thought Lululemon would warranty their product.

Seriously terrible.  Ordered a pair of leggings.  A week later they sent me a tracking number, which never updated (so they never shipped them).  A week later, after many emails which they either ignored or sent canned responses too, they finally emailed me back saying “fedex had been unable to deliver them” (even though according to fedex they had never left Canada), and it would take “up to 6 weeks” to get a refund.  No attempt was made on their part to correct the problem or in any way “fix” it.

Online order system is most glitchy I’ve ever experienced. Eventually called 800 # where representative experienced the same issues on in stock items 90 min in calling help desk for another 20 (on regular in stock items).  I. Would have given up If I did not need for Christmas gifts. I felt bad for order rep who said she had been with the company years and was so sorry. She agreed that  It appears efforts to make their system  automated ahead of its time to hire leas staff have created more problems for customers and existing staff.  We love their clothing, but may need to re evaluate in the future as we shop more online.

Hey LuLulemon! I just wanted to say that I love your on the fly trouser. I have a pair of the charcoal cheetah print (UK) and I just bought a few black woven pairs (7/8) from the u.s. they are the most comfortable pant I've ever owned and I love how you can dresses them up or down. One suggestion I would have for you is to create a winter version of the pant, with fleece lining. I love uniqlos heattech (fleece) trousers but would much prefer an on the fly version!

I purchased quite a lot of gear from this store, thinking that they are a good, responsible brand. Let me share my experience with you so you can think twice if you want to purchase from them.They sent me a product I ordered for Christmas with its security tag attached to it. I called them and asked them for a solution to take the tag. They suggested they can send me a return label to send it back. I agreed. Then I received an email which said that I would get my return label in up to 12 days, then will organise my own return within 30 days, then they will send it to get the tag taken out up to 20 days and then they will send the package back to me in 1 week.When I asked them why on earth I would tie up my money for such a long time waiting for them to do what they should have done right in the first instance, they said I can complain if I want to.Isn't that amazing customer service?

Incorrect items arrived, wrong size & style to what I ordered. No return sales slip in the package.  My email has been ignored and I am down E130.I feel cheated & robbed by this company. Appalling service.

I echo the bad reviews and diabolical follow up with customer service. The Lululemon online ordering site is the WORST on the net and I have had nothing but trouble. It constantly rejects my card and I order on line 10 times a day. When I wanted to buy a gift certificate and AGAIN my card was rejected I called customer service and their response was "I will give you the number of our 3rd party gift card supplier". NOT A SOLUTION.  I spend a ton of money with them and my wife a great deal more. I am done!!

received everything on time, but these heads in the clouds forgot to take out the security clip from one item so I can't wear it. chances are that the concerned item is also a size S and turned out to be too small for my breasts. so I would have had returned it anyways, but the security clip left on it was an additional negative feature

Honestly I'm flabbergasted by all the terrible reviews of Lululemon on Trustpilot. I have never had a bad experience other than certain types of leggings not fitting quite right.
