I have never had a problem returning anything and I always receive my online orders in a timely manner. Aligns are quite literally the softest leggings and I have yet to have a pair fall apart on me.

I am so disappointed with LuLuLemon lately, the service I have received has been appalling.For the amount of money I have spent in the past and the amount I planned on continuing to spend you’d think they would bend over backwards to fix what has gone on. They did the complete opposite. I asked to speak to a manager and they even told me there wasn’t one.At this point, beyond using a gift certificate that I received from a friend, I’m never purchasing LuLuLemon attire again and I will spread the word on my experiences with LuLuLemon to my friends and family to ensure no one buys any certificates for me in the future and hopefully doesn’t buy product from them again either.I have had nothing but issues placing numerous orders the last few days, I’ve missed discounts for Black Friday and cyber Monday due to the discrepancies.I am just happy to part ways with this company.

Cute leggings but.....I bought this leggings for over 110 dollars. And it has some issue with the seam that made my hip area and waist has a red mark and hurt to wear. So I brought to the store with tags still on. And I bought 10 days ago. Explained what’s happening. And the lady was so rude to me. Said she doesn’t see any quality issue without look at my legging at all. She said even I paid over 110 for it. But was on sale. There is nothing she can do.that I should decide before I buy a sale item. That’s the risk to take. I ask for the manager. Get the same answer! I am very disappointed how they treated me. I always loved lululemon. But the store worker has been mean and rude. I feel sad I don’t want to go back to a store that I love for a long time.

Appalling customer service. Returned the item and weeks later still waiting for a refund. Called customer services, or educators as they like to be known. They are not helpful and at times just rude! Keep telling me that they have processed my refund and I keep showing them evidence that they have not!

I received a gift card, I was unable to log into the card for 2 weeks with daily emails about the gift card showing page not valid. Once I asked for a refund they sent me a valid link, after checking out the lululemon website states the gift card does not work and to use paypal or credit card to pay. I am shocked as Lululemon is a publicly traded company. I am the biggest lululemon supported and a yoga teacher. I always preach about quality of Lululemon and this is so disappointing. I received this gift card from a student who knows how much I love Lululemon.I do not recommend using Lululemon online or definately not giving their gift cards!Beware!

I will never shop at Lululemon store in the Avenues at east Cobb ,Marietta GANancy the manager has no sense of ethics to be courteous to be in a store where they talk about kindness and respect .Never going to this place again!!Lenox and Avalon we shop all the time never like this store .

So my boyfriend and I went into a lululemon outlet in St. Louis to exchange some pants and they forced us to wear a mask, then when I tried to do my return the employees were kinda rude so this time was not a very pleasant visit...

3 orders at separate times, issues with every order, wrong sizing, order cancelled because out of stock after confirmation... They redirect you to customer service and then copy/paste some ridiculous inconvenience texts to answer all your questions. No rectification whatsoever!! My god... Such expensive products and suuuuch terrible customer service.

First time buying from Lululemon, terrible experience. Actually surprisingly terrible. I ordered a couple of pieces 3- half weeks ago, still haven't got the goods. Customer Svc. girls showed no urgency, BUT they redeemed themselves later by sending me a gift card for amount that you could actually buy something...Which I appreciate, if you do right by your customer...most customers will do right by the merchant...thanks for the gift card...
The $108 bra came apart and they cancelled my sweat collective membership without my knowledge to make me reapply and said that I am no longer eligible.  This place is a rip off
Excellent, useful and easy to use website. I think free gifts are a great way to reward customers. I find that the quality of the clothes I buy is good, the shipping was fast. Fantastic

My daughter has a pair of leggings she has had 1-2 months. Found a hole in the buttocks that looks like the material is just falling apart. Although she loves the feel of them. They are not worth the $ if they are going to fall apart that quickly. Response from the company is they do not replace normal wear and tear. I don’t feel like 1-2 months is normal wear and tear.

Purchased the Lululemon Warm Down HR Jogger pant. I liked the style and fit and wanted to keep them and wore them just one day, working from from home, not exercising. Later, taking the pants off at night, my floor was covered in disintegrating jogger pants - they are REALLY defective. Sent photos to Lululemon who could care less. Lululemon will not refund or replace item. Insisted on giving a store credit. For What?? I don't want to be forced to buy something different!!Worst. Customer. Service. Ever.
I still feel good with my lululemon apparels, my clothes are fantastic specially if you're doing athletic activities.
I received the dress this morning. I can't wait to try it. The size can fit well. Your customer service is excellent. I´m satisfied with this online shopping experience.
Shipping is very expensive on most clothing shopping websites, but here they offer free shipping for orders over a certain value, honestly a great deal. Hope it can incorporate more youthful designs.

The service they offer is simply not up to scratch for a brand that charges such high prices. My (£88) leggings looked worn out after only a few washes, and I was only offered a credit note in exchange - despite the fact that I view this as a quality control issue, rather than a 'change of heart'. In the end their customer service team simply ignored my concerns, which was very frustrating. In addition, the returns process is lengthy and arduous - you have to submit numerous specific photos and describe the issue is a very particular format, then the return takes an abnormally long time to process, despite using UPS as a courier service. Just way too much like hard work for what is, essentially, an average quality, extremely expensive product. Comfy leggings and great brand, but just not worth it.

I am a Personal Trainer and a Zumba Instructor, who  as a first time buyer was not told any information about return policies. After trying to communicate with customer service for more then 5 months after the purchase and return process(I followed all the instructions) I have not received my money back. Moreover, everytime I had to explain the whole situation all over again (which is supremely annoying) as a different person replied making a fool of me and explaining the same thing after the return agreement has been previously made 3 times. Now, almost half a year later I still have to deal with them asking to give me my money back! So Frustrating and disappointing! After such an experience I would never  want to shop with this company again and would spread the word across my friends, clients and colleagues!

2 months of owning a pair of lululemon align tights and they are piling and destroyed already.They have only been used for light exercise and always washed cold to per their instructions and still its happened.Do NOT buy. Not worth the money!!Terrible response from customer service basically blaming me.

I was treated in the most disrespectful manner imaginable today.  I had a gift certificate from Lululemon that I wanted to use and they refused me entry and service due to my not wearing a mask.  They called mall security who then called the police.  The police were very helpful and convinced them to complete my purchase but the staff's behaviour towards me and actions in engaging law enforcement in what ought to have been a friendly and pleasant shopping experience was outrageous.  I will NEVER EVER give them my business again.

Very sad I am giving them one star. Two years ago it would have been 5. I have owned primarily lulu for my daily wear, I teach PE and Yoga. Their leggings used to last me two years before they wore out, and Id occasionally have some with an issue here or there with returns being a breeze. I have been holding onto a few pair to return to a store, I was told they won't take returns due to covid. I have now submitted the same information over 4 times to online specialists. Getting a new person to respond each time asking for the same information once again.I have been at this for months now and just fed up. I am going stop referring lulu to everyone and switch back to Patagonia.
Nice athletic clothingDynamic athletic clothing store! Align leggings are revolutionary, trendy, comfy, great quality and you’ll never regret getting a pair.

Order with UPS never arrived and the company - instead of replacing the order - told me it will take 20 business days to find out what happened to the order. In the meantime, Ive paid for an item that I don’t have and there is nothing else they can do.  By the time the 20 days have passed, the item will probably be sold out in my size.Good customer service would be to send a new item right away, while trying to find out what Happened to the lost order. Or giving the customer a refund.This is the last time I order from this site, despite the fact that I’m addicted to their clothes.
love their leggings however they do start to fray after a couple of wears.

Ordered a shirt, pilling and staining after three washes. They need 7 days and a silly form to ponder their response. They will allow me to return it, but are only offering store credit. So, I bought a defective shirt and they keep my money. I expected MUCH more from this company. Never buying again. Give me a direct line to someone who can make an immediate decision.

This is terrible practice, first order is so messed up that only a moron would have shipped it,I guess that's what happens when you call your csr's educators. Lol maybe educate them on successful shipping practices.  But they give you 25bux in a voucher. I will shop at Nordstrom's from now on.
Worst customer service I have ever received. Sent back two pairs of leggings totalling £176, received an e-gift card 4 weeks later for £54. A complete joke. Won't shop with them again
Love my lululemon sports bras and other apparel. Prices are steep, but my clothing always last a long time. You get what you pay for with lululemon! Wish I could buy a lot more though!!

I bought two sports bras a few months ago and I am incredibly disappointed with the quality of these products. I am cup C (so reasonable breast size) however, the Energy Bra is chaffing on breasts so bad that even after a 5k easy run, the inner down part of the breast is always bloody and all scratched by the poor seaming. With every single run, this bra is doing more harm than good.The fact that you cannot actually review the products you bought on their website, says a lot about the brand. I will definitely not use this sports bra or brand as a matter of fact again!

Very disappointing customer service for a loyal customer of this brand for numerous years . I advised of poor quality of tank top worn once and they continuously reiterated that I was not entitled to a refund or exchange and never acknowledge the poor quality of the product

Pathetic customer service and return policy.  As a brand they are full of their own self importance.  ‘Who could ever make stretchy yoga pants like us?’  You must have a paper receipt from 1984 in order to return anything, even if it’s still in the bag and tagged...

Awful customer service and awful return route. I dont have a printer and only one store provides the correct pre paid service in my area for returns. Im now out of pocket of 75 pound because i cant get the package back. Also a very long lead time for money to arrive back into your account. I have asked for a phone call multiple times and am still waiting. Ping ponging emails from multiple contacts repeating themselves. Disgusting greedy organisation.Tried phoning them and they put you on hold and then hang up??? Whats that about? Poor

English: Ordered three sports bras in May and two of these were too small and the other was perfect. For this reason I had returned two bras. The transaction was done by my credit card, so it would take a while for I get my money back. The 18th of June I took contact with Lululemon, and they said they will return the money in 3-10 days.In July I contacted them for the second time and they said the same (3-10 working days).Unfortunately, no money back until today.Dutch: In mei drie sportbh's besteld en hiervan waren twee te klein en de ander zat perfect. Om deze reden had ik twee bh's retour gestuurd. De transactie is gedaan via mijn creditcard, om deze reden zou er wat tijd overheen gaan voor ik het geld terug zou krijgen. 18 juni contact opgenomen en het zou binnen 3 tot 10 werkdagen op mijn rekening staan. In juli nog eens contact opgenomen en weer dezelfde mail ontvangen (met 3-10 werkdagen zou t erop staan). Helaas nog tot de dag van vandaag geen geld terug.

They were able to find a gift card I thought was lost for good! So grateful for the live chat and there was almost no waiting time. Very patient and I am grateful and amazed they could find it with only the authorization number and the last digits of the card.

The Vaughan Mills location is the worst Lululemon location based on my personal experience! From lengthy unnecessary wait times (virtual and in person line ups), inconsistent and sometimes intrusive staff, to incompetent managers (one guy at least)... They also never pick up the phone, always a voicemail! Even though it is the closest location to me, I've decided to entirely avoid it and drive a little further to get a better overall experience. I do not recommend it!

I purchased a  Love crew Tshirt on my iphone app in February. This weekend I wanted to return this unwashed, unworn, tag attached item and was told I could not that they have a 30 day return policy. I took a screen shot of the return policy on their app that does not mention any time frame and sent it to them. They should stand by behind their app's return policy.

Appalling site. Tried to exchange an item. No return label sent, after complaining I was sent a gift voucher which Neither I nor their customer service rep could apply. Finally bought a replacement top, but was sent a totally different product in a size that wouldn’t fit a child. The original product I had wanted is now out of stock and I’ve been promised a new voucher which won’t cover any alternative products I like. Two phone calls cut off and ‘courtesy’ email was impossible to reply to, responses just bounced back. Hours of wasted time, lost top now impossible to rebuy and a voucher that won’t buy me anything I like. Beware of trusting this hopeless company
The product is way overpriced for the quality. The staff are so fake-woke it's embarrassing. Avoid!
Lulu has def gone from a small boutique brand to a mass market brand, so I'm less excited to pay the hefty price tag, but I still love them.
Quality has been going down! Loved them for years

Hello, I have supported Lululemon from its early days when it started in my city and all the while as it grew into a worldwide corporation. I own many pieces of their clothing, however after recently going through my closet I noted that I do have about 15 particular items that have only been worn a handful of times due to their quality. For example, the 'wonder under' high rise leggings, 'stride jacket', a pair of their ruched leggings, a rash guard, tank top with unraveling threads, merino wool gloves, dress and sweater (itchy, although being advertised as soft), they just sit and look pretty in my closet. They have not served a practical purpose for me so I ended up wasting my money on products that are of bad quality and lack longevity. After many emails back and forth, where I described the items (visuals and details), I was told that they do not fall under their quality promise guarantee. Customer service has kept playing back the same rhetoric, so much that it doesn't even make sense anymore. For example, I explained how their not so 'wunder under' leggings constantly roll down after 10 minutes of wear, resulting in a muffin top (a very obvious defect), I kept getting the same response of how Lululemon does not cover items exposed to 'excessive force/damage'. This left me scratching my head as they have only been worn a handful of times (due to rolling down); they have been like this from the very beginning and only exposed to cold water wash. Lululemon items are SO expensive, so of course a person is going to take note of how to take care of these pieces of clothing. I am Extremely disappointed with how this company absolutely refuses to take any responsibility for selling items that are indeed, faulty. After many years as a loyal client, I am no longer interested in purchasing items that can be hit or miss and then NOT covered by a quality promise in the end (something that is only stated to secure sales for the company, but not to put the mind of the buyer at ease, so beware!) There are many other great brands out there that actually follow through with their promises which I will be happy to support moving forward!

I am so sick of making orders and them getting cancelled because they don’t have the stock. Tonight I got 7, yes 7 emails with the full orders of almost 20 items being cancelled!!!! Why?! Because they do. It have the stock. They need to figure this out, I’m about done shopping and spending my money on this company!! If you do not have the stock, don’t post it for sale!

I purchased visor from the Lululemon on July 19th and returned July 24th. The return processing was too delay so I had to contact the lululemon customer service several times but it was useless info from the customer service. On August 24th, about a month later, I checked USPS tracking again and it was delivered on August 11th but they didn't refund my money yet. So I contacted the customer service AGAIN and requested my money back and they told me that I have to wait again for 3-5 days due to refund processing.  Unbelievable! They already received a returned item about 13 days ago but they didn't even know until the customer contact them! I have ever, never had this kind of experience with any companies in my life.

Like most people on here, I have experienced a terrible refund process. It took about 2+ months to even get into contact with someone AFTER they received my package back. I was then told I had been refunded onto a gift card. I have no idea where that gift card is... there excuse is because of COVID. That is BS. Plenty of other companies can process returns in a timely manner.Also - they would not let me publish a review on their website that stated the colour of the top was not as it was in the photo - be weary.....
Did an online order. Have not received any order confirmation via mobile or email. Will I receive the ordered item? I have no idea. Stay away from this company !
Customer service is not always the best but love the clothes

Zero stars would be more appropriate. I ordered a jacket. It arrived within 3 days. Very good response and delivery method.The jacket was very small, so tried to contact them to return this item . As per their instructions for returns, I did everything possible to adhere to their requirements for returning. They were extremely slow to respond, I am talking weeks. So I sent it back in same package, with all perusing info, ie. original invoice, garment in tact etc . They still have not got back to me, this was 3 weeks ago. I have tried to contact them about this, they said they have not received it back yet. Bit my tracking info from the. Post office says they have received it. There return policy sounded good, however they don’t live up to their own policy. Shame. I will never buy from them again. They have effectively stolen $129.90 from me. How do they get away with this ? But they do and will continue to defraud people into buying. My advice..do not buy from Lululemon. Ever.

If I could give 0 stars, I would.  Ordered almost $200 of clothing online.  They sent me an e-mail to confirm it was delivered, but I never received it.  FedEx delivered to wrong address (yes, they had my correct address), even had signature receiving package.  Live chat with Lululemon "educator" who told me it "wasn't their problem".  I asked for a refund for the items I paid for but didn't received and he hung up the live chat on me without a response.  The only thing the educator taught  me was never to order from Lululemon again.  Be warned.

Lululemon is not worth the money!  Don’t buy their marketing saving products !  I bought a backpack from them that sucks .  The zipper gets stuck on the flap all the time so I went to try to return it and their return process is such a pain in the ass that after several rounds of emails and filling out forms and sending pictures of the merchandise I just gave up!  It’s not worth my time.  I expected a “Nordstrom” like customer experience From this company for the prices they charge and that is the opposite of the “Wal-Mart” like experience I got !   Come on Lululemon -  live up to the standards of you are going to charge those kinds of prices !  It’s not just a “trend”!  It’s about the overall experience and you don’t make the cut!!!

Very dishonest about their return/refund policy as they tried to force me to accept an e-gift card instead of refunding via my original method of payment - as stated on their website. It's been a month since I made the return, it's taken long-winded back and forth e-mails, Twitter DM conversations and a phone call to get LululemonUK to agree to refund via my original method of payment.The leggings I returned were see through, which is quite disappointing, coming from what is supposed to be a quality, high end brand. I definitely will not recommend the brand nor their products.U.P.D.A.T.EWeeks have passed since I was told by LuluLemonUK Twitter that I’ll be refunded but I still haven’t got my money back. I’ve spent most of my evening ringing their UK customer care line only to be put through to 3 different Agents in Canada - one who said he couldn’t help me, one disconnected and the other told me a different story than I was told on Twitter weeks ago. I bought and returned those items in June, still no refund in September.If you cherish your dignity and peace of mind, DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM LULULEMON/LULULEMONUK, you will totally regret encountering such a horrendous company if you fall into their fake refund trap.I turned to Sweaty Betty for work out gear instead, as I don’t want to get into another round of trauma with LuluLemon. Great quality items, free next day delivery for my order worth over £250 and they refunded me for the returned items within a week of receiving the items - I’d ordered 2 different sizes for fit.

I love their products but customer service doesn't live up to the same quality standards.  Orders take a considerably long time to arrive - other companies seem to be managing quick turnaround despite COVID.  A lack of investment in infrastructure or unwilling to fund a good delivery service, or both? Latest experience - order cancelled, no explanation, days after an email confirming my order being placed.  It's from their new line, it was available at the time.  I might still not have been happy but an explanation would have been politic.  Bad Lululemon!

Disappointing service when it comes to refunds.. It takes forever to receive the money back after they acknowledge that they have received all the items. Lovely products, but the return service is just absolutely not up to the standards of 2020 when other companies issue refunds within days.

I have loved this store for years. Today however, I ran to a local store as soon as I got off of work to get a birthday present for a family member. It was about a 35 min drive and I thought I made it just in time. I saw someone walk into the store as I was walking through the parking lot. As soon as I got to the doors, an employee said that they were closing in 5 min and that I couldn't go in. I explained that I was getting a gift, and I already knew the exact product, size, and color I was getting. She then stated that there is only 5 min left and the store was capacity for Covid (which I totally respect). However I had just saw someone walk into the store as I was walking over, so there was no line or wait to go in. Within the time that the store was still open, I saw many customers leave, where I would have been able to run in and grab what I needed really quick. Instead, I was turned away, about an hour turn around drive, and extremely disappointed with the customer service.

I ordered a jacket from them and Fedex says it was delivered and we received the e-mail confirming this. However, Fedex never rang and just left in the building lobby. Anyone could have just picked it up ! And when I called they said it would be 15 to 20 days to investigate !! Unacceptable, this is a present I received for my 50th birthday, well rather did NOT receive. Customer service was no help at all. Fedex has better service that Lululemon because I called them on Thursday and they called me back the next day saying their investigation was complete and the package was lost or stolen. Still with 15 to 20 days back at Lululemon even when I told them the investigation was complete with Fedex. Worst experience ever !

based on my most recent visit in the store, people were super helpful and kind! I have a pair of leggings and a tank top and love them! great quality I've had the leggings since Christmas of last year and they haven't pilled and/or ripped. My tank top is a bit tight but does the job! thank you lululemon for my fave leggings ever

I love their products, and their customer service (most of the time) is very friendly and helpful! A while back, I brought in a skirt without a receipt to return and they gave me store credit. However, I would say their items are a tad bit too expensive given the quality (lots of pilling on leggings after some wear, fading logos, etc.) of everything, and their less than great efforts at sustainability despite their massive success in the economy.

Complete jokers! I placed an order on 2nd of June, still waiting to receive the products. In the meantime a catalogue of errors and terrible customer service: first parcel was not delivered, then they took 20(!!) days to investigate, followed by finally agreeing to send me a new parcel by then 2 out of 3 items were out of stock. Every step of the way had to be chased by me a number of times. The final straw was them initially offering me a gift card Instead of a refund for items no longer available. Stay away!

I would like to know why my package has not been delivered it says it was going to be here  August 1 and now I think that my package is stolen by the mail people and this has to be shipped before the 11th because I need a backpack for school

It took from the 19th June (date returned) to the 27th July to receive a refund for a coat I bought. This is longer than the refund on my Easyjet cancelled flight due to Covid-19. Complaints have been in the national press about Easyjets lengthy refund period! I have had this problem with Lululemon before and will not be buying from them again.

Long delays in issuing RefundsI purchase items from the online. They send send to separate but I didn’t get the part of the item I called customer service they re claimed to the item also they said you have to wait 15-20 days. Lululemon customer service is not good enough I don’t want to buy again.

I dont’ get it. The products are way overpriced and everything falls apart. I’d be happy to Spend $100 On leggings and items that last but those don’t. Couple that with staff who are rude and ridiculous loop holes that prevent every returning or exchanging items, I’m done. My daughter was required to have their leggings for dance. They came apart at the seams after the first use, and she’s a size 2, tiny thing. Bras, even headbands, fall apart. Just learned that the founder made many extremely racist comments and although he’s stepped down, hes still receiving income from the sales. I’ll never shop here again!

Wow, turned out i'm not the only one with bad experience today.  I have a defective pair of pants that split in the middle of the thigh in front, right along the yarn line that connects 2 different color yarn, yet they claimed it's an old item therefore it's not covered for repair nor replacement!  How sad.  The quality doesn't match the price and they are careless about customer service.  Never again.

Used to be a good company not entirely sure what happened... Yesterday I called Lulu in regards to a price-adjustment on an item I had purchased online during the week of their "biggest online sale". Less than a week later the item had been further reduced by $30 and moved to their "We've Made Too Much" section. This being my first time for calling to see if it was possible as I always purchase my items at the full price range as sales for Lulu are rare online. The lady I spoke with on their guest education was terrible. Excuse after excuse on why a $30 price adjustment couldn't be given as it was "policy" and couldn't provide much more detail than rehearsed script with a whole lot of attitude. She was willing to supply a $15 gift card for inconvenience- as appreciative as I was in regards to the gesture I was not looking for $15 on inconvenience and just straight principle. I asked if a $30 gift card could be done considering the price was adjusted by $30 in less than a week. At the end of the day if they could not give money back I would have happily accepted it in a gift card form to have been applied to a future purchase from Lulu. When the rep advised me she couldn't not do anything further as it was policy and they are only allowed to allot certain amounts to certain issues I had advised that's fine and will try to reach out to someone else as she had advised me earlier on the call they don't have managers. The rep proceeded to tell me to consider calling another day as I will only get her. What kind of company does not have managers? or any level of escalation for that matter? Disappointing to see such a huge corporation penny pinch and have the worst customer service set up I have ever experienced.Needless to say I'll consider my shopping elsewhere and will let others know the terrible experience as well to keep this from happening to them!

DO NOT ORDER ONLINE from Lululemon UK. Lululemon use UPS to deliver their items, UPS never attempt delivery to address and instead delivered to an "access point" 3.5 hours walk one-way from my house! Getting someone at Lululemon to understand this error has been exhausting, and now who knows when I will get a refund. Lululemon recommended that I just order the items AGAIN and pay again!! Even though I have not received a refund. Terrible customer service. Avoid.

I was also having trouble with my refund for a return (the shorts I ordered were too large), but once I reached out to Lululemon after a month of waiting, the customer support recognized that it wasn't my fault because my package was stuck in transit, so they went ahead and credited my card. I understand all companies right now are having trouble with shipping, etc. as a result of COVID, and I think they appreciate customers who are understanding and patient with this. Simran with the Guest Education Center was very helpful and kind and quick in responding to my concerns!
Online orders being returned...be warned it takes an age to process a refund back to your account. Better to return in store if possible. That way your money is credited in days rather than months.

Do not support Lululemon!! Their founder, Chip Wilson, named the company Lululemon because “it’s funny to watch” Japanese people pronounce the letter “L”. Their founder has stepped down but still gets paid. Do you really want to be supporting a racist company?Don’t believe me? Google “Lululemon racist name”. You’ll thank me later.

product quality has deteriorated and the customer service is deplorable. Lucy on chat, was super rude. They don't seem to have any reviews on FB or Google, guessing that is because they will be so bad.

They failed to complete my order. It was missing an item. They say it takes 15-20 business days BEFORE they can refund or send the missing item. A whole month! Then they proceeded to yell me that I should buy the missing item again in the meantime. Yeah I should spend my money to correct their mistake. When I tried to post a review on their website, they refused to post it!

Did a lot of research on the best running shorts on the market, Lululemon came at the top so I purchased the “Hotty Hot Short” for £58. First time I wore them the stitching on the inner thigh rubbed and made my thigh sore. After complaining, they said they didn’t see any issues with them and washed their hands of me. Disgusting customer service, and pricey garments too! I bought a £14 pair of Superdry shorts which are perfect. Wish I’d checked trustpilot first, don’t make the same mistake I did!

I would not recommend buying from lululemon online. I returned leggings almost one month ago and am still waiting on my refund. I contacted customer service who advised the leggings were received by them and it takes 28 days to process and then refund could take up to another 10 days. I returned a package to ASOS and received refund into my account within a week. Processing time makes no sense especially as lululemon provide a returns label via UPS. I will never purchase online from this company again. Very disappointing experience

I ordered some bottoms and when I tracked them to see where they had got to, I phoned Lululemon to ask what was happening.  They said the delivery people did not have my full address?  Though they would try to sort it.  10 days later still no parcel, just tracked the order to see they are being retuned to sender.  I tried to phone their helpline, which is apparently shut.  Very poor service.

Lululemon  Cabazon outlet were very rude with us I went over there signed up like they said on my cell phone so the manager told me to sign up on  the cell because that way I  would not have to wait she would text me to come  because ma daghter can't stand for a long time so she said ill text you when your next I came back weighted over 30 min and yet she said I have no way of knowing how much longer my daughter was exhausted I couldn't wait any longer they disrespect my daughter they disrespect her condition and disrespected me and disrespect at the fact that not only after they say that your next you're not next because there's no time to know how long you have to wait doesn't matter your **DISABILITY **
They cancelled my order on Jan 31 2020. However I found same product on Jul 4th sale and place order. They cancelled again. Why did Lululemon take responsibility as back ordered?

Horrible quality I bought t shirt on sale for 40$ ,it has pilled after I worn once.I contacted customer service and they asked me filled up the form with pictures and descriptions of what happened .After I submit the form the send me the same email and said  I have to attached more clear pictures and description.Are u kidding to me? U sell horrible quality clothing and don’t care about customers???I am not gonna buy from this brand anymore!
EVERY SINGLE lululemon pair I have purchased has piled within a couple months of me buying them! I have washed them how they tell you to. So frusturating!!
My order returned to their warehouse on the 25th May, it is now the 9th July and I still have not had my refund !!! Appalling !

I would not even give Lululemon one star! The customer service was appalling (also not sure why I kept being directed to a Canadian call centre who don’t seem to have any communication with UK based orders?? ..but all the same, Angie from Lululemon was awful)! I tried to order an item twice with the latter attempt confirmed as being sent out for delivery, and without any proper explanation, both were cancelled after lengthy waits. Now I have to wait a further 15 days for my money to be returned. Think the whole process should have only taken a couple of weeks max, instead it’s taken 7 weeks and counting..and the end result is I have nothing!! Bitterly disappointing experience and rubbish service throughout!!

Giving one star is being generous. Slow returns service. Slow to refund money. OneOrder was randomly sent back to Europe without explanation and despite assuring me that they had sent e-gift card for the promotion I had used, hasn’t materialised. Rather sham like online business. Although their products are good, has slipped in quality over the last year or so but prices remain high. Think carefully before buying online.

Bought something online and with no explanation it was cancelled. I tried to get a reason but someone called Jeremy thought it was acceptable not to give one. I cannot believe that a company like Lululemon can have such a bad online experience

This is my first time purchasing from this company and will be my last. I wish I had read the reviews first. I purchased a yoga mat on line on the 13th of June . The postage terms were free express shipping. I am still waiting. Customer service was not helpful at all. They claim the item has been sent, however, it is not trackable even though it is meant to be with a courier company. This is coming on to 4 weeks. I requested a refund and have not heard anything back. I was being patient because of the virus and allowed for extra time but to me it just comes across as dodgy. Totally misleading and a very unprofessional.
personally i am an absulute fan of lululemon i live in their leggings the quality is just amazing the other reviews must not have had an excelent esxperience as me.

I have had two seriously terrible experiences with Lululemon, and one lukewarm encounter. Both the terrible experiences concerned quality control issues made worst by terrible customer service. (Terrible 1) Spring 2019, I bought two pairs of Slim Commission pants in 30/34. The two pairs were sized inconsistently. Specifically, one pair was 1.5 inches too wide on the waist. The lack of quality control was actually astounding for pants that are nearly $150/pair. However, the lack of quality customer service was way worse. When I immediately brought it to Lululemon's attention, I was told too bad too sad. I could return for store credit and then wait over a week for a new pair to come in, which I ended up forced into doing. I bit my tongue and justified it because I loved the pants that did fit. (Lukewarm 1) Spring 2020, two of my Commission slims (I was now up to three) had gotten the same hole along stitching near the crotch. I have no idea how these expensive pants could deteriorate so quickly, particularly because I am OCD with these pants. I hardly wear / wash, and when I do wash its: alone / cold / delicate / hand dry. Yet it happened. I am categorizing this one as only lukewarm because I got one of the pairs replaced. However, I need to circle up with the other pair, and I was told by a store rep that they wouldn't help me (Michigan Ave Chicago store). Moreover, these pants shouldn't get holes along stitching like that. Its total BS. Shame on LULU.(Terrible 2) Summer 2020, my replacement pair came in the mail (see Lukewarm 1), and I was horrified to discover another sizing inconsistency problem. This pair was much tighter than my existing pairs. In fact, this pair had a waist two inches smaller than my other pairs and an ankle opening a half inch smaller. What the H**** LULULEMON. Again, I went to the store so I could try on other pairs and a couple sizes to understand what was going on. I walked thirty minutes to a store, and I had to wait in the heat for another thirty minutes to be allowed in due to COVID. When I get in they tell me they have NO 30/34 or 31/34 slim pants. Like not none in the color I wanted; straight-up NONE. How is that even possible. I was annoyed. I explained the quality control issue I had, and got horrible customer service. They refused to help and told me to try coming back in a week. This is not how high end brands behave towards customers. Lululemon get it together.

I've purchased over 20 items for my daughters over 2 years. Most of there products have been good quality, however our last purchase of $118 leggings had stitching come undone after 2 wears. I initiated a returned process and it took 2 chats and 5 emails and 7 photographs to finally get a return authorization form and on top of all of that no refund but a gift card instead. I expected much more from a high-end brand like Lululemon. Trusting your customers is very important. They clearly don't. I'll be looking for another athletics company.

I just want my money back for orders UK00224655, UK221240, UK00210223 please. Appreciate you are busy and working with Covid 19 in mind but please react faster, issue refund confirmations. I am so tired of chasing you just to have to wait for a response for another 3-4 days. Chat in the UK is temporarily closed. Phone line - no one picks up. It's such a shambles and it's a shambles because every other company is performing so well. I'm so disappointed, I love lululemon but would only ever shop in store going forward.

Ordered a pair of leggings for £59 on the 16th may - stated they’re could be dispatched up to 7 days later because of covid - understandable however still not received them on the 2nd July. Just had an email to say I have been refunded;“I'm sorry to hear that you still haven't received your package. Since we have passed the shipping timelines and it seems your order has not been shipped yet, I've gone ahead and credited back the full amount of your order to your original method of payment. Please note the credit goes through immediately on my end; however, it can take 3-10 business days for the funds to appear on your statement. If there's anything else we can help with, you're more than welcome to respond here. Keep in mind, to maintain your spot in our email queue, please wait until you've heard back from us rather than sending a follow up response. We'll get back to your email within 3-4 business days.”I don’t understand how they can charge so much yet not even bother to ship my item? For such an expensive company you think they would be able to actually send their items out. Sort of seems they’ve been greedy in keeping everyone’s money to gain interest. Will not buy again

Just received an in line order which is 2 items short both of these items were imminent birthday gifts.E mail sent with generic response & 4 x 15 minute calls to customer service with no response.Very disappointed as I spend a small fortune with lululemon

Great products, however it has now been over 2 months for me to receive my refund. I've spent countless hours reaching out to customer service and have had very little support and generic copy paste responses. I certainly will not be ordering online from them again!

Customer since 2012, and have just received Amex fees for late payment as lulu lemon have sat on a returns refund for 2 months. All Other (much cheaper) providers able to handle refunds and returns more professionally.Struggling to justify buying through them again
It is expensive, doesn't feel like it worth this cost, the material is soft but it feels cheap and smells of plastic

3 orders made = 1 pair of faulty leggings, one of the orders had an order form of someone else in the package which had all their personal details in (email address, home address, number), and it’s now been over 5 weeks since I returned the items and I still haven’t had a refund and I’m struggling to pay my credit card bill with the unexpected absence of this money for such a long period of time. I have spent so much time back and forth trying to sort this out with them, it is more hassle than it’s worth. A senior within their operations department needs to lift the bonnet on the absolute shambles of their online order and return process, it’s just magnifying how bad their customer services team is a as well, which is now resulting in people complaining on their popular Instagram accounts, all you need to do is look at a photo they post and watch the long list of comments that come in with similar problems. I hope they sort all this out because when not faulty their stuff is good quality!
great pair of pants!

This disgusting company used to stick by their customers. Now the greed is overflowing. I have been a customer since 2012 but will be no longer. I had previously exchanged multiple pants under their quality guarantee with no issues. Now I have a pair that the cheap pockets literally ripped because they are only attached by a cheap sticky seal (not sewn in) and are unusable. They are refusing to help or exchange despite many photos showing this is really the case. To see a company that had excellent service become  greedy capitalist trash when they make millions a year is pathetic. These pants are less than 3 years old and now cannot be worn. Buy leggings elsewhere this is PATHETIC.
10/10! Exceptionally easy returns on size exchanges. Very good customer service and in store is amazing too!

recently purchased an item as color "not anywhere near as advertised". Trying to return but my account said (which I had no choice to sign up for to do a return which is BS) "no purchase history". Called and would be on hold over 2 hours. Did chat and was 78 in line! I have spent hours trying to get a return label (no option on their site for one like other retailers) and go nowhere. I will not be a customer of LuLulemon Athletica from here on...just want my money back!

I just wanted to update on my previous review. Surprisingly I got a response from the GEC & they refunded me on the jacket that was faulty with a tear which I received & they also did do as they said & sent me a €20 gift voucher for the hassle and inconvenience caused. As with all the other negative experience with Lululemon, mine is no different. I received crop leggings beginning of June 2020, no returns label provided with the order, the gec.emea@lululemon is useless ... days waiting for a response & they still haven’t sent a returns label. Additional order placed since & puffy sleeveless jacket arrives with a tear in it..... they are the worst and most frustrating company as their customer service is appalling. Will absolutely not be spending my money with them in the future

So much to say here(none of it positive)Firstly, I purchased a pair of leggings for a ridiculously high price and within the first day of wearing them I noticed a hole.I have asked severel times for a refund..and nothing.Secondly, I sent an item back with they recieved nearly a month ago and I am yet to receive a refund.I have asked daily via insta messenger and they just say they will pass it to the uk team..this never happens.Thirdly, they offered me gift card in compensation for the appalling service  I have encountered and said this would be emailed to me within days....it never shows up ( this was weeks ago)So to summarise, the products are poor over priced quality, the staff lie and you will will wait forever if indefinitely for a refund.

I have not received goods from one order totalling £571 and no refund from another for same amount. I'm shocked as I love lululemon gear. I would seriously advise all customers to take care online as this is shoddy. No response to email. Escalated on PayPal.  Their Facebook and instagram littered with complaints.Very sad. MI am editing this as they sorted my issues out. I think their gear is so lovely I'm really pleased. The nulu pants are sooooo soft. Thank you lululemon!!! I think they were overrun during lockdown. All's well that ends well. M
Non existing customer service. Returned a jacket 2 months ago and still haven't gotten my refund. I haven't been able to get in touch with their customer service at all

Be aware I send back a pair of mens shorts wrong size . Send them back useing a return label from Lululemon them . Never received a receipt of return never received my new shortsNever received a refundThey do not pick up the phone still closed for customer service. I feel I have been ripped off.

Just received my first order from Lululemon online from them and the 3 pack of underwear had only 2 peices.  No response to an email back to them, 2 hour wait to talk to someone and their customer support line is closed today!!!  This is even worse than a government contract where you can get two for double the price.  At Lululemon, you can get two for the price of three!!!  Thanks Lululemon...strick this brand off the list!!

DO NOT BUY FROM LULULEMON.  The customer service is non existent they do not respond AT ALL.  I cannot get a refund for my item that they have received back, UPS tracking.  1 month now I have been waiting,  I have re emailed after waiting 3-5 days for a response , still nothing!  I have had no issues with anything using other premium branded on line shops, gymwear boutiques. Absolutely no customer service or customer care with Lululemon, if you return your goods DO NOT expect to get a refund and no point in emailing or using live chat!   DISGRACEFUL The CEO must be proud!!!

Horrible customer service online! I recently ordered online and had to return few items that did not fit. According to USPS tracking, they received the package on 5/21, however, even today 6/22, I have yet to receive a refund from them! I tried to call them, had to wait for more than 1 hour, was told that from the time the item make to the warehouse, it still take them 20-30 days to process the return....Avoid return online at all cost! I   have never encountered such terrible service!!!!!

I bought 2 Hold True Bras from Lulu Lemon, These are the only truly seam free bras that give a decent level of support without cutting into the skin of my shoulders and down the sides of my breasts ! - I really wanted to give these bras 5 stars but I had to make do with a size 32D and wear on the tightest hook instead of a 30D which is what I actually need. It seems this particular Bra model isn't made in a size 30 back (boo hoo ! ) please LuLu lemon, please start making size 30D bras as some of us just naturally have narrow backs but still need a much higher level of support for our boobies :(

Terrible products and customer service. I bought some men's ABC pants 3 months ago, 4 pairs to be exact, but they now all have holes in them. Online customer service does not respond to emails, except with a generic template. and it takes 10 days to get 1 email back. I paid $128 each for these pants and I expected them to last longer than 3 months.

Would give no stars if I could. Ordered two items second of June - one item was cancelled other was supposedly shipped on 11 June but the ups tracking link shows it never left the Netherlands - lululemon have taken the 98€ for the leggings but I haven’t received the item. The website directed me to a query form for customer service who replies to say I queried with the wrong lululemon entity. This was the query form that their own EU website sent me to. I then resent the query to another email who replied to tell me (despite having given my order number and email) that they needed my full name (my name was on the email query) and address before they could look into it. I replied over a week ago with this info and have had no reply. Just not good enough in circumstances where they have charged me for the item that I don’t have and will now have to try get a refund - how that’s possible when no one replies I do not know. Will be going through my bank if needs be.

I have been a loyal customer for over ten years and purchased a pair of wonder under crop pants for my yoga class as I have on many occasions. Several weeks in after wearing them In rotation with all of my other lulu pants for hot yoga, I discovered a hole in the upper right leg. Then came Covid. Long story short I contacted them sent all of the required info, Pics, purchase date etc. They refused to take them back as it is apparently not a manufacturing defect. This process took many emails back and forth and lots of time and frustration. They have lost a Very loyal customer as I know of many people who have returned items that were years old for a complete replacement. They will continue to lose customers if they treat loyal customers in this manner.HeatherHalifax Nova Scotia

Poor Customer service and not responsiveVery disappointed! the material is transparent and not wearable.Try to contact the customer service via phone, chat and the waiting list is to 3 hrs, I sent it back and its been 20 days and i am still waiting for my refund I am usually impressed with the customer service at the regular stores Unfortunately, I can not longer say this is the case in their website store as the last service I received was extremely unsatisfactory.

Horrible Service!! Returned online item. They acknowledged item was received at their warehouse on May 18. They told me refund (due to covid) would take 15-20 business days. I’m now at up to 23 business days. Asked for an update. No response. Is this even legal? They are holding my refund and have their product. Will NEVER EVER give them business again online or in person!

Avoid online purchasing at all costs. The worst customer service I have ever had from an online company. They took my money but order never arrived. Finally I was told it never left the warehouse due to a ‘glitch’ in the system. I only found out after I had tried every means of contact possible. I am still waiting on refund. Please AVOID.

I placed an order for “in stock” items on May 27th. I was sent a confirmation email saying that due to Covid 19 orders might take a little longer for delivery, I had no problem with this.On June 10th I received an email saying the items were being shipped and the payment of £214 was taken from my paypal account.On June 12th I received another email saying that my order had been cancelled due to low stock.It’s now June 19th, I haven’t received a refund, I have sent several emails but of course I haven’t received a response.I will never buy from Lululemon again, although their products are good quality, their price doesn’t reflect their dreadful customer service.Next time I will shop with Fabletics or Nike!

Lululemon received my return on 4/24. It is now 6/18 and my refund has still not been processed. I have emailed them 3 times now. Each time I do they extend the refund timeline and make up more excuses as to why it hasn’t been processed yet. This is absolutely absurd and I used to love lululemon but will think hard about ever giving them business again. I’m so frustrated with this experience.Update: I bumped my review up to 3 stars. After writing a 3rd email, this one being a very angry email, they sent me an egift card within a few days. Originally I was being told I have to wait for the return to be processed and then the physical gift card to be sent to me. I'm happy with this outcome, but not happy with the timeline or the service. The processing time was 2 months after receiving my return. The clothes are high quality, but I will never make an online return again.

Unfortunately like others I have had a really bad customer experience with them. They sent me an order with the security tag still attached. It was a present for a friend so I asked them to send a replacement directly to her. They took a week to respond despite chasing, asked me for information that was in the original email then two days later said they aren't doing exchanges online 'because they can't guarantee sizing'?? When you price at a premium which they do, it isn't acceptable to have such poor customer service. Very disappointing.

Excellent customer service. I bought a pair of leggings and ripped them on the pocket and just because they are so helpful, they sent me a return label to send my leggings in and have them repaired at no cost to me.

So disappointed and frustrated with the nonexistent customer service. Have been sent the wrong product and another customer’s delivery note (with their name, address, phone number and email), assuming another customer has been sent my information. Lululemon have not responded to several emails and I can’t get through on their phone line, it’s been nearly 2 weeks now.Clearly they have zero concern about protecting customer data or their GDPR responsibilities. I should escalate this to the ICO. I would not buy from this company again!

Horrible return process.  I purchased multiple items online. The purchasing process was very easy.  However the return process has me very disappointed  and frustrate with Lululemon.  I can not get through to a anyone, their web site does not update even though tracking confirms they have received it.  I was informed to day after trying to communicate with them for over 6 days everyday. That they have my return for the last 9 days and it will take 15-20 days to process the return and then another 10 business days to receive the refund.Returns and refunds will 25-30 days or more.  This is excessive and poor customer services.  I did keep many of the things I ordered and happy with the product.  But will never deal with a online return again.  Beware if you return an online product it will be a EXTREMELY lengthy process and will not resolve easily.

Absolutely awful customer service.  First of all you can not reach anyone by phone.  I had trouble printing a return label after 3 or 4 emails back and forth I was finally sent a label.  Got the pants out the next day.  They were received at the warehouse on May 28th.  Today June 17th I still do not have a credit for returned item.  I am seriously disappointed and expected so much more of Lululemon.  I will never order again.

Like everyone else stated, they've had my return for over a month now according to UPS tracking. Then they canceled it. I can't contact my credit card company because half the purchase was made with a gift card.I'm number 658 in their queue!!!!! I had reached out to them a week ago and they said that they would expedite my return. Clearly not.IF i actually get this figured out i'm just going to hang onto the gift card and buy something in-store whenever things open (and only for the exact amount on the card). NEVER giving them my money again.

Without notification, they removed half of my confirmed online order, something I only discovered upon delivery.  Delivery takes ages, so by the time I found out I had no opportunity to identify an alternative product from them or from anyone else.  A thoughtless approach to business and significantly weaker than their physical retail service.  Frankly, the online team should feel embarrassment.

Dissapointed to say the least. I thought better of lululemon. Have been a fan since they opened in the USA. However, I have ordered something more than 2 weeks ago for Father’s Day and they provided wrong address so package cannot be delivered nor can I change the address with ups. Customer service is non existent. Have tried calling helpline during stated opening hours and it says closed. Have sent more than 3 emails without any answers. I will not be shopping with them again. Every other store has at least had phones and helplines up and running or email being answered but this this is atrocious customer service. Bye bye lululemon.

Over this covid period I have purchased items via online purchases. I then required a refund for 1 item, and have emailed to initiate contact. Where I have recieved the automated 'we will reply within a 7-10day period. I have subsequently sent no less than 5 further emails. Only to get the same reply. This was over 2 weeks ago and then a reply yesterday to say I can get a refund in store or a gift card!!!! I have never felt so frustrated with the communication and lack of service. Everyone else has been able to keep up contact in this 'covid period' but Lululemon!!!

I used to be a huge fan of Lululemon. I have pants from them that I got in high school that still last, but the pants I've purchased in the last few years are not nearly as good quality. I had a pair literally rip on the seam and when I addressed it with Lulu they told me it was "natural wear and tear" and I wouldn't be getting a replacement pair or even a credit to use towards the store. This also happened with two other pairs I've had. I don't put them in the dryer and only wash them with other Lululemon clothing. It's actually pathetic that my $14 Costco pants now last longer than a $100 dollar pair of Lulus. Being in the military, I get a discount from Lulu and not even that has me ever wanting to waste my money there again. Terrible quality combined with terrible customer service and a terrible impact on the environment is not a good look for Lululemon.

I’ve been waiting 5 weeks for a refund and the responses I get are generic emails. There is no clear time frame of when I will receive my refund which is worrying as the prices are obviously very high for this brand. Wouldn’t shop online again

Always a positive experience in store, however after ordering a pair of pants online that turned out to be very see through, I realised that there is no customer support for online purchases and that the “Guest Education” team are completely unresponsive. Fortunately the store nearby is now open so I exchanged the item with no issue there. Otherwise it seems impossible to return an item by post and receive a refund.

Poor quality  merchandise and worse customer service.  I ordered several items.  One of which had the zipper break after one use.  It was the 1 L fanny pack. The reviews on the website repeatedly note the zipper issue but inexplicably  still have 4 stars.  When I contacted customer service it took several days for an email response which asked me to fill out a form and upload pictures of the item.  The format not user friendly and it took several days for them to email back that they would approve my return and send me a gift card 10 to 14 business days after they receive and process it.  I tried to post a review of the faulty item but is was rejected due to my description of the customer service.  I will not be buying from them again when well made gear for.women and men can be found for so many other outlets

I ordered a men's jacket and received a pair of women's joggers. I ordered a t-shirt but received it in the wrong colour. Both items are now out of stock - so this was a waste of a transaction, shipping, and of everyone's time. I've now been waiting on three refunds for several weeks. I imagine they'll refuse to honour a refund for sale items they delivered incorrectly.The current global situation explains slower operations, but many negative reviews predate the pandemic - and packing incorrect items can't really be attributed to that. There is no live chat, the phone is never picked up, and emails are answered after 5 working days with little to no solutions. It's no surprise that while many love the products, they're turning away from the brand because of the horrific customer experience.

Like so many others I am waiting on a refund for a parcel that is tracking as being received over 6 weeks ago. Each reply from CS is generic and lacks any personalisation or understanding. Will now open PayPal dispute.Completely unacceptable even in the current circumstances.Wouldn’t order again unless I’m certain on an item as I expect much quicker refunds when shopping online.

Ordered a yoga mat, showed 1 day dispatch and 2 days postage... 11 days later I get an email to say they’ve cancelled my order as they have no stock. How did it take you 11 days to figure this out? Shocking.

Supposed to be reputed company selling premium products but the customer service is one of the worst one comes across in these times. Don't refund for minimum 30 business days that's like 5-6 weeks . No one picks the phones. Email responses take 3-4 days and standard response without anyone showing any empathy. If they can't manage why are they even bothering to stay open online

Horrible customer service. I bought 2 pants for my daughters birthday back in April and returned one which they received on 4/22 and the other they received on 5/10. I still have not received a credit for either. I have  emailed them over 5 times and they keep saying they will expedite it and I will receive a credit with in a few days. I have now disputed the charges with my bank. It shouldn’t take 2 months to receive a credit even during a pandemic!

I bought a lululemon visor cap and returned it immediately on the day I bought it. I have waited a month and there is no refund. You cannot get hold of them on the phone and they do nothing about the emails I have sent. Shockingly bad customer service - I would advise you NEVER to purchase anything from this company.

Excellent in the store with helpful people.  However, online is the reverse and needing to chase a misdelivery find they do not take calls and do not (now two weeks later) respond to an online message to customer services.  So, you have a lack of quality customer focus for the online coupled with Startrack as the deliverer which is also hopeless (look up the reviews) ... a recipe for a disastrous experience.
I've called a number of times and have been left waiting almost an hour each time. They don't respond to any emails either.

I’ve always been a loyal Lulu customer. But I am sick and tired of spending $100-$150 on leggings for them to tear at the seams. I have a 5 month old pair of leggings that have holes in the seams. I’ve reached out three times to lulu and nobody has gotten back to me. Such awful customer service. I do not recommend buying online.
The worst customer service I ever dealt with, for the price of the merchandise they should be way better!! Website not informative, returns suck!!!!

They do not like to refund items! It is like getting blood out of a stone. It is so bad. This is my first purchase and my last. They sent me a coat full of someones hair and cat hair. It was so gross I refused to try it on. They have receive my item and one month later I am still waiting for a refund. A V O I D  - not worth the hype !

I purchased the Commission Pant Slim Warpstreme 32", wore them twice, and noticed that there was a distinct outline of my phone in the right leg. I thought it was strange, so tried washing the trousers. It didn't come out, and I realised it was the dye which had rubbed off around the stress of my phone!I contacted customer support with a picture of the trousers, explaining the situation. I am aware that having your phone in your pocket can cause an outline, especially with navy, over an extended period of time, but this was after only two wears! For trousers which cost £118, I wouldn't exactly say that's the kind of quality they preach. Customer care was entirely unhelpful. They said that, by the looks of the picture, damage was caused by 'outside force' without any explanation of what that may be, and with total disregard to me telling them that I simply went for a walk in them with my phone in my pocket. The first person said they would not be issuing a refund, then all subsequent responses were entirely canned BS about "your feedback matters to us" or "quality is at the heart of everything we do", while ignoring everything I was saying. Asked for a number to escalate the situation, completely skipped over and sent more corporate copy and paste.What has happened to this company?

I have 2 pair of leggings that I love but one recently got a hole and the other pair had a bunch of strings coming out of it. I was very disappointed considering the amount of money these leggings cost. I got in touch with the company and the customer service is not great. I sent probably about 15 emails back in forth. I have to send the leggings back and then they are going to send me a gift card which is nice. Overall the company is fine but your better off just buying cheaper leggings from arie. Save your money

My local store has been closed for 12 weeks due to Covid.  So I’ve been buying online , I placed an order on April 30 TH. and  still haven’t received it. They sent me three different shipments ;  1 tee  with a  hole in it , 1 stained on the front and back and pants pilled in the thigh. I have 10 different orders that were returned due to sizing issues from March and they still haven’t issued a refund yet. It is a 1- 2.5 hour wait to talk to an educator. I understand it’s Covid but this is totally unacceptable for a “ high- end “ company.  Truly, for the price point I expect better customer service not Walmart customer service. Buyer beware because you’ll never get your money back and may receive clothing with holes , pills and stains on them.

I purchased an item on April 28, and it showed up with a security tag!! I emailed them, it took them a week to reply to ASK ME what I wanted to do, I reply, another week goes by before they send me a shipping return label, now I have not seen any updates on my product and it’s been over a month since my purchase. I have emailed customer service multiple times and have to wait 3-4 days for a reply they tell me I have to wait another 15 days?! What kind of customer service is that?! For the Lululemon price, this lack of customer service is astounding. Do not buy from them.
Terrible customer service. I sent the item back in April and I have not received my money yet! I tried to contact them and they keep saying that the parcel is still in transit. So disappointed.

As mentioned previously many times blow, the returns is shocking.  Bought 2 set of items both had security tags on them when they were shipped so had to be sent back for removal , now several weeks have passed no package has been sent back to me nor I have I been credited. Emails take weeks to be answered . NEVER AGAIN.
Really good comfortable ABC pants - they are in my daily closet now

I don't understand all the negative reviews. Yes, the process of returning my items was quite slow as COVID-19 has impacted the amount of staff working. However, I had leggings that had a fault but I had already removed the tags but Lululemon was still accommodating and made it very easy for me to exchange/return my items by providing me a wide range of options. Their shipping is very fast and I love their products. During this pandemic, customers will just need to have some patience.

I really don't understand where the negative reviews are coming from.  I truly believe these are the "karen's" of our society though, the ones that expect someone to help them immediately and damn everyone else.  Customer service has always been top notch, never had ANY issues and returning items is SO simple.  Sure, from time to time I have purchased what I thought was less than up to standard clothing from them, but they always make it right.  I have gone as far as going into the store, where associates inspect my product and immediately refund/replace my items when warranted.

They received my return on April 30th and it is June 2nd and my return was just cancelled and I still don’t have my money. Impossible to get in contact with them and honestly not even worth it to get in contact with them. Customer service sucks!!

I received leggings as a gift. They were really great; however, the wrong size. I returned them the same day they were received in the mail. I was promised to receive an e-gift card where I could then use it for a bigger size. I waited and and never got it. I contacted help and she said wait a little longer.  After a month, I emailed again and they told me that the credit card that purchased them would be refunded even though I received them as a gift. Terrible customer service, I WILL NEVER BUY FROM THEM EVER. IM SO DISGUSTED.

Impossible to get hold of them. placed order online for store pickup; email notice says I should be able to pickup next day by noon - but no one responding at store, phone service says 2 hour wait, and online chat says 1 hr wait. COVID is not a good excuse for this horrendous service
I bought a long sleeve shirt and they literally cancelled my order and didnt refund me

If only I could give a 0 star review ... that is what they deserve. Absolutely shocking customer service. Sent a package back for a refund over 5 weeks ago now. No return confirmation received let alone my £150 back... Have emailed GEC customer service at least 7 times (no reply) tried to contact via live chat (closed) and waited on the phone for more than 2 hours (didn’t get through). I understand that things are challenging in the current climate but this is an absolute joke. Never ordering from them again.

Amazing customer service! I don’t know what others experienced for them to get negative reviews but for me I had an issue with my shipment and they immediately corrected it. Very pleased with their service. Thank you lululemon

Horrible return process.  My daughter ordered shorts just as the pandemic began.  She returned them over a month ago, but has yet to receive her refund.  We've waited in the online queue twice now for over an hour, only to be told that we need to continue to wait.

The fabric was subpar, I ordered 2 pairs of leggings and returned them both unworn and within a couple days. The return process is horrid. Its been 30 days and still no refund. The fabric was subpar. Wait time is 2-3 hours on the phone and online, plus days to get back to you. With everything going on,I've been patient but It says to wait another 10-15 days for the refund. I will not be ordering this brand again.

Store finally opened and it was the worse shopping experience so far!  Signs suggesting that you don’t touch the clothing unless you are wanting to buy. I waited 40 mins to get in, yes I was motivated to buy. They wouldn’t take cash but you didn’t know that until you got to the counter to pay. No trying on so if it didn’t work I’d have to come back and wait again to return. I could go on with how bad it was but I think you get the point. Don’t go unless you have a lot of patience. The experience was horrible for spending $260. Wont go back until things are better.

Like others I am still waiting for a £65 refund after 8 weeks, I can only warn online purchasers not to buy anything from Lululemon.  The 'customer education centre' are uncontactable by phone or chat, and their response to my email enquiries are either send holding emails, or repeat requests for information already sent.  I have now reported Lululemon to trading standards.As an aside the quality (low) of the yoga shorts I bought did not match the price (high) and they were too big, so they were returned.

I had horrible experience with lululemon customer service. I bought new workout clothes just before the pandemic, I was able to wear my new leggings 2 times at soulcycle class. Recently I wanted to wear them for the 3rd time I put them on and I realized that they have few holes on my left leg. I know for sure I didn't do anything to damage them. So I tried to write and explain what happened, lululemon is not helpful at all. They are saying it's not their fault and I can't get refund. I was not asking for the refund and tried to explain that it would be fair if they exchange my leggings to the same, new ones or to give me a gift card if easier. They are just writing the same generic email, "it's not their fault and they can't do anything". :(I had horrible experience with lululemon customer service. I bought new workout clothes just before the pandemic, I was able to wear my new leggings 2 times at soulcycle class. Recently I wanted to wear them for the 3rd time I put them on and I realized that they have few holes on my left leg. I know for sure I didn't do anything to damage them. So I tried to write and explain what happened, lululemon is not helpful at all. They are saying it's not their fault and I can't get refund. I was not asking for the refund and tried to explain that it would be fair if they exchange my leggings to the same, new ones or to give me a gift card if easier. They are just writing the same generic email, "it's not their fault and they can't do anything". :(

I received my lululemon pants on the 24th April and when I cut off the tag I noticed that there were threads polled in the fabric.  I took a photo straight away and accompanied with  a detailed email. Five days later I received a mail informing  me that my mail was forwarded to Europe. Following another five days I was asked the same information again which I subsequently sent to them. (they would have had this already)  I heard nothing back and sent a further email on the 4th May. I sent a further email on the 6th May and received a response and again asking me for the information that I already had sent in my first mail.  I responded with the information, yet again and informed them that I was extreamly disappointed with their lack of timely responses and gross inefficiencies .  On the 20th May I was told that I would receive labels for returning and todate I have had no further communication from Lululemon.  Its now five weeks since I made my first contact and my issues have not been resolved and in the meantime I had to purchase a another pair of leggings from them. At no point did I receive an apology or a resolution to this problem. I always buy from my the store in Dublin and because of covid 19 I had to shop online.  I am totally dissatisfied with the lack of communication and customer service.  I hope that this can be resolved soon.
Good quality workout gear. I like their designs, but sizing is odd.

Terrible customer service.  Was given a mother’s day gift of a Mist Over Windbreaker. Went to exchange for a different size at the Southcenter store in Calgary yesterday.  Seemed to be a huge deal because I did not have a receipt.  At the time I thought it was under my daughters account, but it wasn’t.  Didn’t know at the time it was under my son in-laws account.  There were no windbreakers available in store or on line.  Was told that I would need to get the receipt.  Not that simple...my daughter lives 3 hours away.  I was not asking for a refund would have exchanged for something else.  Was getting frustrated and was immediately told by the woman she could have me removed from the store!  All because I had huffed and rolled my eyes!  The tags were on the merchandise!  What was the big deal!  You would think the way she was treating me I had stolen the item.  I will never shop there again and have told my daughter to not buy me anything else from Lululemon.  I am now stuck with a expensive piece of clothing that does not fit!

Congratulations not a lot of companies can afford such a special, one of a kind, spectacular title such as 'The worst customer service in the whole universe'. If you're future buyer who is considering buying something from this company, please don't. If you love yourself don't do it, because if something goes wrong you won't get much help from them.
